1b1(khri brgyad): /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khro brgyad stong pa//bam+ba po nyi shu drug
1b2(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang nas yongs
1b3(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar byed pa'i sems de ni zod cing 'gags la med de/rnam par gyur pa yin
1b4(khri brgyad): la/dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /
2a1(khri brgyad): //rjes su yo rang ba'i maud las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de'ang zad cing 'gags la
2a2(khri brgyad): med de/rnam par gyur pa yin na/rjes su yi rung ba'i mod las skyes pa'i sems de ni gang yin/dngos po
2a3(khri brgyad): de dag ni gang yin/dmigs pa de dag ni gang yin/dge ba'i rtse bo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
2a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni gang yin/ci sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo'am gal te sems kyis sems
2a5(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo na ni/sems gnyis phrad par 'gyur ba med de/sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo
2b1(khri brgyad): bar mi nus so//byams pas smras pa/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod
2b2(khri brgyad): pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa dang /bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'ogrus kyi pha rol
2b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po
2b4(khri brgyad): myod pa dang /gzugs dngos po med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos
2b5(khri brgyad): po med pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dngos po med pa dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so
2b6(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med pa dang /byang chub dngos po med par
3a1(khri brgyad): shes na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i
3a2(khri brgyad): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/gal te de ltar bsngos na/bla na
3a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/gnas brtan rab 'byor
3a4(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3a5(khri brgyad): pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/dang nga zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur grang /btsun pa rab 'byor thog pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs
3a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
3b1(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar bya/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung ba'ang /ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
3b2(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams pa gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang //
3b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
3b5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/mtshan mi'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod
3b6(khri brgyad): lo/nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod la/dngos
3b7(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod la
4a1(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi/mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang /stobs bcu dang /
4a2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod la/de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin gyi//
4a3(khri brgyad): mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no//de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
4a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/nang
4a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos pa mang bar 'gyur/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
4a6(khri brgyad): mos pa mang bar 'gyur/stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang
4a7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
4b1(khri brgyad): nyid dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas pa ston te/ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs kyi bar du shes rab kyi
4b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
4b3(khri brgyad): ba dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
4b4(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bur yang ston to//bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston te/des bdud kyi las de dag thos na 'grib par yang mi 'gyur
4b5(khri brgyad): 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs kyi bar
4b6(khri brgyad): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing de dag la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur to/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
4b7(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas kyi bar du/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang 'bral bar
5a1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//byams pa gzhan yang theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan
5a2(khri brgyad): 'das lam gyi rgyun bcad pa/spros pa dang srid par khrid pa'i rgyun bcad pa/tshig gi lam chad pa/khur blor ba tsher ma bsal ba/srid par kun tu sbyor ba bcad pa/
5a3(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamos dpag tu med/
5a4(khri brgyad): grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa gang yin pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa
5a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang /de dag la gang dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag dang /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams
5a6(khri brgyad): dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi bar dag gi phyir dge bo'i rtsa ba bskyed
5a7(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas/gcig tu btul cing gzhal te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//rjes su yi rang ba
5b1(khri brgyad): phul du byung ba dang /gtso bo dang /rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya nom pas rjes su yi rang nas/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rna ba bla na med pa yang dag
5b2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dog par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
5b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsdams te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes
5b4(khri brgyad): su yi rang la/rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang zhing /rjes su yi rang nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/byang
5b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /sems phyin ci log pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log par ji ltar mi 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams
5b6(khri brgyad): pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la bsams te/de la'ang sangs rgyas su 'du shes par mi/
5b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing /dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par mi 'gyur la/sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de la'ang sems su 'du shes par mi 'gyur te/de ltar bsngos na/byang chub
6a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/lbub phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro//g.yA te byang chub
6a2(khri brgyad): sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la bsams shing mtshan mar 'dzin te/mtshan mar bzung nas rjes su yi rang zhing /bla na med
6a3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed na/de ltar bsngo na ni 'du shes dang /sems dang /lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpas sangs
6a4(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /sems gang gis bsams pa de dag de bzhin du zad pa la zad do zhes bya ba dang /zad pa gang yin pa de'ang
6a5(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa dang /sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de'ang de'i chos nyid yin pa dang /gang du yongs su bsngos pa de'ang de'i chos nyid
6a6(khri brgyad): yin par de ltar shes te/gal te de ltar bsngos na/mthun par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin zhing mi mthun par yongs su bsngo ba ma
6a7(khri brgyad): yin la/log par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa'
6b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag dang
6b2(khri brgyad): chos bstan pa thos pa gang yin pa drug dang /de dag la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
6b3(khri brgyad): 'phye chen po gang drag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag dang /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /khyim
6b4(khri brgyad): bdog gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lce rnams kyis chos thos shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang bskyed pa dag dang /bla na med pa yang dag
6b5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus nas/gcig tu brtul cing gzhal te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba
6b6(khri brgyad): dang /rjes su yi rang ba phul du byung ba dang /gtso bo dang /rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya nom pas rjes su yi rang ba dang /rjes su yi rang ba mnyam pa med pa dang mi
6b7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/rjes su yi rang nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/gal te chos
7a1(khri brgyad): de dag ni zud pa dang /'gags pa dang /med pa dang /rnam par gyur pa yin la/gang du yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes de
7a2(khri brgyad): ltar yang dag par shes te/gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin no//gal te chos rnams kyis
7a3(khri brgyad): chos rnams yongs su bsngo bar mi byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar de ltar yang dag par shes la gal te
7a4(khri brgyad): de ltar yongs su bsngo na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin no//byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa
7a5(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /sems
7a6(khri brgyad): phyin ci log pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba de dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /byang chub de dang /sems de
7a7(khri brgyad): la nangon par zhen pa med cing /gang du mngon par zhen pa de 'dra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang
7b1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du byed pa de/phung/
7b2(khri brgyad): po dang khams dang /skye mched rnams kyis dben par yang dag par shes shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par yang dag par shes/bsam gtan dang /brtson
7b3(khri brgyad): 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par yang dag par shes/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
7b4(khri brgyad): gyis dben par yang dag par shes/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag gis dben par yang dag par shes/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
7b5(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gis dben par yang dag par shes na/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod
7b6(khri brgyad): nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpas rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod
7b7(khri brgyad): nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag par shes shing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
8a1(khri brgyad): 'das de dag kyang /sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /mngon par 'du
8a2(khri brgyad): byed pa'ang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /byang chub kyi sems kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba'i
8a3(khri brgyad): sems kyang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /byang chub kyang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
8a4(khri brgyad): pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sprin
8a5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang //
8a6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
8a7(khri brgyad): po bco brgyad po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag par shes na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
8b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dben pa la de ltar spyod par bya ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
8b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par rjes su dran pas/'di ltar yongs su bsngo/
8b3(khri brgyad): bar bya ste/gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de ni yongs su bsngo ba de ji lta ba de kho na bzhin te/de'i rang bzhin can dang /de'i ngo bo nyid yin par gal te de ltar yang
8b4(khri brgyad): drag por shes na/bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin/sems
8b5(khri brgyad): phyin ci log pa ma yin/lta ba phyin ci log pa ma yin no//gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sangs
8b6(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mtshan ma'i tshul gyis shes na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no//
8b7(khri brgyad): gal te 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/mtshan ma med pa yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag 'di ltar dran par byas shing //
9a1(khri brgyad): mtshan mar 'dzin par byed na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/de ltar na de ni 'du
9a2(khri brgyad): shes phyin ci log pa dang /sems phyin ci log pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log pa yin no//gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang //
9a3(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang /sems bskyed pa de dag shes par mi byed cing /mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9a4(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin sems phyin ci log pa ma yin lta ba phyin ci
9a5(khri brgyad): log pa ma yin no//byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan mar yang mi 'dzin la/yongs su bsngo bar yang byed pa
9a6(khri brgyad): ji lta bu yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs la mkhas pa de dag bslabs pas/de'i
9a7(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la mkhas par rig par bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par ni
9b1(khri brgyad): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar yang mi nus so//byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sangs rgyas bcomu ldan
9b2(khri brgyad): 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'i sems
9b3(khri brgyad): bskyed pa de dag kyang med pa yin na/'di skyon du mi 'gyur ram/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni 'di ltar rnam
9b4(khri brgyad): par brtag par bya ste/sku de dag dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag ni 'gags pa yin na/'on kyang mtshan mar bzung nas rnam par rtog par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom
9b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag dang /sems bskyed pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/rnam par rtog par byed ngo //de
9b6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/de ltar mtshan mi'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su yi rang bar gnang bar mi mdzad
9b7(khri brgyad): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag mtshan mar 'dzin cing rnam par brtags nas/dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid
10a1(khri brgyad): de'i dmigs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir ro//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas ni
10a2(khri brgyad): dmigs nas mtshan mar bzung ste/yongs su bsngo bar mi bya'o//dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang /mtshan ma'i 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ni/de bzhin gshegs
10a3(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis don che bar ma gsungs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa/zug rngu dang bcas pa
10a4(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro//'di lta ste dper na/kha zas bsod pa/dug dang sbyar ba/kha drog dang /dri dang ldan pa de la byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mis bza' bar bsams nas//
10a5(khri brgyad): des de za bo na kha dog dang dris kyang dga' bar byed la/zhu ba'i tshe ni sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du 'di la kha cig log par zin pa dang /
10a6(khri brgyad): log par shes pa dang /log par bsgrubs pas/don ma rtogs te/khong du ma chud par 'di skad du/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/'dus pa dang /ma byon pa
10a7(khri brgyad): dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
10b1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /ji srid du dam pa'i chos
10b2(khri brgyad): nub par ma gyur pa'i bar der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang /de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /brtson
10b3(khri brgyad): 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas/dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang
10b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs medro pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
10b5(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i
10b6(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par mdzad cing /sems can
10b7(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /
11a1(khri brgyad): rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa drug dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
11a2(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /de dag gi nyan thos kyi theg pa dag gis de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang
11a3(khri brgyad): yin pa drag dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan pa gang yin pa dag dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha'i lding dang //
11a4(khri brgyad): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po grang dag gis de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus nas gcig tu brtul cing gzhal te/
11a5(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig ces ston par byed de/de ltar des yongs su bsngo ba mtshan ma'i tshul dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
11a6(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste/kha zas dug can bzhin du dug nyid du 'gyur ro//dmigs par lta ba'i bsngo ba ni bsngo bar yang mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dmigs pa
11a7(khri brgyad): de ni dug dang bcas pa/mtshan ma dang bcas pa rgyu dang bcas pa/rkyen dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ltar bsngos pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab pa
11b1(khri brgyad): yin te/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba'ang ma yin la chos smra ba'ang ma yin no zhes brtag par bya'o//de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
11b2(khri brgyad): dpa'i theg pa pa dag gis ni 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la ji ltar rjes
11b3(khri brgyad): su yi rang nas/yongs su bsngo bar bya/thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
11b4(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas/dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin
11b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa'i bar dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lho ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
11b6(khri brgyad): 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'i bur dag la ji ltar rjes su yi rang nas/yongs su bsngo bar bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar yongs su bsngos na/bla na med pa yang
11b7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing /de bzhin
12a1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa la skur pa gdab par mi 'dod pas ni/'di skad du yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
12a2(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar thugs su chud pa dang /rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang /mtshan
12a3(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa dang /chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du
12a4(khri brgyad): bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa
12a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//de ltar yongs su bsngos na/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skur pa btab par mi 'gyur la/de bzhin
12a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pas gsungs po bzhin du smra ba dang /chos smra bar yang 'gyur ro//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa yin
12a7(khri brgyad): no zhes bslab par bya'o//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de
12b1(khri brgyad): dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/'di ltar gzugs ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//tshor ba dang /
12b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//de
12b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs
12b4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no//de bzhin du bsom ga tan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs
12b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs po'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du nang stong
12b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
12b7(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par
13a1(khri brgyad): rlig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//de
13a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /yang
13a3(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
13a4(khri brgyad): gzigs pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa/'dod pa dang /gzugs
13a5(khri brgyad): dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/mra gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma
13a6(khri brgyad): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni de ltar gtogs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ma gtogs pa de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba dang gtogs pa ma yin no//chos gang la yongs
13a7(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba'i chos de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no//yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de'ang gtogs pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang gtogs
13b1(khri brgyad): ba ma yin no//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no//de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang /
13b2(khri brgyad): gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/mA gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma
13b3(khri brgyad): yin no zhes yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/gal te 'di ltar shes te/gzugs gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams
13b4(khri brgyad): dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa 'dod
13b5(khri brgyad): pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang /
13b6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma
13b7(khri brgyad): yin te/de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la ni rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po
14a1(khri brgyad): med pa ste/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang //
14a2(khri brgyad): khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
14a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
14a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
14a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'adra de bzhin
14a6(khri brgyad): du 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/ma gtogs pa gang yin pa dri
14a7(khri brgyad): ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//gang 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de ni/
14b1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma'i tshul dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la ni rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni
14b2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa yin la/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar shes na/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba de
14b3(khri brgyad): dug med pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dge par zhugs pa gang mtshan mo'i tshul dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa bre de dag
14b4(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag log par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no//log par yongs su bsngo ba la ni//
14b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa mi mdzad do//gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de ni sbyin
14b6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton
14b7(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do//gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pa de ni/byang chub kyi
15a1(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /stobs
15a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do//
15a3(khri brgyad): de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi byed do//sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi byed do//gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi byed pa dang /sems
15a4(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par mi byed pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
15a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar de'i bsngo ba ni dug dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pas/'di ltar
15a6(khri brgyad): brtag par bya ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes thugs su chud pa de lta bur bdog gis kyang de ltar
15a7(khri brgyad): chos nyid des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
15b1(khri brgyad): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor legs so legs so//rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs
15b2(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang /skye bo med pa'i tshul dang /'byung ba med pa'i tshul dang /kun+da nas nyon mongs pa med
15b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshulnga dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshulnga dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /
15b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi tshulnga dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis bstan pa ni legs so//rab 'byor gol te stong gsum
15b5(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams thob par gyur cing /bosam gtan bzhi dang /
15b6(khri brgyad): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sems can de dag
15b7(khri brgyad): gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ming lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang legs so//bcom ldan
16a1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gos pa med pas yongs su bsngos na/
16a2(khri brgyad): de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do//rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu de ni mchog ces bya/phul du byung ba zhes bya//
16a3(khri brgyad): gtso bo zhes bya/rab ces bya/rab mchog ces bya/gya nom pa zhes bya/bla na med pa zhes bya/gong na med pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
16a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur ta ma/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra
16a5(khri brgyad): bcom par gyur nas dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /zas dang /mal chu dang /
16a6(khri brgyad): snyun dang /ne ba'i glosos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed na/rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am
16a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las ches bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mamo/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang logs so//bde bar gshegs pa mang
16b1(khri brgyad): lags so/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongs su
16b2(khri brgyad): bsngo bas yongs su bsngos na/de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa de
16b3(khri brgyad): dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur nas/de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /
16b4(khri brgyad): stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am
16b5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/rabo 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//
16b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byoraro de bas ni/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gos pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas
16b7(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngos na/de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can gang dag 'khod pa
17a1(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/der byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re
17a2(khri brgyad): la'ang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed du/
17a3(khri brgyad): gos dang /zos dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed mchod pa byed cing /bde ba'i yo
17a4(khri brgyad): byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byed de/de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshams rnams dang /steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
17a5(khri brgyad): kloklung gi bye ma skyed dag na/sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag las/byang chub sems dpa' re ro la'ang bskul pa
17a6(khri brgyad): gad+hA'i klong gi bye ma snyed du gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /nu ba'i gasros sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/
17a7(khri brgyad): mchod pa byed cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byed na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ches bsod nams mang du
17b1(khri brgyad): skyed snyam mam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis lags so//bcom/
17b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la ni dpe bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags
17b3(khri brgyad): ni/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang mi shong bar 'gyur lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
17b4(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor logs so legs so//rab 'byor gang khyod kyis de skad smras pa ni legs so//rab 'byor de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
17b5(khri brgyad): gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed
17b6(khri brgyad): do//rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya/phul du byung ba zhes bya/gtso bo zhes bya/rab ces bya/
17b7(khri brgyad): rab mchog ces bya/gya nom pa zhes bya/bla na med pa zhes bya/gong na med pa zhes bya ste/rab 'byor gos pa med pos bsngo ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la ni bsod nams kyi
18a1(khri brgyad): phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi tshwa dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba brgya'i cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /
18a2(khri brgyad): grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan
18a3(khri brgyad): zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa
18a4(khri brgyad): lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan zhing /gos dang zas dang /mal cha dang stan dang /
18a5(khri brgyad): na ba'i gsos smon dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed cing /badre ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byed la/byang chub
18a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag la bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed pa'i phyir ro//de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi
18a7(khri brgyad): nang nas/lha'i bu nyi khri thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
18b1(khri brgyad): po'i thabs la mkhas pas gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyi dge
18b2(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /ji ltar gnyis dang /gnyis su ma mchis par yang khas mi ldan pa de ltar yongs su
18b3(khri brgyad): bsngo bar bgyid pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu/lha'i me tog dang /bdug pa
18b4(khri brgyad): dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /pa dan dag khyer te/lha'i sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /
18b5(khri brgyad): rol mo'i sgra dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas
18b6(khri brgyad): pa 'dis dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
18b7(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo ba dang /ji ltar gnyis dang /gnyis su ma mchis par yang khas mi len pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyis pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags so//de nas chings
19a1(khri brgyad): ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga lnga ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lnga mgo bos phyug
19a2(khri brgyad): 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dag gong du
19a3(khri brgyad): smos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis gnon pa ni ngo mtshar
19a4(khri brgyad): legs so zhes sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs su brjod do//de bzhin du tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od
19a5(khri brgyad): gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom
19a6(khri brgyad): snang dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mo dag dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
19a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs
19b1(khri brgyad): la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dag gong du smos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa la spyod pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
19b2(khri brgyad): de dag zil gyis gnon pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes sgra brjod pa byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu'i
19b3(khri brgyad): bar dag la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
19b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/de dag thams cad kyis 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
19b5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der
19b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /de dag las gzhan pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
19b7(khri brgyad): las byung ba dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang //
20a1(khri brgyad): shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang /de dag thams
20a2(khri brgyad): cad mngon par bsdus nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su yi rang ste/rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/rigs kyi bu
20a3(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/des 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
20a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der//
20a5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar de dgra thams cad mngon par bsdus nas/mi dmigs pa'i
20a6(khri brgyad): tshul dang /gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /gos pa med pa'i tshul dang /byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang
20a7(khri brgyad): rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/snga
20b1(khri brgyad): ma'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag pas ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dri'i brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ba nas
20b2(khri brgyad): rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ces bya ba nas/gong na med pa zhes
20b3(khri brgyad): bye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su
20b4(khri brgyad): yi rang ba dang /yongs su bsngo ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi phung po gcig tu brtul nas rjes su yi rung ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ste/rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar
20b5(khri brgyad): dag gis rjes su yi rang bar byed pa zhes bka' stsal pa de la/bcom ldan 'das rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dang /rjes su yi rang ba gong na ma mchis pa'i bar du ni ji lta bu
20b6(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang gi tshe/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
20b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams dang /de dag gi rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi
21a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin mi 'dor la/rlom sems su mi byed cing brnyas par yang mi byed la/mi dmigs shing de 'di snyam du 'di la chos 'ga' yang skye ba med 'gag pa med//
21a2(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med/rnam par byang ba med lo/chos de dag ni 'grib pa'ong med/'phel ba'ang med/'ong ba'ang med/'gro ba'ang medo/phung por gyur pa'ang
21a3(khri brgyad): med do snyam du sems shing /rnam grangaso des 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan
21a4(khri brgyad): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag rjes su yi rang ste/rjes su yi rang nas/bla na med pa yang
21a5(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba mchog tu 'gyur ba
21a6(khri brgyad): nas/rjes su yi rang ba gong na med pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad ni rjes su yi rang ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/
21a7(khri brgyad): rgya'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog ces bya ba nas/gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro///
21b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa dang 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag gi thugs dang po deskyed pa nas bzung ste/dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar
21b3(khri brgyad): der dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
21b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i bar dang /de ma yin pa gzhan sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi/
21b5(khri brgyad): rang bar 'dod pa des ni/'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bye ste/rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa'ang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa
21b6(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan yang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang /tshor
21b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin no//rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i
22a1(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta bu bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rgyas sum nu na bdun yang de banan no//rnam par grol cha/
22a2(khri brgyad): dri lta ba bzhin du stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /sas yang dag par rig pa na mi so dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad kya de bzhin no//rna par
22a3(khri brgyad): grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang de bzhin ni//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa'ang de bzhin no//rjes su yi rung ba'ang de bzhin no//
22a4(khri brgyad): rnam par grol ba ji lta bo bzhin du 'das pa dang /me b+h+yon ma dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas ba
22a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag kyang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'ang de bzhin ni//rnam par
22a6(khri brgyad): grol ba lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba dz+ra lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
22a7(khri brgyad): 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su myi chen las 'das pa 'dza
22b1(khri brgyad): bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
22b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin no zhes rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//de bzhin du bcings pa med
22b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /grol ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i chos de dag gi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa dang /skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang /
22b4(khri brgyad): 'byung ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin te/'pho ba med pa dang /rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
22b5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba mchog yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
22b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang
22b7(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs te/'tsho
23a1(khri brgyad): zhing gzhes pa gang yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/
23a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang na
23a3(khri brgyad): ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed bla mar byed ri mo byed mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la nyin
23a4(khri brgyad): mtshan du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye mo dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du
23a5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya bar spro ba bskyed pa dang /tshul khrims la gnas te/de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa dang /bzod pa bsgom
23a6(khri brgyad): po dang /brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang /bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /shes rab bsgom ste/de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom la/rigs kyi bu
23a7(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /
23b1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23b2(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de lo ni/snga ma'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pas/brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i
23b3(khri brgyad): bar du'ang mi bzod do//yongs su bsngo ba de ni mchog ces bya ba nas/gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
23b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas
23b5(khri brgyad): ni mi dmigos pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las rjes su yi rang ba dang /yongs su bsngo ba'i
23b6(khri brgyad): le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das le tshe
23b7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa lags/bcom
24a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal
24a2(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon
24a3(khri brgyad): mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du/rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi
24a4(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mchog tu bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang /kho na dang /gnod pa thams cad spangs pa'i slad du
24a5(khri brgyad): bde bar bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can rnams kyi mig lnga yongs su 'dzin pa'i slad du gsal bar bgyid pa lags/bcom
24a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can shul ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par spong ba'i slad du shul ston par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
24a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa lags//
24b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bskyod par bgyid pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma lags/ba
24b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes pa dang /ma 'gags pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ther zug
24b3(khri brgyad): tu gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stsal
24b4(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du sems can mgron ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi thol ba'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa lags
24b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skor ba ma mchis pa dang /ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lan gsum du bzlos te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su skor
24b6(khri brgyad): bar bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston par bgyid pa
24b7(khri brgyad): lags na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu ji ltar ston pa la gnas par bya
25a1(khri brgyad): ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//ji ltar ston pa la phyag bya ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o//de ci'i phyir
25a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyang ston pa las gzhan ma yin la/ston pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan ma yin te/shes rab kyi pha
25a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa yin la/ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
25a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rab tu phye ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong
25a5(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin//
25a6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshod med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/mngon par shes pa lnga dang /pha rol tu phyin
25a7(khri brgyad): pa lnga dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
25b1(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/rnam pa thams cad
25b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung gleng gzhi ni
25b3(khri brgyad): gang yin snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
25b4(khri brgyad): smras so//kau shi ka gang khyod 'di snyam du/btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung /gleng gzhi ni gang yin snyam du rnam par rtog pa ni/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
25b5(khri brgyad): pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pas 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
25b6(khri brgyad): dag gi thugs dang po bskyod pa nas/dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo
25b7(khri brgyad): bar byed do snyam nas/bdag gi zhu ba byung ngo //kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil
26a1(khri brgyad): gyis gnon par byed pa yin no//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon
26a2(khri brgyad): par byed pa yin no//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/dmus ling rnams ni brgya 'am/stong ngam 'bum yang rung ste/dmigs bu med na lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/
26a3(khri brgyad): grong khyer du phyin par lta ga la nus/kau shi kra de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dmus long lta bur gyur pa 'dri dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dmigs bu
26a4(khri brgyad): med na/byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par lta ga la nus/kau shi ka gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin
26a5(khri brgyad): pa lnga po dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/de'i tshe mig dang ldan pas/pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo//brgya byin gyis smras pa//
26a6(khri brgyad): btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo zhes
26a7(khri brgyad): zer na/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'o na/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bam/de bzhin du tshul
26b1(khri brgyad): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na'ang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob
26b2(khri brgyad): bam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/kau shi ka de ni de lta ma yin no//de ni de lta ma yin te/kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas ni//
26b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pos yongs su bzung bas kyang /pha
26b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo//kau shi ka de lta bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis mchog ces
26b5(khri brgyad): bya'o//phul dang rab dang /rab mchog dang gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
26b6(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon
26b7(khri brgyad): par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par
27a1(khri brgyad): sgrub tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel
27a2(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//tshul khrims dang /bzod
27a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//nang stong
27a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mngon par sgrub tu
27a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
27a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon
27a7(khri brgyad): par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
27b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/de ltar chos de dag thams cad mngon par sgrub tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//shA ri'i
27b2(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mngon par sgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das tha
27b3(khri brgyad): ltalhur chos thams cad kyi bar dag mngon par sgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
27b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pas shes rab
27b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//chos thams cad kyi bar drag mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /'byung ba med pa
27b6(khri brgyad): dradang /'jig pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab
27b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub na/chos gang zhig thob par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs na/chos gang yang thob par mi byed de/gang gi phyir chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
28a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos gang dag thob par mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
28a3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do//mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do//de bzhin du kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag
28a4(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /nyon mongs pa drang bcas pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /
28a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs po dang /rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do//'khor ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do//mya ngan las
28a6(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir
28a7(khri brgyad): te/des na chos gang yang thob par mi byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha
28b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka gang yang khyod 'di skad du/bcom ldan
28b2(khri brgyad): 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid lags sam zhes zer ba ni//kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/kau shi ka/
28b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed/dmigs par mi byed pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed do//dmigs par mi byed do//
28b4(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi bgyid cing dmigs par mi bgyid po lags
28b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ming ji lta ba dang /mtshan ma ji lta ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta ba de ltar thob par
28b6(khri brgyad): mi byed pa yin no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o ni ji ltar thob par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/kau shi ka ci nas kyang
28b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa dang /khas mi len pa dang /mi gnas pa dang /mi 'dor ba dang /mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /mi 'dzin pa dang /mi gtong ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/chos gang yang thob par byed pa med do//brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
29a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang dmigs pa ma
29a3(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
29a4(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos
29a5(khri brgyad): thams cad thob par bgyid pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa'o zhes bgyi bar de lta bu'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/bcom ldan
29a6(khri brgyad): 'das de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong bar bgyid pa logs so//de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
29a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang
29b1(khri brgyad): ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod de/glal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni gsog go/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob dang /snying po med pa dang /ya ma brla'o zhes bya bar de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/byang chub sems dpa'
29b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong bar byed pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed
29b4(khri brgyad): pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glo ba ches pas/chos gang dag la glo ba ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan
29b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/gzugs la yid mi ches so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
29b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la yid mi ches so//mig lnga yid mi ches so//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la yid mi ches so//gzugs la yid mi ches so//sgra dang /
29b7(khri brgyad): dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams la yid mi ches so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches so//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /
30a1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches so//nang stong pa nyid la yid mi ches so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
30a2(khri brgyad): kyi bar la yid mi ches so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yid mi ches so//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
30a3(khri brgyad): dadrang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yid mi chis so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid mi ches so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
30a4(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid la yid mi ches so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yid mi ches so//
30a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid mi ches so//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi
30a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la glo bo ches pas/gzugs lnga glo ba mi ches pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang glo ba mi ches pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
30a7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag mi dmigs pas
30b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches s+ho//rab 'byor de ltar na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/gzugs la yid mi ches pa yin no//rnam pa
30b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang yid mi ches pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/pha
30b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rnam grangs glang gis 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
30b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di che ba yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi
30b5(khri brgyad): bIgyid/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa che bar mi bgyid chung bar mi bgyid/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten
30b6(khri brgyad): cing 'brel par 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi bgyid/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi bgyid/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa drang
30b7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi bgyid/nang stong pa nyid che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi bgyid/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
31a1(khri brgyad): dang/gas pa mas dang /sas yang dag par dag rnams dang /rlom mchos ma'i sgrub mas rga bar mi bskyed/rlung bar mi /
31a2(khri brgyad): che bar mi babyed/rlung bar mi bgyid/sangs rgyas chu bar mi brjid/rlung bar mi bgyid pa lags so//gzugs spyad par mi bgyid/'bru bar
31a3(khri brgyad): /drug da kyang mapa da/rgyu gas pa snang pa da/ brnam pad/ngas mi sa bar du byud par ma
31a4(khri brgyad): pa/ga tsun pa seM ma da/na byod/rib da 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yangs par me bgyid/dri
31b1(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid byang chub dang /sangs rgyas kyi bar du yangs par mi bgyid/dog par mi bgyid pa lags so//gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/stobs chung bar mi bgyid///
31b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/stobs chung bar mi bgyid/byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang stobs dang
31b3(khri brgyad): ldan par mi bgyid/stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab
31b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das gral te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b5(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
31b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/chung bar mi bgyid
31b7(khri brgyad): pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du che bar mi bogyed chung bar mi bgyid pa'o//gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa'o zhes bgyi ba'i bar du
32a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
32a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang gzugs tsho ba 'am/chung bar bgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang che ba 'am/chung
32a3(khri brgyad): bor bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags la gang gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/stobs chung bar bgyid pa dang /sangs
32a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/stobs chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa mi lags pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i
32a5(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//'di ltar sems can skyo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye
32a6(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//de bzhin du gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sangs
32a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes
32b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//gzugs ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig
32b2(khri brgyad): par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sems can dngos po ma
32b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
32b4(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
32b5(khri brgyad): pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o///
32b6(khri brgyad): sems can stong pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par reg par bgyi'o//gzugs stong pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par
32b7(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas
33a1(khri brgyad): kyi bar du stong pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bgyi'o//de bzhin du sems can mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma
33a2(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//gzugs mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
33a3(khri brgyad): smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes
33a4(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis
33a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
