33a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//de bzhin du sems can dben pa dang /sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes
33a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
33b1(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o//sems can rnam par bshig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bshig pa ma mchis par rig par
33b2(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon por rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par
33b3(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//gzugs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par
33b4(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol
33b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis por rig par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab
33b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//sems can stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs
33b7(khri brgyad): dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o//gzugs stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du
34a1(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par
34a2(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
34a3(khri brgyad): des kyang 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
34a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/mngon par bsgrub pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///
34a5(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol
34a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'drir mchis pa lags/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la don dang /tshul
34a7(khri brgyad): las mos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yang dag par zhugs nas ni ji srid cig lags/des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
34b1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la ni bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags/des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/des tshul khrims
34b2(khri brgyad): dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags//
34b3(khri brgyad): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
34b4(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa yin no//shA
34b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med tshad med pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
34b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//de ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /
34b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nas/'dir skyes pa yin no//de ni de tshun chad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med dpag tu med/bsdam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing 'dir 'ongs pa yin te/
35a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ngam/thos na'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis ston pa mthong ngo snyam pa'i
35a3(khri brgyad): sems skye bar 'gyur zhing /bdag gis ston pa thos so snyam pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni mtshan
35a4(khri brgyad): ma med po dang /gnyis su med pa dang dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang tshul las khong du chud par 'gyur ro//de nas
35a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta ba 'am/mnyan par nus
35a6(khri brgyad): lcags sem/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/rab 'byor chos bem po nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lta ba
35a7(khri brgyad): po dang /nyan pa po ni med pas na/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mthong mi thos so//de bzhin du chos bem po nyid kyi phyir/bsam gtan dang /brtson
35b1(khri brgyad): 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi mthong mi thos so//chos bam po nyid kyi phyir des nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
35b2(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mi mthong mi thos so//de bzhin du chos bem po nyid kyi phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi mthong mi thos so//chos bam po nyid kyi phyir yang dag
35b3(khri brgyad): par spyong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lhag rnams dang /lAm mi mthong mi thos so//chos
35b4(khri brgyad): brem po nyid kyi phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
35b5(khri brgyad): mi mthong mi thos so//chos bam po nyid kyi phyir byang chub mi mthong mi thos so//sangs rgyas mi mthong mi thos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
35b6(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa des yun ji
35b7(khri brgyad): srid cig nas spyad pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni rnam par dbye zhing bshad dgos te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed phyin chad nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed cing /de bzhin du bsam gtan
36a2(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
36a3(khri brgyad): pa la rnal 'byor du byed de/de'ang thabs la mkhas pas rnal 'byor du byed cing chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed la/ji ltar 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi mthong bas
36a4(khri brgyad): nam du'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la mchod pa'i khyad par gang
36a5(khri brgyad): dag gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bye ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par
36a6(khri brgyad): de dag des sems bskyed ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro//nam du'ang ma'i mngal du skye
36a7(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur/namo du'ang mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'brel bar mi 'gyur/nyon mongs pa gang dang yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur/nyan thos kyi sems dong //
36b1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur zhing /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing /
36b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du
36b3(khri brgyad): byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /
36b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po dag mthong bar gyur la/de dag gi drung na slob pa'i tshe/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /
36b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab bsgom pa dag yod de/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na 'khor de nas 'gro bar
36b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na gus pa med pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung nas
36b7(khri brgyad): 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa de dag ni 'di nyid du'ang 'dus te/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na
37a1(khri brgyad): 'gro bar byed pa dag yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
37a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa na phyir song bar gyur la/da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na'ang de dag phyir 'gro bar byed cing /lus dang
37a3(khri brgyad): sems kyi tshogs par mi byed pas/de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las sogs par 'gyur te/de dag gis shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las byas
37a4(khri brgyad): shing bsags pa des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na spong bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs paso//
37a5(khri brgyad): 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang spangs par gyur la/de dag gis rnam
37a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba byas shing bsags pa de dang /chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags
37a7(khri brgyad): pa des lo mang po dang /lo brgya phrag mang po dang /lo stong phrag mang po dang /lo 'bum phrag mang po dang /lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po'i bar du
37b1(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba rnams su sreg par 'gyur ro//de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /de dag sems
37b2(khri brgyad): can du myal ba chen po rnams nas/sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba na/mes 'jig pa 'am/chus 'jig pa 'am/rlung gis 'jig pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/
37b3(khri brgyad): te/de dag der 'jig pa dag byung ba na/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams gang yin pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro//de dag der skyes
37b4(khri brgyad): nas kyang /sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/sems
37b5(khri brgyad): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ste/yang 'jig pa byung ba na de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro//de dag
37b6(khri brgyad): tu'ang gang gi tshe 'jig pa byung ba na de dag shar phyogs su 'phen par 'gyur/lho dang nub dang byang dang phyogs mtshams rnams dang /'og drang steng gi phyogs rnams kyi
37b7(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'phen por 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jog pa byung ba na/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi
38a1(khri brgyad): /sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'phen par 'gyur ro//'jug rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang 'jig pa byung ba na/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las
38a2(khri brgyad): ma zad pas/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/yang 'di nyid du skye bar 'gyur zhing /de dag yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas sems
38a3(khri brgyad): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de rnams su skyes pa na'ang /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams
38a4(khri brgyad): nyams su myong bar 'gyurwa zhing /ji srid du 'jig pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dri srid du/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//'jig
38a5(khri brgyad): pa byung ba na'ang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du yang nas yang du phyogs
38a6(khri brgyad): bcu kun gyi dud 'gro'i rtse gnas rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro//yang dang yang du phyogs bcu kun gyi gshin rje'i 'jog rten rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur te/de dag tu
38a7(khri brgyad): skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag myong bas/las zad par byed par 'gyur ro//de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas/las zad par byas nas/jis
38b1(khri brgyad): rgyal mir skye ba 'thob par 'gyur na'ang chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der dmus long gi
38b2(khri brgyad): khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//gdol pa'i khyim rnams sam/g.yung po'i khyim rnams sam/ma rabs kyi khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//de dag tu skyes na'ang long ba
38b3(khri brgyad): rnams su 'gyur ba 'am/zhar ba rnams sram/lce med pa rnams sam/lag po med pa rnams sam/rkang pa med pa rnams samo/rna ba med pa rnams sam/sna med pa rnams
38b4(khri brgyad): sam/grang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos pAr mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra
38b5(khri brgyad): thos par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis
38b6(khri brgyad): pa lnga po dag ni/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du'ang mi mchi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
38b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na bzlog par sems shing /de dag 'di skad du 'di ni chos ma yin 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin 'di ni ston pa'i bka' ma yin//
39a1(khri brgyad): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs//
39a2(khri brgyad): mi gsung gsung bar mi 'gyur ba yin gyis/'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer zhing /de bdag gis kyang bzlog par bya'o snyam du sems la/sems can gzhan
39a3(khri brgyad): dag kyang 'bral bar 'gyur bar byed/de rang gi sems kyi rgyud la'ang gnod pa byas nas/gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la'ang gnod pa bya bar sems/de rang gi sems kyi
39a4(khri brgyad): rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byas nas/gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byed par 'gyur/de bdag kyang chud gzon cing gzhan yang chud gzon par
39a5(khri brgyad): 'dod/de bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma rtogs shing mi shes pas zlog par sems la gzhan dag kyang dri bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur bar byed pas
39a6(khri brgyad): na/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i lus byos shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du 'dra mi 'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya ste/shA ri'i bu ngas ni gang zag de lta bu dag zos par
39a7(khri brgyad): bya bar yang ma gnang na/blta ba lta ci smos te gnas su lta ga la rung /de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni chos sun 'byin pa yin par rig
39b1(khri brgyad): par bya zhing /shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni shing rul pa lta bu dang nag po'i rang bzhin can yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu gang dag gang zag de lta bu de
39b2(khri brgyad): dag la dad cing mnyan par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gang nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun 'byin pa'i
39b3(khri brgyad): gang zag de ni chos sun 'byin par byed par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag
39b4(khri brgyad): der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad ni bka' ma stsal lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu chos sun 'byin par byed po'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i
39b5(khri brgyad): lus kyi tshad ni zhog cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad thos na/ji tsam du chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus
39b6(khri brgyad): thob pa'i tshad de ni de 'dra ste/de la de 'dra ba'i skyon de yod do zhes kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'am/'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal
39b7(khri brgyad): du 'gyur ba 'am thos na mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba 'am/'dam bu sngon po brngas pa ltar skam zhing rnyid par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
40a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu lnga/de'i lus kyi tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes skabs dbye bra ma mdzad do//shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyis
40a2(khri brgyad): phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de/chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag rnams de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes//
40a3(khri brgyad): slad ma'i skye bo rnams la snang ba bgyid par 'gyur ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i
40a4(khri brgyad): bu de ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rdzogs par byas shing bsags pa des/de srid du sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing //
40a5(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal de'i tshad med de/mang ba dang yun de srid du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ba yin
40a6(khri brgyad): no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis dkar po'i rang bzhin can gyi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug
40a7(khri brgyad): las de dag las ldog par 'gyur te/bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang 'phrad du 'ong ngo zhes de dag srog gi slad du'ang dam pa'i chos spang bar mi bgyid
40b1(khri brgyad): lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi snga 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos spong ba'i ngag gi las bgyis shing
40b2(khri brgyad): bsags pa des ni/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyid cing sogs par 'gyur bas/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag cag sdug
40b3(khri brgyad): bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang phrad dam/de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngam/chos mi thos sam/dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur mi byed dam/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs
40b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba 'am/mi dbul po rnams su skye ba 'am/tshig bzung bar mi 'os par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes/lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi las rnams legs
40b5(khri brgyad): par bsdam par bgyi ljags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mi blun po gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhing /
40b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sun dbyed bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag ni ngag gis las byas shing bsags pa des/chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byed cing
40b7(khri brgyad): sogs par 'gyur te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun dbyung ba byas shing /bzlog pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/byang chub la sun dbyung
41a1(khri brgyad): bar byas shing bzlog pa yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dbyung bar byas shing bzlog pas ni/'das pa dang /ma
41a2(khri brgyad): byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sun dbyung bar byas shing bzlog pa yin no//rnam pa thams
41a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid sun dbyung ba byas shing bzlog pa ni/cho snga bzlog pa yin no//chos bzlog pas ni dge 'dun bzlog pa yin no//dge 'dun bzlog pas ni 'jig
41a4(khri brgyad): rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /'jig rten las 'dras pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog pa yin no//de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
41a5(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
41a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag bzlog pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzlog pas bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med
41a7(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa dag yongs su bzung ba yin no//bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po yongs su bzung ba des/sdug bsngal dang /yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs
41b1(khri brgyad): med dpag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi blun po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
41b2(khri brgyad): bzlog par bgyid pa de dag rnam pa du zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzlog par bgyid pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
41b3(khri brgyad): mi blun po de dag ni rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri bzlog par byed de/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste mi blun po de dag bdud kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang //
41b4(khri brgyad): chos zab mo rnams la mos pa med cing /dad pa ma rnyed po dang /de dgra sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas/phung po lnga la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /mi blun po
41b5(khri brgyad): de dag nyes pa spyod cing /bdag la bstod pa dang /gzhan la spyod pa yin te/rab 'byor mi blun po de dag ni rnam pa de bzhi dang ldan pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41b6(khri brgyad): zab mo 'dri bzlog par byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral
41b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /sdig pa'i grogs pos sug par mchis pa dag gi mos par dka' ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/
42a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa rnams dang /sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams
42a2(khri brgyad): kyis mos par dka' ba yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags//
42a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i
42a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes
42a5(khri brgyad): po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i
42a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
42a7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o///
42b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings
42b2(khri brgyad): ma grolnga ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nang stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/nang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar/
42b3(khri brgyad): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro///
42b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor dran pa nyi bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag
42b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam
42b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lam dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni lam yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
42b7(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i
43a1(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzugs
43a2(khri brgyad): kyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor
43a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' no mA bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i
43a4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzugs phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma
43a5(khri brgyad): grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
43a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bur gyi phyi ma'i mtho' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyi ma'i
43a7(khri brgyad): mtha'i dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzugs da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de
43b1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
43b2(khri brgyad): rnam por shes pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin
43b3(khri brgyad): ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams
43b4(khri brgyad): dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams dang /sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa rnams dang /bdud kyi dbang du mchis pa rnams dang /le lo can rnams dang //
43b5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams dang /bsgyud ngas pa rnams dang /shes bzhin can ma lags pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
43b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/de de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang /shes bzhin can ma yin pa'i
43b7(khri brgyad): bar dag gis mos par dka' ba yin no//rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du
44a1(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brla du rnam par dag
44a2(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/
44a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o//'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
44a5(khri brgyad): rnam par drag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o//'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag po'o//shes rab kyi
44a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /'bras bu rnam
44a7(khri brgyad): par dag pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni gnyis su med de/
44b1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//shes
44b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab
44b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin po rnam par dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de
44b4(khri brgyad): ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis
44b5(khri brgyad): su med de/gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//gzugs
44b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dgra pa grang yin pa de ni/bdag rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na bdag rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer
44b7(khri brgyad): med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//sems can dang /srog dang /shes pa po dang //mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam par dag po dang //
45a1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag
45a2(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
45a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
45a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//de bzhin du zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnam par dag pas/
45a5(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bor du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam
45a6(khri brgyad): par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor
45a7(khri brgyad): gzhan yang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnam par dag pas/gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par
45b1(khri brgyad): dag pa ste/de ltar na 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
45b2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa 'di ni/gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing /tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang ma rig pa rnam par dag pas/'du byed
45b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o//'du byed rnam par dag pas/rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o//de bzhin du ming drong gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//skye mched drugo
45b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o//reg po rnam par dag pa'o//tshor ba rnam par dag pa'o//sred pa rnam par dag pa'o//len pa rnam par dag pa'o//srid pa rnam par dag pa'o///
45b5(khri brgyad): skye ba rnam par dag pa'o//skye ba rnam par dag pas/rga shi rnam par dag pa'o//rga shi rnam par dag pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//sbyin pa'i
45b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam por dag pas/bzod pa'i pha rol
45b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
46a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnam par dag pas/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/shes
46a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/nung stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//nang stong pa nyid rnam par
46a3(khri brgyad): dag pas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/dran pa nye bar bzhag
46a4(khri brgyad): pa rnams rnam par dag pa'o//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub
46a5(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam rnam par dag pa'o//lam rnam par dag pas/thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//thams cad shes pa nyid rnam
46a6(khri brgyad): par dag pas/stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'o//stobs bcu rnam par dag pas/mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'o//mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas//
46a7(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad
46b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de
46b2(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi drad de bcud du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o///
46b3(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /
46b4(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//de
46b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa
46b6(khri brgyad): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//gzugs rnam
46b7(khri brgyad): par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /gzugs rnam par
47a1(khri brgyad): dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mI dad de bcad du med do//
47a2(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o///
47a3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o//stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /
47a4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na phung
47a5(khri brgyad): po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi
47a6(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par
47a7(khri brgyad): dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam par dag pas/'dus ma byas rnam par dag
47b1(khri brgyad): pa'o//'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa dang /'dus ma byas rnam par
47b2(khri brgyad): dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do//rab 'byor gzhan
47b3(khri brgyad): yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/mi 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o//ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/'das pa rnam par dag pa'o//da ltar byung ba rnam por dag
47b4(khri brgyad): pas/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o//'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar na 'das pa
47b5(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa dang /ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med do///
47b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la//
47b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 'di ni zab lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu
48a1(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab bo//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags/bcom
48a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
48a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /namra mkha'i khams
48a4(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid shin tu rnam par
48a5(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol
48a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a7(khri brgyad): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thob pa yin no//nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
48b1(khri brgyad): du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
48b2(khri brgyad): rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams
48b3(khri brgyad): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//byang chub shin tu rnam par dag pa
48b4(khri brgyad): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni snang ba
48b5(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//shA ri'i bus gsolnga pa/bcom
48b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das grang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rnam
48b7(khri brgyad): par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no///
49a1(khri brgyad): mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par
49a2(khri brgyad): dag pa ni snang ba yin no//gzugs dang /sgo dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//sa'i
49a3(khri brgyad): khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par
49a4(khri brgyad): dag pa ni snang ba yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang //
49a5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//nang stong pa nyid shin
49a6(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par drag pa ni snang ba yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang
49a7(khri brgyad): ba yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po
49b1(khri brgyad): dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so
49b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
49b3(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni/nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis
49b4(khri brgyad): pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang nying mtshams
49b5(khri brgyad): sbyor ba ma mchis pas/rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs 'pho ba med pas/nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni
49b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus
49b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam
50a1(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas/rnam par dag pa lags
50a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad
50a3(khri brgyad): namakhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa
50a4(khri brgyad): ni thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus
50a5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
50a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs la thob pa med pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
50a7(khri brgyad): la thob pa med pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par ma
50b1(khri brgyad): grub pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par
50b2(khri brgyad): grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir/rnam par dag pa
50b3(khri brgyad): yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par
50b4(khri brgyad): dag pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/
50b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs
50b6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khams su mi skye lags so//bcom ldan 'das
50b7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsol pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye
51a1(khri brgyad): ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o//
51a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
51a3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba
51a4(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o//shA
51a5(khri brgyad): ri'i dus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par
51a6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir ro//shA rI'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
51a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu chos bam po nyid kyi phyir/rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma
51b1(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA rI'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gastsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
51b2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dge bas gzugs mi
51b3(khri brgyad): shes so//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni tshor bA dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal
51b4(khri brgyad): ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol po/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par
51b5(khri brgyad): drag pas/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan
51b6(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/tshor po dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi shes so//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan
51b7(khri brgyad): 'das rnam par dag pa ni chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i
52a1(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba ldugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
52a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi shes so//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
52a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
52a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA rI'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
52a5(khri brgyad): nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi
52a6(khri brgyad): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phyin par yang mi byed/gnod par yang mi byed do//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom
52a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin por mi bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
52b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang
52b2(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan
52b3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so//
52b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/bdag rnam
52b5(khri brgyad): par dag pas/gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa ni shin tu
52b6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
52b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa rnam par dag po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
53a1(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa shin tu
53a2(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
53a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sbyin pa'i pha
53a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus
53a5(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dran pa nye bar
53a6(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
53a7(khri brgyad): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/de
53b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs
53b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
53b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
53b4(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag
53b5(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lan cig
53b6(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
53b7(khri brgyad): po/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/bdag rnam par dag pas/rgyun du zhugs
54a1(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang /bdag rnam par dag pas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra
54a2(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
54a3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
54a4(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/byang chub rnam par dag pa lags//
54a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag
54a6(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//
54a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan
54b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes pa ma rnyed ma stor ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing /rnam par dag
54b2(khri brgyad): pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
54b3(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing /rnam par dag pa thob pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa ma
54b4(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
54b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag mu mA mchis pa'i slad du/gzugs mu ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin
54b6(khri brgyad): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/bdag mu ma mchis pas/gzugs mu ma mchis shing rnam par
54b7(khri brgyad): dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab
55a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
55a2(khri brgyad): pa mu ma mchis pa logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
55a3(khri brgyad): 'dus ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam por shes pa mu ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa legs//
55a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor
55a5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//
55a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/de
55a7(khri brgyad): ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
55b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes
55b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi 'gram mamra/pha rol gyi 'gram mamra/gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
55b3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
55b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/pha rol gyi 'gram mA ma/gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
55b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
55b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du shes su bgyid na/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55b7(khri brgyad): pa gsog tu bgyid pa lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor legs so legs
56a1(khri brgyad): so//rab 'byor de de bzhin te de de bzhin no//ming du'ang chags/mtshan mar yang chags te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa
56a2(khri brgyad): ming med pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du'ang chags pa lags/mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
56a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du'ang 'dzin par byed//
56a4(khri brgyad): mtshan mar yang 'dzin par byed cing /ming dang mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
56a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la rlom sems su byed pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di
56a6(khri brgyad): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang /chags pa dang /ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing shin
56a7(khri brgyad): tu mthor gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
56b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni gang yin/ma chags pa ni gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe
56b2(khri brgyad): dod ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags
56b3(khri brgyad): pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//khroms rnams dang /skye mched
56b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la'ang de bzhin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//de bzhin du tshul
56b5(khri brgyad): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsdam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//de bzhin
56b6(khri brgyad): du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
56b7(khri brgyad): stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
57a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
57a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chagaso pa yin no//ma 'ongs pa'i chos
57a3(khri brgyad): rnams la ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams lo/da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin
57a4(khri brgyad): no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems drapa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin
57a5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
57a6(khri brgyad): na chags pa yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan log
57a7(khri brgyad): dang /lam rnams la spyod na chags pa yin no//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
57b1(khri brgyad): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
57b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mo tshugs pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas
57b3(khri brgyad): pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du gzugs kyis gzugs kun tu mi shes so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
57b4(khri brgyad): shes pas rnam par shes po kun tu mi shes so//'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so//ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis mu 'ongs pa'i
57b5(khri brgyad): chos rnams kun tu mi shes so//da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so snyam du mi sems so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/byang
57b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa
57b7(khri brgyad): nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las
58a1(khri brgyad): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa
58a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rang gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
58a3(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du/bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//'di la sbyin par bya'o//'di sbyin par bya'o zhe 'am/de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims
58a4(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab bsgom por bya'o//shes rab 'od bsgom par bya'o//shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o/
58a5(khri brgyad): zhe 'am/bdag ni bsod nams spel bar byed pa'o//bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o//bsod nams 'di ltar spel bar bya'o zhe 'am/bdag ni byang chub sems dpo'i
58a6(khri brgyad): skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o//bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o//bdag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o//bdag ni rnam pa
58a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o snyam du mi sems te/tshe dong ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa
58b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la ni de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
58b2(khri brgyad): po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma tshags pa yin no//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
58b3(khri brgyad): smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'di la
58b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpas sems su kun tu shes pa dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab tu kun tu
58b5(khri brgyad): shes pa dang /nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu shes pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
58b6(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun tu shes pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun tu shes pa dang /sangs
58b7(khri brgyad): rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/brtul cing gzhal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
59a1(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/des ni chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
59a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kr-i shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi rlung bzhin ni yongs su sngo bar mi nus la/kau shI ka tsho rU ba dang /'du shes dang /
59a3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus shing /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin
59a4(khri brgyad): yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang /
59a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par
59a6(khri brgyad): bstan par bya/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
59a7(khri brgyad): pa la spyod po'i tshe/ci nas kyang bdag ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o//bdag ni tshul khrim so srung ba'o//bdag ni bzod pa sbom po'o//bdog ni brtson 'grus
59b1(khri brgyad): rtsom pa'o//bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o//bdag ni shes rab sgom pa'o//bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o//bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
59b2(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o//bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o//bdag ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o snyam du rnam par rtog par mi
59b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag por bstan par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar gzhan dag la yang drag par ston pa dang /yang dag par 'dzin
59b4(khri brgyad): du 'jug pa dang /yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni/bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/de dag la'ang sangs rgyas
59b5(khri brgyad): kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pas yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gzhan dag la
59b6(khri brgyad): yang drug par bstan par bya/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu
59b7(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spang bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
60a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i mtha' de dag bstun pa legs so legs so//rab 'byor/
60a2(khri brgyad): chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par byas/de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
60a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
60a4(khri brgyad): stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/de bzhin
60a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na/rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
60a6(khri brgyad): thugs dang po bskyed pa nus nye bar bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
60a7(khri brgyad): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ji srid du dam po'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan
60b1(khri brgyad): mar yid la byed cing /yid la byas nas kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed
60b2(khri brgyad): pa de tsam du chags pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang /de las gzhan pa sems con
60b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan
60b4(khri brgyad): mur yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba me yin la/de dag los gzhan pa rnams
60b5(khri brgyad): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
60b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir
60b7(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
61a1(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par
61a2(khri brgyad): mi nus so//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
61a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/gcig tu zad do//rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma
61a4(khri brgyad): yin no//gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o//gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
61a5(khri brgyad): de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang /rang bzhin ma yin pa dang /mi byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na tshogs pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs
61a6(khri brgyad): pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
61a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos shing bye brag ma phyed de/rnam par ma shes la mngon par rdzogs
61b1(khri brgyad): par khrod du ma chud pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so//bcom ldan
61b2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang mi shes pa ste/gzugs kyis mi shos so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
61b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pas mi shes so//khams dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyis mi shes so//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
61b4(khri brgyad): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mi shes so//stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag por rig pa
61b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mi shes so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/chos thams cad rnam par dag par bstan
61b6(khri brgyad): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'ongs la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
61b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams
62a1(khri brgyad): cad dmigs su med par byed pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
62a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
62a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
62a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing
62a5(khri brgyad): 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi
62a6(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dgra la mi
62a7(khri brgyad): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
62b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no//gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /sdug ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya
62b2(khri brgyad): bor mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du gal te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar mi
62b3(khri brgyad): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /sdug ces bya
62b4(khri brgyad): bo dang /mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba
62b5(khri brgyad): 'am/bdag gam/bdag med po 'am//sdug pa'am/mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/gang rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba
62b6(khri brgyad): 'am/bdag gam/bdag med pa 'am//sdug pa'am/mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang med cing //
62b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gang rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam/bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am/mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam
63a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
63a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mo spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de
63a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'o ma yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi
63a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na//
63a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes
63a6(khri brgyad): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/sheso rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs
63a7(khri brgyad): su rdzogs pa'am/yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi sbed na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
63b1(khri brgyad): yin zhing /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
63b2(khri brgyad): bar ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la//
63b3(khri brgyad): tshwa dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang /chags pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag/bcom ldan 'das
63b4(khri brgyad): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de
63b5(khri brgyad): bzhin no de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
63b6(khri brgyad): chags pa dang /ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
63b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshe/gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
64a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi
64a2(khri brgyad): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du rno ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
64a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no///
64a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
64a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
64a6(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor
64a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
64b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
64b2(khri brgyad): med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang bla na med
64b3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
64b4(khri brgyad): stong pa/bam po nyi shu dgu po//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo
64b5(khri brgyad): 'di bshad kyang 'phel bla ma mchis la/ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa dri ni ngo mtshar lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
64b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bshad kyang 'phel ba med la ma bshad
64b7(khri brgyad): kyang 'grib pa med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs
65a1(khri brgyad): shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa dang /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang /nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/
65a2(khri brgyad): bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/nam mkha' ni bsngags kyang 'phel ba med la/ma bsngags kyang 'grib pa med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
65a3(khri brgyad): dper na/sgyu ma'i skyes bu la nr-i bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su
65a4(khri brgyad): chags pa med bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang bshad kyang de bzhin la/ma bshad
65a5(khri brgyad): kyang de bzhin no rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes
65a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
65a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
65b1(khri brgyad): sgom pa de ni nam mkha' sgom pa lags te/nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
