65b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma mchis/nam mkha' la ni gzugs kyang ma
65b3(khri brgyad): mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis/dngos po med pa'i ngo//
65b4(khri brgyad): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po
65b5(khri brgyad): dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams kyang ma mchis/nam mkha' la ni stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par
65b6(khri brgyad): rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong
65b7(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis
66a1(khri brgyad): pa'i spyad du'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/
66a2(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang /'bad par 'tshal ba dang /rtsol bar 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du
66a3(khri brgyad): go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis nam
66a4(khri brgyad): mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi skad du/go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba lcags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad
66a5(khri brgyad): du/go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal bya lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
66a6(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi skad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgyu bar 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
66a7(khri brgyad): pa thob pa legs te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so//
66b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gal te spyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis/'di lta ste dper bgyi na 'dam bu'i
66b2(khri brgyad): tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal lam/bu ram shing gi tshal lam/mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/til gyi zhing ltar yongs su bltams par gyur cing /de bzhin gshegs pa de
66b3(khri brgyad): dag gis bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/grangs ma mchis pa
66b4(khri brgyad): dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang /bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa 'am 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
66b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang /sems can dben pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rI re rarA yang //
66b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/'dam bu'i tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal lam bu ra mo shing gi tshal lam/mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/til gyi zhing
66b7(khri brgyad): ltar yongs su bltams par gyur cing bzhugs la/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas/de
67a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang /bcom ldan 'das sems
67a2(khri brgyad): can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa 'am 'phel bar mi mngon lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang /sems can dben
67a3(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/bdag gis 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du//
67a4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya b.ro 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba lags so zhes
67a5(khri brgyad): gsol to//de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te 'di lta ste/chos gang yang skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang yod/shes rab
67a6(khri brgyad): kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'ang yod/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
67a7(khri brgyad): bu'ang yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub kyang yod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
67b1(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yang yod/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod
67b2(khri brgyad): pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
67b3(khri brgyad): so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin//
67b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shaM ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la
67b5(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
67b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba
67b7(khri brgyad): dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka khyod kyi gang la bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag
68a1(khri brgyad): par rjes su mthong ngam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gang lnga bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bya ba'i chos de ni kho
68a2(khri brgyad): bros yang drug par rjes su ma mthong ngo //rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
68a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'dri la gnas na 'di nyid de la srung ba dang /skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro//ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/de la mi
68a4(khri brgyad): dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
68a5(khri brgyad): gang zhig bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i la bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang sba bar sems pa yin no//kau shI ka 'di ji
68a6(khri brgyad): snyam du sems khyod kyi sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /rmi lam dang brag cha dang /mig yor drag bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar nus snyam mam/brgya byin gyis smras
68a7(khri brgyad): pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
68b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang /sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang /ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad
68b2(khri brgyad): drodo//kr-i shau ka 'di ji snyam du sems khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dag bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar nus snyam mam/brgya/
68b3(khri brgyad): byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
68b4(khri brgyad): rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang /ngal ba'i skul ba can du 'gyur
68b5(khri brgyad): bar zad do//kau shau ka 'di ji snyam du sems khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag po'i mtha' dang /de bzhin nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang /
68b6(khri brgyad): bskyab pa dang sba bar nus snyam mam/brgya byin gyis smras po/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub
68b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa
69a1(khri brgyad): /dang /ngam bya'i skal btsun du 'gyur bar byed //brgya sbyin gyis smras pa btsun par ba 'gro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa gas/
69a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/hrImi gyis na chos thams cang rmil ma lta bu dang /sgyum lta bu dang /srog rgyu lta bu dang brag rgyu lta bu dang mig yor lta
69a3(khri brgyad): dang /chos thams cad sbrul po lta bur yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing /de ltar yongs su shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams mi
69a4(khri brgyad): lam du nom sems su mi byed/rmi lam dag go zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rnam
69a5(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed cing /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa dag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byeng /sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/
69a6(khri brgyad): sprul pa'i natshon mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
69a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs bdag gis zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs la rlom sems su mi
69b1(khri brgyad): byed/gzugs k+Shi mtshanA mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed /rmi lam dag gis zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/rmi khyim la/
69b2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom
69b3(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa'i mtshan ma ro yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
69b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byeng/
69b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying
69b6(khri brgyad): bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom
69b7(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed na/rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyi
70a1(khri brgyad): mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa bdag ga zhes bya bar rlom snyoms su mi byed/
70a2(khri brgyad): AlA pa la rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin na//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
70a3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'drin rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul
70a4(khri brgyad): dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs 'khor dang /gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
70a5(khri brgyad): thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'thor zhing /bcom ldan 'das ga la bri der dang ste/lcags
70a6(khri brgyad): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /brgya byin
70a7(khri brgyad): dang /tshangs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang /ming 'di dag nyid
70b1(khri brgyad): kyis chos ston cing /sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di
70b2(khri brgyad): nyid yongs su zhu ba dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu bo dag bsams par gyur to//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /
70b3(khri brgyad): byang dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs mtshams kun na'ang sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing /sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge
70b4(khri brgyad): slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang /lha'i dbang po brgya
70b5(khri brgyad): byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsams par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
70b6(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang
70b7(khri brgyad): sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro//gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
71a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sa phyogs 'di nyid du
71a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
71a3(khri brgyad): to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
71a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa gang dag dang rtags gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ba legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
71a5(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
71a6(khri brgyad): nas/gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
71a7(khri brgyad): gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /gzugs sdug ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs
71b1(khri brgyad): bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag
71b2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /rnam par shes po sdug
71b3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang /grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs 'das
71b4(khri brgyad): pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang
71b5(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar
71b6(khri brgyad): byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang /grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de nas
71b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa
72a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
72a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
72a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
72a4(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
72a5(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
72a6(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no///
72a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
72b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed
72b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
72b3(khri brgyad): bapa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs skye ba
72b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni/gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor tshor ba dang //
72b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam
72b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs
72b7(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
73a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad
73a2(khri brgyad): du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' ni skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med
73a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa ste/rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
73a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha'i gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
73a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' bzung du med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
73a6(khri brgyad): su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' bzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
73a7(khri brgyad): dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab
73b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
73b2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/brag cha gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du/rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
73b3(khri brgyad): dag pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
73b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/
73b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/de ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab
73b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor
73b7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan
74a1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni ci'ang dmigs su med do//rab 'byor de ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
74a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag
74a3(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
74a4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang //
74a5(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad
74a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bAr du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam
74a7(khri brgyad): par byed ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /dmigs su med pa
74b1(khri brgyad): dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
74b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa
74b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan
74b4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol
74b5(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
74b6(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so//rno ba'i nad dang /sna'i nad dang /lce'i nad dang /lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags
74b7(khri brgyad): so//yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so//yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so//lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lags so//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
75a1(khri brgyad): bla ma de dag gisadun du 'gram par po 'gyur ba gsas nga ban du mas nyan pa tshal pa lta nga dag pang po dag pa khrang ba shA
75a2(khri brgyad): lags su//rgyamatshan zin das kyi skye rnams dang /gnas gtsang gA'i ris kyi bar gyi lharnams kyang mang bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//gang rnye pa pa'i
75a3(khri brgyad): smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dgra nas brgyad dang /bcu she dang /bcoM sna dag la shes rab kyi phra ral tu sbyin pa 'di skye bar bgyid pa da gA'i tshogs
75a4(khri brgyad): bdag 'du bar 'gyur lags so//rigs kyi bu'i ma rags kyi bum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa 'di ska bar bgyid pa de ni bsad nams mang du smad para'
75a5(khri brgyad): /bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/grang sa ma mchis/bAsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das smos
75a6(khri brgyad): 'astsal pa/rab byor de de bzhin na dang bzhin te/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos brgyad dang /bcu pan dang /bcoM lnga dag la lha'i 'khor ni 'dzun
75a7(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pa la tu phyir pa smra bar byed pa de ni bas rnams dpag tu meng /grangs med/bas mi gyis mi khyad/gnas du me/brjod du za dbang ga skye
75b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin pa
75b2(khri brgyad): tsheche 'di la brten na sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro//gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar 'gyur ro//mi
75b3(khri brgyad): dbul po las thar par 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar
75b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//'du shes med 'du shes
75b5(khri brgyad): med min skye mchod du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o//lan cig
75b6(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed
75b7(khri brgyad): po yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te/de la brten nas/rgyal rigs shing
76a1(khri brgyad): sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams
76a2(khri brgyad): yod pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang
76a3(khri brgyad): byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang /tshangs pa'i mdun ni 'don rnams yod pa dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal
76a4(khri brgyad): dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom snang dang
76a5(khri brgyad): mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min gyi lho rnams dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye
76a6(khri brgyad): mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang //lan cig phyir 'ong
76a7(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'di ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang /
76b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
76b2(khri brgyad): pa yod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /dran pa nye bor bzhag pa rnams
76b3(khri brgyad): yod pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams yod pa dang /nang stong
76b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid yod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang /stobs bcu yod pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
76b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
76b6(khri brgyad): las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/de'i phyir 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o//rab
76b7(khri brgyad): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni skye ba 'am/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam por byang ba 'am/yongs su bzung ba 'am/dor ba'i chos
77a1(khri brgyad): gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar gang dag skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byung ba 'am/yongs su bzung
77a2(khri brgyad): ba'am 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/dge ba'am/mi dge ba'am/zag pa dang
77a3(khri brgyad): bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba 'am/kho na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/nyon
77a4(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do//rab 'byor
77a5(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nor bu rin po che yin te/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no//de ci'i
77a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin
77a7(khri brgyad): no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/de ltararo 'du shes par yang mi byed/de ltar
77b1(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed/de ltar smos par yang mi byed na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
77b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lnga bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo
77b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang /sems can rnams yongs
77b4(khri brgyad): su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ston par
77b5(khri brgyad): byed pa ma yin/'dzin par byed pa ma yin/sbyin par byed pa ma yin/skyed par byed pa ma yin/'gog par byed pa ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin//
77b6(khri brgyad): rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/'grib par byed pa ma yin/'phel bar byed pa ma yin/'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma
77b7(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin/gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin//
78a1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin/gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha
78a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi
78a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/dngos po med
78a4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar
78a5(khri brgyad): byed pa'ang ma yin/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams sbyin par
78a6(khri brgyad): byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
78a7(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin
78b1(khri brgyad): par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas
78b2(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
78b3(khri brgyad): sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/nyan thos dang /rang
78b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma
78b5(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no//'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin
78b6(khri brgyad): par byed pa'ang ma yin/'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung //
78b7(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/mngon par rdzogs
79a1(khri brgyad): parA sangs rgyas shing /mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang /gsung ba dang /rnam par 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /ston par mdzad pa'i
79a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro//de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ca co dang /ga zha 'don cing /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da
79a3(khri brgyad): dong /pad+ma dkar po dang /man+dA ra bdag gis gtor nas/'di skad du/a la la dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo //zhes tshig
79a4(khri brgyad): tu'ang brjod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas
79a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
79a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba 'am/ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa'ang
79a7(khri brgyad): ma yin/gcig pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par
79b1(khri brgyad): bgyi ba 'am/ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
79b2(khri brgyad): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong do//de bzhin du bsdam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin
79b3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med
79b4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni don pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
79b5(khri brgyad): pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams ni lam gyis stong ngo //stobs bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo //mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
79b6(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni
79b7(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas
80a1(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
80a2(khri brgyad): ste/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
80a3(khri brgyad): gyis stong la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
80a4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang /chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing /chos kyi 'khor lo'ang skor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid
80a5(khri brgyad): pa'am/ldog par bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te/chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'ang ma mchis la/chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba'ang ma mchis lags so//
80a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gang 'jug pa'am/ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa
80a7(khri brgyad): lags pas stong pa nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'ang 'jug par bgyid
80b1(khri brgyad): pa'am/ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so//de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang /rab tu bstan pa dang /brjod pa dang /gdags pa dang /'jug
80b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /rnam par 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /smos pa dang /gsal bar bgyid pa dang /yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
80b3(khri brgyad): bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan/sus kyang ma bzung lags so//gang sus kyang ma bstan sus
80b4(khri brgyad): kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyid lags so//gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung /sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan
80b5(khri brgyad): las 'das pa su'ang ma mchis te/chos bstan pa 'di la su'ang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las
80b6(khri brgyad): gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu rtswa bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
80b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam
81a1(khri brgyad): mkha' med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid
81a2(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa//
81a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las
81a4(khri brgyad): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma
81a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
81a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ming med pa dang lus med pa'i
81a7(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so//bcom
81b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
81b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su
81b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so//
81b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalA pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
81b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
81b6(khri brgyad): pa/chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
81b7(khri brgyad): mi 'phrogs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
82a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bas pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/chos thams cad
82a2(khri brgyad): shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma
82a3(khri brgyad): mchis po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
82a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byed
82a5(khri brgyad): pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma
82a6(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
82a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs su
82b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so//
82b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
82b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
82b4(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag cha lta bu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po//
82b5(khri brgyad): sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor
82b6(khri brgyad): lta bu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
82b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
83a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so//bcom
83a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a3(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
83a4(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lagos so//bcom
83a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
83a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi
83a7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa
83b1(khri brgyad): lulags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
83b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
83b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das
83b4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
83b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//rab
83b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
83b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
84a1(khri brgyad): 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byung
84a2(khri brgyad): chub par byed pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na kun nas ldang ba ma mchis
84a3(khri brgyad): pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
84a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid
84a5(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so//bcom
84a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro///
84b1(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po sum cu pa//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
84b2(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
84b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
84b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can
84b5(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di
84b6(khri brgyad): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba
84b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa
85a1(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
85a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'dres pa
85a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyi sku gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa
85a4(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
85a5(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
85a6(khri brgyad): pa/rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
85a7(khri brgyad): ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
85b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams
85b2(khri brgyad): cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
85b3(khri brgyad): rtag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
85b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os
85b5(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so//
85b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
85b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir
86a1(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
86a2(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
86a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i
86a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan
86a5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi dang nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab
86a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan
86b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86b2(khri brgyad): phyiphyen pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis stsol pa/chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
86b3(khri brgyad): po/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/don
86b4(khri brgyad): dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
86b5(khri brgyad): 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
86b6(khri brgyad): 'dras 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus ma byas stong
86b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das
87a1(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
87a2(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
87a3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
87a5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
87a6(khri brgyad): pa/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
87a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab
87b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
87b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
87b4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
87b5(khri brgyad): pa/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
87b6(khri brgyad): ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
87b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
88a1(khri brgyad): pa/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
88a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/lus dang /tshor ba dang /sems
88a3(khri brgyad): dang /chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
88a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
88a5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
88a6(khri brgyad): sprul pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
88a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
88b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stobs lnga dmigs
88b2(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags
88b3(khri brgyad): so/|bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
88b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lom lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab
88b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lpags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
88b6(khri brgyad): pa/lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
88b7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
89a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
89a2(khri brgyad): pa/smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
89a3(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol po/bcom
89a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mthar gyis
89a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
89a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam
89a7(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so///
89b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
89b3(khri brgyad): pa/bcomo ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnod sems
89b4(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'ongs 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags
89b5(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
89b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/g.yang ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa//
89b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'chal pa'i
90a1(khri brgyad): shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
90a2(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
90a3(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lam gyi
90a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
90a5(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
90a6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
90a7(khri brgyad): pa/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
90b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag
90b2(khri brgyad): par 'das pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so///
90b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
90b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
90b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos
90b6(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub po'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes
90b7(khri brgyad): bya ste/sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi
91a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91a2(khri brgyad): 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no//gang
91a3(khri brgyad): dag 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /bzung zhing bcangs la klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub
91a4(khri brgyad): par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun
91a5(khri brgyad): chub par byed pa dang /bzung zhing bcangs la klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po dag la
91a6(khri brgyad): bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag me dngang zhing /dang
91a7(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang yongs su zhu ba byas pa yin no//
91b1(khri brgyad): gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol
91b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyad cing /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan
91b3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
91b4(khri brgyad): nunas mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang bar mi 'gyur la/'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du'ang brtson por bgyid pa'i rigs
91b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar bzung bar bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du
91b6(khri brgyad): zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma sprad pa dag gis ni/shes rab kyi pha
91b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong
92a1(khri brgyad): bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lags so//tsa
92a2(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang /dga' ba ma mchis
92a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /drang ba ma mchis pas/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
92a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi//
92a5(khri brgyad): nong stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom por bgyi/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
92a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
92a7(khri brgyad): dbang po dang /stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
92b1(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang ma so yang drug par reg pa rnams dang /snangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su nu bam bams pa'i spyang
92b2(khri brgyad): du//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//brten pa shA ri'i bu de ltar ngo mtshar yang ni tshe ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
92b3(khri brgyad): shin tu zab pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol
92b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la mos
92b5(khri brgyad): papor ma gyur pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi be ra la myos par ma gyur pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lams par ma gyur pa dang /stobs
92b6(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshes mi 'dris pa bco brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa
92b7(khri brgyad): dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar mi che'o//btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo phyag 'tshal ba de ni/rnam pa
93a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo//de nas
93a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/rnam
93a3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
93a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges par byung la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i
93a5(khri brgyad): phyir te/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//de bzhin du rnam
93a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang /bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang /
93a7(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
93b1(khri brgyad): mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
93b2(khri brgyad): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
93b3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
93b4(khri brgyad): 'byor du bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
93b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na bsam gtan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /
93b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/nang stong pa nyid la rnal
93b7(khri brgyad): 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
94a1(khri brgyad): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/de bzhin du byang chub sems
94a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig
94a3(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
94a4(khri brgyad): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so//kau shi ka khyod kyi
94a5(khri brgyad): spobs pa skyes pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang /ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems
94a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/gzugs la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin
94a7(khri brgyad): no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/rnam par
94b1(khri brgyad): shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no//de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la mi gnas te/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94b2(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor du byed do//de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams la mi gnas te/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor
94b3(khri brgyad): du byed do//de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson
94b4(khri brgyad): 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab
94b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag
94b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams
94b7(khri brgyad): dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas
95a1(khri brgyad): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//bsam gtan bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga
95a2(khri brgyad): la mi gnas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha
95a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang /de bzhin du gang la
95a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang /gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
95a5(khri brgyad): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
95a6(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
95a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/gang gi phyir gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
95b1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de bzhin
95b2(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid thams cad
95b3(khri brgyad): dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dris pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/gang gi phyir sangs rgyas
95b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems
95b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
95b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs
95b7(khri brgyad): la de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa
96a1(khri brgyad): nyid thams cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi/
96a2(khri brgyad): mthar mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
96a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi
96a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
96a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams
96a6(khri brgyad): cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de
96a7(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lags
96b1(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor
96b2(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' bo'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
96b3(khri brgyad): khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
96b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
96b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
96b6(khri brgyad): sprul pa/shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no//shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
96b7(khri brgyad): shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
97a1(khri brgyad): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
97a2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/
97a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i
97a4(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du
97a5(khri brgyad): shos dang /'du khyed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched
97a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang
