97a7(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i
97b1(khri brgyad): bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par
97b2(khri brgyad): shes pa ma yin zhing /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi
97b3(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs
97b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
97b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
97b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam por shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /
97b7(khri brgyad): rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
98a1(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
98a2(khri brgyad): pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
98a3(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel
98a4(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so
98a5(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar yang
98a6(khri brgyad): mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas
98a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/gzugs tshad med
98b1(khri brgyad): do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa yin no//de bzhin du tsho ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya
98b2(khri brgyad): par mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin la/tshor ba dang //
98b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang //
98b4(khri brgyad): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
98b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de
98b6(khri brgyad): ltar yang mi spyod pa na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa
98b7(khri brgyad): de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang /de tsam du gting
99a1(khri brgyad): dpag dka' ba dang /de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang /de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg
99a2(khri brgyad): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/
99a3(khri brgyad): skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/des
99a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing /nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos
99a5(khri brgyad): nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du zhugs
99a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/zhes pa cir 'gyur/shA ri'i bus smras pa/kau
99a7(khri brgyad): shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/skrag
99b1(khri brgyad): cing dngang la/dngang bar 'gyur zhing phyir ldog pa dang phyir spang bar 'gyur te/mos par mi 'gyur la/kau shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
99b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na phyir spong zhing /log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i las gsogs par 'gyur te/yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa
99b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99b4(khri brgyad): chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/kau shi ka
99b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par
99b6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyis bla na med pa
99b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/
100a1(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dang
100a2(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
100a3(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni/yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur
100a4(khri brgyad): byed byed pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dpe brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so///
100a5(khri brgyad): bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan
100a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
100a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i
100b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par
100b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang /bsam gtan
100b3(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
100b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing /
100b5(khri brgyad): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom
100b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa
100b7(khri brgyad): de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/'dzin pa dang /
101a1(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
101a2(khri brgyad): dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das
101a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing /rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin
101a4(khri brgyad): pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
101a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba 'am/lung bstan par 'gyur pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan
101a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag ched brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/'brog dgon pa dpag chod nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/dpag tshang
101a7(khri brgyad): sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/rapag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/de byang ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas pa lang rdzi dag
101b1(khri brgyad): gam/phyugs rdzi dag gam sa mtshams sam/kun dga' ra ba 'am/tshal dag gam/skyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/grong rdal
101b2(khri brgyad): dag gam ljongs dag gam/yul 'khor dag gam mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dge gda' ba las na/'di nas
101b3(khri brgyad): grong dang grong rdal dang grong khyer dang yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing /de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs
101b4(khri brgyad): pa'am/gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/gdol pas 'jigs pa 'am/gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa'am bkres pa dang skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags
101b5(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par
101b6(khri brgyad): bgyid 'chang bar bgyid klog par bgyid kun chub par bgyid tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan du nye
101b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi ste/byang chub sems dpa'
102a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sras 'jigs par mi bgyid lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems
102a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/snga ltas de
102a3(khri brgyad): dag mchis pa'i slad du'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to//shA ri'i bu de de bzhin na de de bzhin
102a4(khri brgyad): te/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod shin tu spobs par gyis shig/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po
102a5(khri brgyad): lta 'tshal bar gyur nas de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis na ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis pa/de lta de ltar des yal ga 'grel pa 'am/
102a6(khri brgyad): yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'amA rI'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag ring ste rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye
102a7(khri brgyad): ba ma lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga 'grel ba 'am/yal ga 'gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ri 'am ri'i mtshan
102b1(khri brgyad): ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga
102b2(khri brgyad): 'gel pa 'am/yal ga 'grel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ri 'am/ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar gyur na/de 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo snyam du sems
102b3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur lags so//da ci'i slad du zhe na/rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga 'gel pa'am/yal ga 'gel pa'i mtshan ma'am/ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma ngag mi gda' ba'i slad
102b4(khri brgyad): du'o//mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang /des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye'o//rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas
102b5(khri brgyad): thag mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar nges par rtogs lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /
102b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing /'di ltar bsam par bgyi ste/bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal
102b7(khri brgyad): pa 'di snyed cig gam/bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di skad cig gam/bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig
103a1(khri brgyad): phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes mngon sum du lung ma
103a2(khri brgyad): bstan kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba lags so snyam du rig par bgyil
103a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zlab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la thos nas kyang bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang klag pa dang /kun
103a4(khri brgyad): chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir mchis so snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na/dpyid byung ste/yal ga 'gel
103a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi lo ma dang /'dab ma lhags par gyur pa nA/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar da ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dag 'byung
103a6(khri brgyad): bAr 'gyur ro snyam du rig par bgyi lags so//de ci'i skad du zhe na/'di ltar yal ga 'gal pa rnams la snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i srang du ste/dzam+bu'i glang gi me rnams
103a7(khri brgyad): kyis yal ga 'gel pa rnams la snga ltas de dag mthong nas/'di snyam du ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam
103b1(khri brgyad): nas//yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
103b2(khri brgyad): 'di blta ba dang /mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/'chang bar bgyid/klog par bgyid/kun chub par bgyid/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
103b3(khri brgyad): na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
103b4(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de ni/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis
103b5(khri brgyad): kyang 'di snyam du/gang gi slad du bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing bltar mchis pa dang /mnyan du mchis pa dang /phyag bgyir mchis pa dang /ji
103b6(khri brgyad): skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub tu mchis pa las na/bdag cag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen
103b7(khri brgyad): pa lags so snyam du rig par bgyi lags so//de nas gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu drug 'di snyam du/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
104a1(khri brgyad): la'ang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang /ring po mi
104a2(khri brgyad): thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ra snyam nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye lags so//
104a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/bud med sbrum pa ni ji lta ji ltar bu bca' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/lus ngal ba'i tshor ba chen po skye
104a4(khri brgyad): ba dang /'chag par mi bgyid pa dang /dran pa chung ba dang /g.yar zas kyi dang chung ba dang /mugs pa dang /gnyid chung ba dang tshe rab de lta bu dag byung bas sgrub nyung
104a5(khri brgyad): bya dang /des sngon tshul bzhin me lpags pa yid la bgyis shing bstan pa dang /lan mang du bgyis shing kun tu bston pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myang
104a6(khri brgyad): ngo snyam du rtog sa nas/mi sten pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing /bud med gzhan dag gis kyang /bud med de'i mtshan ma gang legs pa de dag mthong nas/'di snyam
104a7(khri brgyad): du bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
104b1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa spyod pa legs par spyad pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
104b2(khri brgyad): pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing rnyed nas kyang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
104b3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi
104b4(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni/sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so///
104b5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
104b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sman btags pa ni ngo
104b7(khri brgyad): mtshar legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la
105a1(khri brgyad): bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
105a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dog spyad pa spyod pa na/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don
105a3(khri brgyad): mthun pa dang /don dpyod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag la phan 'dogs shing /sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang
105a4(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /bdag
105a5(khri brgyad): kyang chos de dag la gnas par byed do//bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go//
105a6(khri brgyad): bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
105a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing /thabs
105b1(khri brgyad): la mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed kyang /bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ni mi byed do//de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
105b2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la 'god par byed kyang bdag nyid kyang rang byang chub mngon sum du mi byed do//bdag kyang phyir
105b3(khri brgyad): mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god par byed do//de bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /byang chub
105b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
105b5(khri brgyad): gzhan dag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag por 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams bskyed par byed cing /gzhon dag kyang
105b6(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa rnams thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs
105b7(khri brgyad): su dag par bya ba la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag
106a1(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par
106a2(khri brgyad): bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya
106a3(khri brgyad): ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs
106a4(khri brgyad): pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
106a5(khri brgyad): rnams bsgrub par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi skyed par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par bya ba yang dag par
106a6(khri brgyad): 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skyed
106a7(khri brgyad): par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub
106b1(khri brgyad): par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go//bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed cing /gzhan
106b2(khri brgyad): dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/bdag kyang bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed cing /gzhan
106b3(khri brgyad): dag kyang bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go//bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
106b4(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing /gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya bar yang dag par 'dzin du
106b5(khri brgyad): 'jug go/bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
106b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par
106b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das
107a1(khri brgyad): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/bcom
107a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/gzugs kyi rnam par
107a3(khri brgyad): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su
107a4(khri brgyad): mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//de bzhin du khams
107a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
107a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad
107a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
107b1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/gzugs kyi yongs su 'grib pa
107b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe//
107b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
107b4(khri brgyad): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
107b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par
107b6(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang
107b7(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/chos zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos ma yin zhes
108a1(khri brgyad): bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
108a2(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /lung bstan du yod pa dang /lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
108a3(khri brgyad): 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes
108a4(khri brgyad): su mi mthong /gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang //
108a5(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su
108a6(khri brgyad): mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
108a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /snying po med pa nyid dang ya ma brla nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
108b1(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs bsdam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/
108b2(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no//rab 'byor tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi
108b3(khri brgyad): khyab pa bstan pa yin no//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang //
108b4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye
108b5(khri brgyad): mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu
108b6(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis
108b7(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/gzugs
109a1(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces
109a2(khri brgyad): bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//gal te khams rnams dang skye mched rnams dang rten cing 'brel par
109a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang
109a4(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed na/shes rab
109a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur
109a6(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang dag sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed bskyed
109a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes
109b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha
109b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad cing /de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
109b3(khri brgyad): yongs su zin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs
109b4(khri brgyad): su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
109b5(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
109b6(khri brgyad): go/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /sbyin pa'i
109b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med
110a1(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub
110a2(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag dang /lamra dang /stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go//rnam
110a3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
110a4(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
110a5(khri brgyad): shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab la/de bzhin du khams rnams dang skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid
110a6(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
110a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad cing /de
110b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis
110b2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs zab pa'i skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
110b3(khri brgyad): zab pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags so//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin
110b4(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
110b5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa zab pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags/
110b6(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
110b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rin po che dag skyed par bgyid pas/rin po che'i phung po logs so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
111a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi dag pa'i
111a2(khri brgyad): phung po lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs dag pa nyid dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dag
111a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /khams dang skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /stobs bcu
111a4(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol
111a5(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na bar chad mang po mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
111a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bar chad mang ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang ston pa dang klog pa dang 'chad pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom par byed pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111b1(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klag pa dang bstan pa dang /bshad pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar dag la bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar myur ba nyid du yI
111b2(khri brgyad): gler bri bar bya zhing myur ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri zla ba gcig
111b3(khri brgyad): gris yi ger bri bar bya na'ang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/gal te zla ba gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am lnga 'am/drug gam/bdun namA lo'i bar gyis yi ger
111b4(khri brgyad): bri bar bya na'ang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/gal te lo'i bar gyis bshad pa dang /kha ton du bya ba dang /rab tu bsten par bya ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang bsgom
111b5(khri brgyad): par bya na'ang des de bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rin po che chen po 'di la ni bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
111b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi bri ba dang /mi klag pa dang kha ton du mi bgyi ba dang /tshul
111b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la mi bgyi ba dang /bsgom par mi bgyi ba'i slad du bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bdud
112a1(khri brgyad): sdig can ni 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang yi ger mi bri ba dang /mi klag pa dang kha ton du mi bya ba dang /mi bsgom par bya
112a2(khri brgyad): ba'i bar gyi phyir bar chad bya bar brtson mod kyi/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mi 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa
112a3(khri brgyad): dang /kha ton du byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /sgom pa rnams la bar chad byed mi nus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di
112a4(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das su'i mthus na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa
112a5(khri brgyad): dang sgom pa'i bar dag la bdud sdig can gyis bar chad bgyid par rngo mi thogs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus na/byang
112a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang 'chang ba dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid
112a7(khri brgyad): la byed pa dang /bsgom pa dag la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi nus so//shA ri'i bu gang yang phyogs bcu kun na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'cha
112b1(khri brgyad): zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mthu dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la dgongs shing phan 'dogs par
112b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing phan btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri
112b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa rnams la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA
112b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang kha ton du byed
112b5(khri brgyad): pa dang /'chang ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bsgom pa rnams la bdud sdig can par chad byed mi nus pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu phyogs bcu kun
112b6(khri brgyad): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa gang dag bzhugs te/
112b7(khri brgyad): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang //
113a1(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bsgom pa de la dgongs par 'gyur ba ni chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi ru/
113a2(khri brgyad): mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang /ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa des kyang 'di
113a3(khri brgyad): ltar bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dra'o//klog go/kha ton du byed do//ston to//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//sbom mo
113a4(khri brgyad): snyam du rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog
113a5(khri brgyad): pa dang kha ton du bgyid pa dang /ston pa dang bsgom pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis
113a6(khri brgyad): yongs su bzung ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu'am rigs
113a7(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung nod pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa dang /
113b1(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /sgom par byed pa de dag thams cad ni/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin pa dang kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rig par
113b2(khri brgyad): bya'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung nod
113b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /khwa ton du bgyid pa dang /'chad pa dang /ston pa dang bsgom pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/
113b4(khri brgyad): grangs ma mchis pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis mkhyen lags so//
113b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang lung nod pa dang /kha ton du bgyid pa dang /'chad pa
113b6(khri brgyad): dang /ston pa dang bsgom pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud lags
113b7(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger
114a1(khri brgyad): 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /lung nod pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /'chad pa dang /ston pa dang bsgom pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed
114a2(khri brgyad): cing /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis mkhyen to//byang
114a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud de/shA ri'i bu theg pa
114a4(khri brgyad): chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba yin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
114a5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
114a6(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur zhing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
114a7(khri brgyad): dang /ba dan dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed mchod po byed par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
114b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am
114b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang dron che ba dang /phan yon che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /rnam par smin pa che
114b3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /lha dang mi
114b4(khri brgyad): rnams su skyes na'ang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par yang 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
114b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//nam yang nang stong
114b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//nam yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul
114b7(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
115a1(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
115a2(khri brgyad): ro//nam yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/lto
115a3(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/do na dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba
115a4(khri brgyad): dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log par
115a5(khri brgyad): ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba drang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/
115a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lnga bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed ri mo byed/mchod pa byed cing /theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
115a7(khri brgyad): theg pa 'am/theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas/yul
115b1(khri brgyad): bar ta ni na spyod par 'gyur te/der yang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dre ba dang /'dzin
115b2(khri brgyad): padang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang spros dang /ma tog phreng dang /byug pa
115b3(khri brgyad): dang phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bra dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'irtsa
115b4(khri brgyad): bdes ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /de dag lha dang mi phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon
115b5(khri brgyad): par 'phags par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
115b6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen pos rim gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul b.rA ta ni nas/byang phyogs kyi chud na spyod par
115b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu der yang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi gar 'dri ba dang /'dzin pa
116a1(khri brgyad): dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
116a2(khri brgyad): rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/
116a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen pos rim gyis
116a4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed
116a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu chos 'dul ba snying por gyur na/dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
116a6(khri brgyad): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la
116a7(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas dgongs pa yin no//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
116b1(khri brgyad): mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /bris nas kyang me tog dang /bdug pa dang spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
116b2(khri brgyad): dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /ri mor byed pa dang /mchod par byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i
116b3(khri brgyad): rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /lha dang me'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags
116b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/mngon par 'phags nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed mchod pa byed cing theg pa gsum po nyan thos
116b5(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen pos rim gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs
116b6(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa dang /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa
116b7(khri brgyad): yin la/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho
117a1(khri brgyad): zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/rigs
117a2(khri brgyad): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bstod cing bsngags la rab tu bsngags pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/shes rab kyi
117a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/shA ri'i bu phyi
117a4(khri brgyad): ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na de na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
117a5(khri brgyad): de dag shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing /thos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
117a6(khri brgyad): dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur
117a7(khri brgyad): zhing /thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de bzhini nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni
117b1(khri brgyad): yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no//shA rI'i
117b2(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na/byang phyogs logs su rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
117b3(khri brgyad): nyan par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /de bzhin nyid du sgrub byar
117b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/byang phyogs
117b5(khri brgyad): legs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du 'byung mod kyi/shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /thos nas
117b6(khri brgyad): kyang yi ger 'dri nga dang /'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i byang chub
117b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni mang po mi 'byung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheni po dang /rigs kyi bu dang
118a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di bshad pa thas na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
118a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'byung zhing yongs su zhu ba
118a3(khri brgyad): dang yongs su dri ba dag byas pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing //
118a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
118a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag nang stong pa nyid dang /
118a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi b.ro dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs
118a7(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
118b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams
118b2(khri brgyad): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
118b3(khri brgyad): ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di las brtsams nas/de dag skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
118b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod cing /'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
118b5(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams
118b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod pas/de dag tshe rlabs rjes na'ang 'di ltar spyod par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
118b7(khri brgyad): brtsams shing /de dag de lta bu'i gtam brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa
119a1(khri brgyad): da pang dgas pa byung rgyu las ma na shA dag shes ma ma / snron pa cu 'dun nga/ga pa mas /
119a2(khri brgyad): byung blug na dgas mas kyang po dgus/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rigs kyi bang rdzogs kyi bla ma da
119a3(khri brgyad): la tu phyin pa ze'i mo 'di thos nas/dga' ba dang /mchog N+DI dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing /'di lta s+t+wa~M/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
119a4(khri brgyad): bya chub la so brtsams te/sgrub med po dge ba'i rje brnams la 'gang par yong 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag gis nga'i ming nasam du 'di na
119a5(khri brgyad): rdob cim ldan 'das bdug cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/srog chags brgya phyug mang ba dang /s+hog/chags stong phrag mang po dang /sdug chags ma
119a6(khri brgyad): ga du 'dig chos rnams mi dgang par brgyan/blan med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byung rgyu las brnams /byang chub ma
119a7(khri brgyad): /yang dag par bstan par bgyi yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bgyi/yang dag par gzings brgyang por bgyi/yang dag par rab tu dga'
119b1(khri brgyad): zhing /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
119b2(khri brgyad): gis rmi go de skad brjod pa'i sems la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyis rnam par gzigs shing rjes su yi rang la//
119b3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags
119b4(khri brgyad): 'bum phrag mang po dag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan par bya/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/yang dag par gzengs bstod
119b5(khri brgyad): par bya/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o zhes zer ba'i tshig de la ngas kyang rjes su yi rang bar byas
119b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang 'di
119b7(khri brgyad): skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags 'bu mo phrag mang po dag bla
120a1(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi/yang dag par bstan par bgyi/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bgyi/yang dag par
120a2(khri brgyad): gzengs bstod par bgyi/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi zhing /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
120a3(khri brgyad): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshig de skad brjod pa'i sems la 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
120a4(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs kyis rnam par gzigs shing /rjes su yi rang bar mdzad la/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
120a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag la
120a6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan par bya/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/yang dag par gzings bstod par bya/yang dag par
120a7(khri brgyad): rab tu dga' bar bya zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o zhes zer ba'i tshig de la ngas kyang rjes su yi rang ba byas pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu
120b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang chos rnams la mos pa rlabs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /de dag sbyin pa rgya chen po dag gtong
120b2(khri brgyad): bar yang 'gyur ro//de dag gis sbyin pa rgya chen po dag btang bas/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro//dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag mngon par 'du
120b3(khri brgyad): byas pas rnam par smin pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//rnam par smin pa rgya chen po yongs su bzung bas/sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa las/rnam
120b4(khri brgyad): por smin pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /sems can de dag nyid la phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang
120b5(khri brgyad): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag mngon sum du gyur cing /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag la dmigs par yang 'gyur te/
120b6(khri brgyad): de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid thos nas kyang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags 'bum phrag
120b7(khri brgyad): mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /yang dag par ston pa dang /yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /yang dag par rab tu
121a1(khri brgyad): dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
121a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyis gang ma mkhyen pa'i chos de gang yang mi mnga' chos nyid dang /de bzhin nyid gang mkhyen par ma gyur pa de gang yang mi mnga'/chos bstan pa gang mkhyen
121a3(khri brgyad): par ma gyur pa de gang yang mi mnga'/sems can+da rnams kyi spyod pa gang mkhyen par ma gyur pa de gang yang mi mnga' ste/'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
121a4(khri brgyad): kyang thugs su chud/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang thugs su chud/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyan thos dag kyang thugs su chud/ma
121a5(khri brgyad): byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang thugs su chud/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /
121a6(khri brgyad): nyan thos dag kyang thugs su chud/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /nyan thos dag
121a7(khri brgyad): kyang thugs su chud cing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
121b1(khri brgyad): dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang thugs su chud/
121b2(khri brgyad): dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /nyan thos dag kyang thugs su chud pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121b3(khri brgyad): chen po dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang yongs su tshol bar bgyid de/rigs kyi bu
121b4(khri brgyad): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol ba dang /yongs su tshol bar bgyod pa na/kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba na rnyed par
121b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags so//kha cig gis ni rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ni de lta ma yin no//de ni de lta ma yin te/rigs kyi
121b6(khri brgyad): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson par mi gtong ba de dag las phal cher pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
121b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi ched du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am
122a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di dag rnyed par 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
122a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'dun pa drag po dang /dad pa chen pos lus dang srog la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la brtson par byed pa de dag
122a3(khri brgyad): gis ni rnyed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu gang dag sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par byed/yang dag
122a4(khri brgyad): par ston par byed/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed/'dzud par byed 'god par byed pa de dag
122a5(khri brgyad): de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshe rabs rjes na'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rnyed par 'gyur te/de dag ni ji
122a6(khri brgyad): srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par ma byas pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi byas pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
122a7(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du ji skad bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la spyod cing /brtson 'grus rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab
122b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las byung phyogs kyi rgyud kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtswa dgu pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/
122b2(khri brgyad): bam po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang
122b3(khri brgyad): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid
122b4(khri brgyad): ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gis yon tan ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su brjod pa de dag lags na/bcom ldan 'das rigs
122b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu dang rigs kyi ba mo de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi/
122b6(khri brgyad): ste skye na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang
122b7(khri brgyad): 'phyo ste skye ba de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
123a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs chen pos yongs su rdzogs
123a2(khri brgyad): par byed cing /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
123a3(khri brgyad): dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshogs chen pos yongs su rdzogs par byed na/rab 'byor rnam grangs des spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur bas/rab
123a4(khri brgyad): 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang spobs pa ha cang myur por skye na/rab 'byor de'ang
123a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye
123a6(khri brgyad): ba de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
123a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab
123b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye na/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
123b2(khri brgyad): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri na rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
123b3(khri brgyad): bos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang rgod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
123b4(khri brgyad): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun co 'dri zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
123b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems rnam par g.yengs shing yi ger 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhon yang phan tshun sems mthun par byed cing yi ger 'dri na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di la nyams ma rnyed do snyam nas
124a1(khri brgyad): stan las langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing
124a2(khri brgyad): stan las langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang glal zhing kha ton byed dam
124a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin tam ston tam/glal zhing yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
124a4(khri brgyad): phan tshun rgod cing 'dzin par byed/'tshang bar byed klag par byed/kun chub par byed phan tshun rgod cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems
124a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun co 'dri zhing 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed klog par byed/kun chub
124a6(khri brgyad): par byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems
124a7(khri brgyad): rnam par g.yengs shing 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed klog par byed/kun chub par byed/ston par byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
124b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun sems mthun par byed cing /'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed
124b2(khri brgyad): klog par byed/kun chub par byed ston par byed/tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
124b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang yang bcom ldan
124b4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis 'di skad du/'di la nyams ma rnyed do snyam nas stan las langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
124b5(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la nyams ma rnyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub
124b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa dang /sngon bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124b7(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po la ma spyad pa dang /rab 'byor 'di ltar sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas/rab
125a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri bshad pa na nyams ma rnyed par stan las langs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang
125a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan to snyam nas/de dag sems ma dad cing stan las
125a3(khri brgyad): langs te 'gro na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
125a4(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa dag stan las langs te mchi bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub
125a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma zhugs pa rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
125a6(khri brgyad): pa 'di las bdag gis ming ma smoso so snyam nas dad pa mi 'thob na/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o///
125a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
125b1(khri brgyad): ming yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma
125b2(khri brgyad): bstan pa rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa mi mdzad de/de dag ni bdag gis ming dang bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam/grong khyer ram/glong rdal yang 'di las ma smos
125b3(khri brgyad): sngo snyam nas/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan par bya'o snyam du mi sems shing de 'khor de nas 'gro bar bya bar sems so//de ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar bya bar sems
125b4(khri brgyad): shing /'gro ba'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed byung bar gyur pa de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs nas/des mdo sde
125b5(khri brgyad): gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin pa de la rnal 'byor du bya ba dang /de dag kun chub par bya'o snyam du sems te/de ltar na byang chub
125b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dang /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/yal ga dang 'drab ma dang /lo ma dag la dmigs
125b7(khri brgyad): par bya bar sems pas/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
126a1(khri brgyad): pa byu klung na sa kyi ga pa dung ldan pa'i me rnam /dul gnasan rigs kyi di migs kyi ma
126a2(khri brgyad): rgyun du rdzogs pa'i 'bras ze dang /lan cog phyir ring ba'i 'bras bu dang /byir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra btsam pa nyid 'thab par 'gyur ba 'di lta d+han
126a3(khri brgyad): /padz+rang/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa da/dbang po dung stobs dang / kyi yan ltag dang /lam rnams dang rnam
126a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang dz+nyA nI pa rjid pa rnams so//rlung 'byur de dag ni nyan rjes kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i ma stan mas tAM/shes rab kyis
126a5(khri brgyad): tu byin pa snang sa pa/rnam pa thams nad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mi shes 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de dag kun chub par b+hu bar sams pa yin no//de ci'i phyir nyen/
126a6(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi
126b1(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur la/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na'ang 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das
126b2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la slob pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na khyi zhig gis jo bo'i drung nas zan gong bor la/las mi las zan kham cig blang bar sems pa de bzhin du rab 'byor
126b3(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs nas/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang /rang sangs
126b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kun chub par bya bar sems pa dag 'byung ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o///
126b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs nas/rnyed pa dang
126b6(khri brgyad): bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kun chub par bya bar sems pa dag 'byung ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub
126b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi la la zhig glang po che 'dod par gyur la/des glang po che rnyed nas yang glang
127a1(khri brgyad): po che'i rjes btsal bar sems na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol
127a2(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma ljags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
127a3(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs nas/mdo sde gang dag nyon thos kyi theg po dang ldan pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa de
127a4(khri brgyad): dag kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab
127a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'dod par gyur la/des rgya mtsho chen po mthong nas/ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu btsal bar sems shing
127a6(khri brgyad): nges ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu mthong nas/'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad kyang 'di tsam zhig yin nam snyam du sems na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de mkhas
127a7(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin can yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin
127b1(khri brgyad): du theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos sam rnyed nas de spangs te nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
127b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag bzung bar sems pa de dag kyang de ltar rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab
127b3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/shing mkhan nam/shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed kyi tshad tsam gyi khang bzang zhig rtsig 'dod par gyur la/des nyi
127b4(khri brgyad): ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag las tshad blang bar sems na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed la dpyad nas/rnam par rgyal byed dang mnyam
127b5(khri brgyad): pa'i khang bzang rtsig par 'dod la/nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor dag las tshad len pa'i mi de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis
127b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dri ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
