158a5(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud cing ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
158a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin po de bzhin nyid ni zab pa lags so//
158a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub snang bar bgyis so//bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
158b1(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams dang /gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs par gyur pa rnams dang /dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhog 'di la mos par 'gyur/bcom
158b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das chos 'di dag ni zab ste/dri bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
158b3(khri brgyad): di ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi dad pa'o//ci'i phyir mi zad can/chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi zad pa'o//rab 'byur 'di lta ste/chos thams pa k+Shi bzhon
158b4(khri brgyad): nyid 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad po yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
158b5(khri brgyad): dring rgyud stong pa las/'jig rten ston pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/'dod
158b6(khri brgyad): pan spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma drug khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/lhags nas bcom
158b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'odas kyi zhangs la mag bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang /gzugs ni spyod pa'i lha
159a1(khri brgyad): bu de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni zab pa lagasu na bcom
159a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci'i slad du zab pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa
159a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zab bo//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /mngon par
159a4(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /'gog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /rnam par
159a5(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /chod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /rtag
159a6(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /don gcig pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'ong ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /'gro ba med pa'i
159a7(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid dang /nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zab bo//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin pas na/de bzhin gshegs
159b1(khri brgyad): pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te/don dam par ni ma yin no//lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrug par
159b2(khri brgyad): byed mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bu dge mtshan nyid kyis ni/mtshan nyid
159b3(khri brgyad): rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do//mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshan nyid mi shes so//mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshan nyid med pa mi shes so//mtshan nyid med pas kyang mtshan nyid mi shes
159b4(khri brgyad): so//mtshan nyid med pas kyang mtshan nyid med pa mi shes so//de ltar na mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka la'ang /gang gis shes
159b5(khri brgyad): par byed pa dang /grang shes par byed pa dang /gang la shes par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid med do//lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni/gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no///
159b6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//
159b7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//stong pa nyid thams cad kyis
160a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so
160a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chosnga ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus
160a3(khri brgyad): byas pa ma yin no//lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni mi rnams dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyi/zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/zag pa med pa rnams sam/'jig
160a4(khri brgyad): rten pa rnams sam/'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sam/'dus byas rnams sam/'dus ma byas rnams ma yin te/mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro///
160a5(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes zer na/ci yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin nam/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom
160a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra ba ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams ni 'dus byas ma lags pa'i slad du nam mkha' ni mtshan
160a7(khri brgyad): nyid gang gis kyang ma mchis pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa
160b1(khri brgyad): rnams ma byung yang rung ste/mtshan nyid kyi dbyings ni mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du gnas pa nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mngon par
160b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang dag
160b3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa ma mchis pa dang /mtshan nyid gang dag la gnas nas/de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
160b4(khri brgyad): nyid thams cad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di dag ni zab lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
160b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rab tu bstan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
160b6(khri brgyad): pas gang la spyad pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
160b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad de/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
161a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu dbye bar mdzad pa nas/mtshan nyid thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba'i bar du mdzad pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
161a2(khri brgyad): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du/rab tu dbye ba mdzad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
161a3(khri brgyad): spyod yul 'di ni zab ste ngo mtshar lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
161a4(khri brgyad): lho'i bu dag gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/gzugs nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pas/mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so///
161a5(khri brgyad): dri bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/'du byed rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par shes pa ni so sor rnam par
161a6(khri brgyad): rig pa'i mtshan nyid do/de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid de/de
161a7(khri brgyad): dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so khams rnams ni sbrul gdug pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid de de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
161b1(khri brgyad): pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//skye mched rnams ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon
161b2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid de de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
161b3(khri brgyad): rgyas so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//tshul khrims
161b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid//
161b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sdud pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spong ba'i mtshan nyid de/de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon
161b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag
161b7(khri brgyad): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni nges par 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag
162a1(khri brgyad): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan
162a2(khri brgyad): nyid/smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de/de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam par thar pa rnams
162a3(khri brgyad): ni rnam par grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de bzhin du sbyar te/stobs rnams
162a4(khri brgyad): ni shin tu rnam par nges pa'i mtshan nyid/mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid/byams pa chen
162a5(khri brgyad): po ni phan pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid/snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid dga' ba chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid/btang snyoms
162a6(khri brgyad): chen po ni sems can gyi nyes pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang rnyed pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang /grogs pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa dang /bstod pa dang /smad pa la btang /
162a7(khri brgyad): snyoms su 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrog pa'i mtshan nyid de de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon
162b1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
162b2(khri brgyad): rgyas so//lha'i bu dag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa med pa'i
162b3(khri brgyad): ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa
162b4(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ston pa'ang yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de
162b5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di la brten cing gnas nas 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la bsti stang mdzad/bla mar mdzad ri mo mdzad mchod pa mdzad de/rab 'byor
162b6(khri brgyad): de bas na/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsti stang mdzad/bla mar mdzad/ri mo mdzod/mchod pa mdzad pa de ni chos nyid yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
162b7(khri brgyad): 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas ni byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor
163a1(khri brgyad): ba yin te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor ba yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba
163a2(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni/theg pa des gshegs
163a3(khri brgyad): shing lam des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa de nyid dang /lam de nyid la
163a4(khri brgyad): bsti stang mdzad/bla mar mdzad/ri mo mdzad/mchod pa mdzad cing yongs su 'dzin la/rjes su yongs su skyong bar mdzad de/rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163a5(khri brgyad): byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa tshor ba yin par blta bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byed pa po med pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byas pa dang //
163a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//lus med pa'i phyir ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas/
163a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas chos thams cad byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma byas pa mkhyen pa
163b1(khri brgyad): dang /ma byas pa rig pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/don dam par byung ba med pa'i phyir ye shes byas pa med pa
163b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad la zhugs so//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
163b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gang gi tshe/chos thams cad skyed pa po ma lags shing /ston pa po ma lags pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /
163b4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/chos thams cad ni skyed pa po ma yin zhing /ston pa po ma yin
163b5(khri brgyad): no//rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing /ston pa po ma yin zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa dang gso ba dang /gsog dang ya ma brla dang /
163b6(khri brgyad): snying po med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing ston pa po ma yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad skyed pa po ma yin zhing /
163b7(khri brgyad): ston pa po ma yin zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa/khongs su gtogs pa med pa yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad skyed
164a1(khri brgyad): pa po ma sbyin+da zhing /ston pa po ma yin no//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin ga shegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin
164a2(khri brgyad): de'adra gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na shes
164a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'dra
164a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i slad du ji ltar ston pa lags/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi mthong ba'i slad du ji ltar ston pa lags/
164a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang gi tshe gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung na rab 'byor de ltar gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir
164a6(khri brgyad): ston pa yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dmigs po'i sems mi 'byung na/de ltar rnam par shes po ma
164a7(khri brgyad): mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi 'byung ni/de ltar rnam pa
164b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten
164b2(khri brgyad): ston pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi
164b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod par byed do//'jig rten stong ngo zhes ji ltar brjod ce na/phung po lnga po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do/khams
164b4(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//skye mched bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//bsam
164b5(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'byung ba rten cing 'brel par
164b6(khri brgyad): 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//'jig chags la blta ba la sogs pa lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod
164b7(khri brgyad): do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /
165a1(khri brgyad): phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//de bzhin du stobs bcu dang //
165a2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
165a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi bar du stong ngo zhes brjod do//rab 'byor de ltar na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin no///
165a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten stong par rig go//'jig rten stong par yang dag par mkhyen to//'jig rten stong par rtogs so//'jig rten stong par
165a5(khri brgyad): thugs su chud do//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten stong pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha
165a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston te/'jig rten stong ngo zhes ji ltar ston ce na/'di ltar phung po rnams dang /khams rnams dang /skye mched
165a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rten cing 'brel
165b1(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang /'jig tshogs la blta ba la sogs pa lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
165b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid thams cad dang /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
165b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston te/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan
165b4(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ji ltar ston ce na/phung po lnga nas
165b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston to//de bzhin du shin tu dben pa dang /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
165b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin no///
165b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi bar ston te 'jig rten ji ltar zhi bar ston ce na/phung po dang khams dang skye mched
166a1(khri brgyad): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi bar ston te/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
166a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang 'jig rten ston pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong
166a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kho nar ston te/'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ji ltar ston ce na/phung po lnga'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid kho nar ston pa nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig
166a4(khri brgyad): rten stong pa nyid kho nar ston te/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten ston pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
166a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci nas 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes med pa dang /'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
166a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes sam/'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes byed pa'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro////shes rab kyi pha
166a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi po/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bcom ldan
166b1(khri brgyad): 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /mdzad pa gzhal du ma
166b2(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang /mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /mdzad pa mi munyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
166b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
166b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ji ltar mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas she na/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad sgrub pa dang gnas byed pa dang /yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni de bzhin
166b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa chen po yin te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
166b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi
166b7(khri brgyad): khyab pas nye bar gnas she na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
167a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor rnam grangs nges na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam
167a2(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas she na/rab
167a3(khri brgyad): 'byor sems can gyi tshogs kyi nang na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam pa 'am gzhal bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang
167a4(khri brgyad): med de rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du
167a5(khri brgyad): med pas nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas she na/rab 'byor
167a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med la sus kyang tshad bzung bar mi nus te/rab 'byor rnam
167a7(khri brgyad): grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar
167b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas she na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mnyam
167b2(khri brgyad): pa'ang med na/lhag pa lta ga la yod de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
167b3(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs
167b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /grangs ma mchis pa dang //
167b5(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs
167b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang
167b7(khri brgyad): byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor chos rnams kyi/
168a1(khri brgyad): chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal
168a2(khri brgyad): du med pa dang dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes
168a3(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
168a4(khri brgyad): pa ste/shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs
168a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/shes par byar med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi
168a6(khri brgyad): khyab pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /grangs ma mchis pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa
168a7(khri brgyad): legs/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis
168b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /grangs ma mchis pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
168b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /grangs ma mchis pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/'tshal bar bgyir ma mchis pa lags/bcom
168b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang blangs
168b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/shes par byar med pa yin no//rab 'byor tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo
168b5(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/shes par byar med pa yin/
168b6(khri brgyad): no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /
168b7(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/shes par byar med pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ci gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu
169a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa gang yin pa de la gzugs dmigs sam/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du
169a2(khri brgyad): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa
169a3(khri brgyad): dang /mnyam po gang yin pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs sam/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab
169a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa gang yin pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs snyam
169a5(khri brgyad): mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams
169a6(khri brgyad): cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam po ste/rab 'byor 'di dag ni chos thams
169a7(khri brgyad): cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin
169b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
169b2(khri brgyad): pa ste/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi lang ba'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal gyis mi lang
169b3(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang /dpag gis mi lang ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /bgrang gis mi lang ba'i phyir grangs med pa dang /mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir/
169b4(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa
169b5(khri brgyad): dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam pa las 'das pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab
169b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /gzhal ba las 'das pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa dang /tshad las 'das pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /bgrang ba las 'das pa'i phyir grangs med pa dang /mnyam
169b7(khri brgyad): pa dang mi mnyam pa las 'das pa'i phyir/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis mi lang ba'i tshig bla dgas so//rab
170a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhal gyis mi lang ba'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dgas
170a2(khri brgyad): so//rab 'byor grangs med pa zhes bya ba de ni grangs las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor mI mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam
170a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos do dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang dpag tu med pa
170a4(khri brgyad): dang grangs med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du gzhal du med
170a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
170a6(khri brgyad): rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/de dag ni nyan thos dang /rang
170a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas thams cad dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang bsam pa 'am/gzhal ba 'am dpag pa'am/bgrang bar mi nus te/de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams
170b1(khri brgyad): kyang dpag tu med la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dpag tu med do//bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /mi mnyam
170b2(khri brgyad): pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge slong mnyis stong yang len pa
170b3(khri brgyad): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge bsnyen drug khre ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/dge bsnyen ma sum khri'ang
170b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das
170b5(khri brgyad): kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po khri brgyad stong pa las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu
170b6(khri brgyad): rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags
170b7(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyid pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyid pa mtshungs pa ma mchis
171a1(khri brgyad): pa dang /bgyid pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /bskyed pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /bgyid pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa lags s+ho//
171a2(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin nod de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
171a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa mtshungs pa med pa dang /byed pa dpag tu med pa dang /byed
171a4(khri brgyad): pa grangs med pa dang /byed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin
171a5(khri brgyad): pa drug 'dus pa dang /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang /
171a6(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
171a7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa dang /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang /mi
171b1(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chosnga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus pa dang /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir
171b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dus pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'dus pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/yul
171b3(khri brgyad): gyi mi rnams la mthu che zhing dbang thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya ba dang yul gyi mi rnams kyi bya ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad blon po byed du bcug na/rgyal po'i bya ba'am yul gyi mi'i bya ba de dag
171b4(khri brgyad): la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams
171b5(khri brgyad): sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de dag gi bya ba byed pa yin no//rab
171b6(khri brgyad): 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byed pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed
171b7(khri brgyad): pa mtshungs pa med pa dang byed pa dpag tu med pa dang byed pa grangs med pa dang /byed pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
172a1(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing /mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /tshor ba
172a2(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing /mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /rnam pa thams
172a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag lo yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa med
172a4(khri brgyad): cing /mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa dang /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
172a5(khri brgyad): rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med par nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro//
172a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /mngon par zhen pa ma mchis
172a7(khri brgyad): par nye bar gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing
172b1(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing /mngon
172b2(khri brgyad): par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang la mngon par zhen pa
172b3(khri brgyad): dang /gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang la mngon
172b4(khri brgyad): par zhen pa dang /gang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang mngon par zhen pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su
172b5(khri brgyad): mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis gang la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang la mngon par zhen pa dang /gang
172b6(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin pa dang /gang mngon par zhen pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni
172b7(khri brgyad): ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor legs so legs so//rab 'byor ngas kyang gang la yongs su 'dzin pa'am/mngon par zhen pa'am//
173a1(khri brgyad): gang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/mngon par zhen pa'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
173a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin to//yongs su mi 'dzin pas mngon
173a3(khri brgyad): par zhen pa med do//rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
173a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin te/yongs su mi 'dzin pas mngon par zhen pa med do//rab 'byor de bas na
173a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzugs la yongs su bzung bar mi bya zhing mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
173a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su bzung bar mi bya zhing /mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa
173a7(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yongs su bzung bar mi bya zhing mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
173b1(khri brgyad): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka'
173b2(khri brgyad): la rtog par dka' ste/brtags pa ro mi nus shing /rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags lnga/zhi ba zhib mo brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang /'dzangs pa'i rig par bgyi ba lags
173b3(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i
173b4(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sems can glang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/mos pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed bskyed
173b5(khri brgyad): pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nA/sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang po dang
173b6(khri brgyad): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /ldan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyi
173b7(khri brgyad): shes pa gang lags pa dang spong ba gang lags pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig bzod pa dang /'dod pa dang /sems pa dang /'jal ba dang /
174a1(khri brgyad): dpyod pa dang /rtog pa gang lags pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu 'di la 'dod cing /bzod pa gang lags pa de nyid ches mchog tu gyur pa lags
174a2(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi shes pa dang /spong ba dang /lhan cig
174a3(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab dang /spong ba gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
174a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa lags pa'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka'
174a5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/lha'i bu dag legs so legs so//lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun du zhugs
174a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
174a7(khri brgyad): po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin no//lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/thos nas kyang
174b1(khri brgyad): yi ger 'dri ba dang /byis nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
174b2(khri brgyad): shes par bya'i/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro//de
174b3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi gang la bslab par bya ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong
174b4(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b5(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag
174b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag phul gyi
174b7(khri brgyad): chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
175a1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di
175a2(khri brgyad): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa grangs ma mchis
175a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos
175a4(khri brgyad): kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /brgyad pa rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams
175a5(khri brgyad): dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab pa'i nges par byung bar gyur la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab pas bla na med pa yang dag par
175a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bri ba 'am/gang ba ma mchis so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//
175a7(khri brgyad): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
175b1(khri brgyad): ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste/de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i/
175b2(khri brgyad): khams su 'khod do//gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
175b3(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas
175b4(khri brgyad): shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
175b5(khri brgyad): thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur te/zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/de yid rtul bar mi 'gyur zhing /de yid gnyis mi byed la/the tshom mi za zhing /
175b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par mos par dga' ste/thos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yid la byed pa 'di nyid dang mi 'bral zhing /'gro'ang rung //
175b7(khri brgyad): 'ong yang rung /'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung ste/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yid la byed pa de dag mi gtong la/chos smra bas gang zag de dag gi phye bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
176a1(khri brgyad): 'brang ste/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ba drus mabe'u mi gtong ba bzhin du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
176a2(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di/nam lus la gnas par byas pa dang /zin pa dang /byang ba dang /chub par klags pa dang /yid kyis rtags pa dang /mthong bas shin tu rtogs par ma gyur gyi bar
176a3(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i phyir/chos smra ba mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag de ni/rab 'byor
176a4(khri brgyad): mi las shi 'phos nas mir skyes pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
176a5(khri brgyad): yi ger bris la/bris nas kyang glegs bam du chud par byas te/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang gos dang /gdugs
176a6(khri brgyad): dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang byas/bla mar byas ri mo byas/mchod par byas pa'i phyir te/de ni dge ba'i rtse ba des mi las shi 'phos te/mir skyes nas shes
176a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de dog dang ldan
176b1(khri brgyad): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas de ni shi 'phos te/'dir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos wa/mos
176b2(khri brgyad): nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /bris nas kyang lung 'brog pa dang /kha ton du bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam/bcom
176b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu/sangs
176b4(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la/mos nas
176b5(khri brgyad): kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton du byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems
176b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la thos nas kyang bzung zhing bcangs la/kha ton du byas
176b7(khri brgyad): shing tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i phyir te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir skyes so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
177a1(khri brgyad): chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang sbrul ba mnyam par 'dar skyes pa de nyid kyang yon tan de dag dang ldan par rig par
177a2(khri brgyad): bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol
177a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di yongs su dri ba byas pas na/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dris 'dir skyes pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas/
177a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na/the tshom can dang yid rtul bar 'gyur te/de'i sems zhum par
177a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang sngon gyi mtha' nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos la yongs su dra ba byas pa de ni/shes rab
177a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas/the tshom can du mi 'gyur zhing yid dulwa bar mi 'gyur te/sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor bsam gtan
177a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//rab
177b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/shes rab
177b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na the tshom can du 'gyur zhing yid rtul bar 'gyur te/sems zhum par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
177b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos shing /yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab
177b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the tshom can du 'gyur zhing yid rtul bar 'gyur te/sems zhum par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
177b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the
177b6(khri brgyad): tshom can du 'gyur zhing /yid rtul bar 'gyur te sems zhum par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas
177b7(khri brgyad): kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
178a1(khri brgyad): ma thos sam/thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na the tshom can du 'gyur zhing yid
178a2(khri brgyad): rtul bar 'gyur te/sems kyang zhum par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang /shes rab
178a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di thos shing yongs su bI la/thos shing yongs su dris nas/nyi ma gcig gam/nyi ma gnyis sam/nyi ma gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am//
178a4(khri brgyad): drug gam/nyi ma bcur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyams su mi len cing mi bsgom pa de ni 'phrogs par 'gyur te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
178a5(khri brgyad): 'di dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
178a6(khri brgyad): res 'ga' ni 'dun par 'gyur te/res 'ga' ni 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de ni 'phrogs par 'gyur te/shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du blo shin tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba'i
178a7(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas/ring po ma lon pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma
178b1(khri brgyad): zin pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi
178b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos kha ton du ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
178b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
178b4(khri brgyad): bslab pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la ma bslab pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslab pa dang /
178b5(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam la ma bslab pa dang /mngon
178b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa lnga dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad
178b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste
179a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni dad pa tsam dang /dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i yi ger bri ba dang /klag pa dang /lung
179a2(khri brgyad): nod pa dang /bsam gtan du bya ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i shes
179a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/lung nod par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179a4(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin par mi byed pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang nyams su
179a5(khri brgyad): mi len pa dang /de bzhin du sbyor te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nyams su mi len pa de dag ni/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
179a6(khri brgyad): dang /sa rnam pa 'di gnyis las gcig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang //
179a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing lung ma mnos te/kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179b1(khri brgyad): pa 'dis kyang yongs su ma zin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su ma blangs pa'i phyir te/de'i phyir rigs/
179b2(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sa rnam po gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
179b3(khri brgyad): pa'o////rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gang gi tshe rgya mtsho'i gru zhig par gyur ma na/de'i nang na mi 'khod pa dag gis shing ngama?/rkyal pa'am/mi ro la ma 'jus shing
179b4(khri brgyad): ma bzung na/rab 'byor mi de drag ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru zhig pa ni/mi gang dag shing ngam/rkyal
179b5(khri brgyad): pa'am/mi ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed na//rab 'byor mau de dag ni rgya mtsho'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/bde bar rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur zhing nye zho med par thang la
179b6(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po dad pa tsam dang /dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa ste/shes rab kyi pha
179b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/lung nod par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
180a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
180a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa yi ger 'dri bar mi byed/lung nod par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed/lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
180a3(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang ldan pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'dra bar mi byed/lung nod par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang /lhag par dmigs par mi byed
180a4(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/bar ma dor lam du nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig
180a5(khri brgyad): par byas te/de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag bla na
180a6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/dad pa yod pa dang /bzod pa yod pa dang /dang ba yod pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam
180a7(khri brgyad): pa yod pa dang /'dod pa yod pa dang /mos pa yod pa dang /gtong ba yod pa dang /brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri bar
180b1(khri brgyad): byed/lung nod par byed/kha ton du byed/tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
180b2(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyir dad pa dang /bzod pa dang /dang ba dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /'dod pa dang /mos pa dang gtong ba dang /brtson pa mi gtong ba de dag dang gang dag shes rab
180b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa de dag bar ma dor nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing /de dag nyan thos dang /
180b4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
180b5(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la ltos/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/bud med gcig gis bum pa so ma btang ma bsregs pas chu bcu par
180b6(khri brgyad): sems na/rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi thub ste/myur ba nyid du 'jig cing zhu bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bum pa so ma btang ba'i phyir
180b7(khri brgyad): te/de ni phyir sa tha mal pa nyid du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
181a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/'dod pa'ang yod/mos
181a2(khri brgyad): pa'ang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod du zin kyang /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin
181a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin
181a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma zin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma zin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zi na/dran pa nye bar
181a5(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma zin/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
181a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /lam gyis yongs su ma zin/mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma zin/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
181a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma zin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
181b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag ni bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bar ma dor nyon mongs
181b2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes pa 'am/bud med gcig gis bum pa so btang
181b3(khri brgyad): bas chu klung ngam/khron pa'am/mtsho'am/mtshe'u 'am/lteng ka nas chu bcus na/rab 'byor bum pa de ni bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//de bzhin du byang
181b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag
181b5(khri brgyad): pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/'dod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing thabs
181b6(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor lam du 'di lta ste/
181b7(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing nye zho med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
182a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho'i gru legs par ma brtsams shing zag lhan ma byas par rdzas kyis lci bar byas
182a2(khri brgyad): te/chu la btang na/rab 'byor par ma dor gru de ni nub par 'gyur te/rdzas kyang logs shig gru'ang logs shig tu 'gro bar 'gyur te/de lta bu'i tshong pa de ni thabs
182a3(khri brgyad): la mi mkhas shing gnod pa chen po dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang /rin po che chen po dag dang bral bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
182a4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/
182a5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod du zin kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/thabs la
182a6(khri brgyad): mkhas pas yongs su ma zin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor
182a7(khri brgyad): nyon mongs par 'gyur te/don chen po las yongs su nyams shing 'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i phung po chen po las yongs su nyams
182b1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar ma dor nyon mongs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis
182b2(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe rA na/skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis rgya mtsho'i gru legs par brtsams shing zug ldan byas lnga shin tu sbyangs na/rab 'byor
182b3(khri brgyad): mtsho'i gru de ni bar mdor zhig par mi 'gyur zhing /des gang du bgrod par bya ba der phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182b4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/drang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsdam pa'ang yod/'dod
182b5(khri brgyad): pa'ang yod/mos pa dang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /yongs su zin cing /thabs lam pas
182b6(khri brgyad): pas kyang yongs su zin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang yongs su zin na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byar mdor thun
182b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyir
183a1(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyir/dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/'dod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang
183a2(khri brgyad): yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing /thabs la mkhas pas kyang yongs su zin te/rnam pa
183a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis kyang yongs su zin pa'i phyir te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi
183a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa/rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig yod de/de'i lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/mkhris
183a5(khri brgyad): pa las gyur pa 'am/bad kan las gyur pa'amo/'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig byung na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ci mi di rang dgar ldang ba'i mthu
183a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan nam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci mi ldang bar 'gyur ram/rab 'byor gyis
183a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi de ni khri las ldang ba'i rngo thogs tu lags kyang de ni rgas pa de dang /bro nad de dag gis nyams dmas pas/dpag tshad gcig gi bar ram/
183b1(khri brgyad): dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du mchi ba'i mthu'ang ma mchis te/khri de las ldang ba'i rngo thogs tu lags kyang mchi ba'i rdo ni mi thogs ljags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
183b2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga'
183b3(khri brgyad): ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/'dod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod du zin kyang /de
183b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b5(khri brgyad): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir/bar ma dor lam du nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
183b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas shing 'khogs la/gtugs par gyur pa de la rlung las gyur pa
183b7(khri brgyad): 'am/mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/bad kan las gyur pa'am/'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis nyams dmas pa de nyid mi stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mtshan g.yas g.yon
184a1(khri brgyad): nas brten te/bteg nas khri de las bslang ste/'di skad du kye ma khyod kho bo cag gnyis kyis brtan te dazung gis gang du 'dod pa dang /gar dga' bar song
184a2(khri brgyad): zhig dang gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du bar ma dor 'gyel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bzhin du/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa
184a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/dad pa'ang yod/bzod pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/dang ba'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/'dod pa'ang
184a4(khri brgyad): yod/mos pa'ang yod/gtong ba'ang yod/brtson pa mi gtong ba'ang yod la/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang yongs su zin cing /thabs la mkhas
184a5(khri brgyad): pas kyang yongs su zin na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor ldog par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'
184a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas de 'thob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
184a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
184b1(khri brgyad): zin cing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin la/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ltung bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
184b2(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so//rab 'byor 'di
184b3(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /tshul khrims
184b4(khri brgyad): gang bsrung ba dang bzod pa gang bsgom pa dang /brtson 'grus gang brtsom pa dang /bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /shes rab grang sgom pa de'ang ngar 'dzin pa
184b5(khri brgyad): dang /nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab bsgom par byed do//sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no sbyin pa 'di sbyin
184b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o//bdag ni sbyin pa dang ldan no//bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo //bdag gis tshul khrims bsgom par bya'o//bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan no//bdag gis
184b7(khri brgyad): bzod par bya'o//bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o//bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan no//bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams so//bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par
185a1(khri brgyad): bya'o//bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan no//bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/bdug gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o//bdag ni bsam
185a2(khri brgyad): gtan dang ldan no//bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo//bdag gis shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o//bdag ni shes rab dang ldan no snyam ste/de sbyin pa des rlom sems
185a3(khri brgyad): su byed do//sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed do//bdag gi sbyin pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /
185a4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang /shes rab rlom sems su byed do//shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do//bdag gi shes rab bo snyam du rlom sems su byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i
185a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/rnam par
185a6(khri brgyad): rtog pa de dog med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gau tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
185a7(khri brgyad): pa la'ang de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha mthar phyin pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni
185b1(khri brgyad): phyi mtha' yang mi shes pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir te/de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha/
185b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la/rnam pa
185b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su mo zin pas/nyan thos kyi sa drang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
185b4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la rigs
185b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing thabs la mi mkhas pas/tshul khrims bsrung
185b6(khri brgyad): bar byed thabs la mi mkhas pas bzod pa bsgom par byed thabs la mi mkhas pas/brtson 'grus brtsom par byed thabs la mi mkhas pas/bsam gtan la snyoms
185b7(khri brgyad): par 'jug par byed thabs la mi mkhas pas/shes rab bsgom par byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no 'di la sbyin par bya'o sbyin pa 'di
186a1(khri brgyad): sbyin par bya'o bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo //bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsom mo bdag gis bsam gtan la
186a2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug par bya'o//bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o//shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o snyam ste/de sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed/sbyin pas rlom
186a3(khri brgyad): sems su byed bdag ni sbyin pa po'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed do//tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/bdag ni tshul
186a4(khri brgyad): khrims dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//bzod pa rlom sems su byed bzod pas rlom sems su byed/bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems
186a5(khri brgyad): su byed do//brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//bsam
186a6(khri brgyad): gtan rlom sems su byed bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//shes rab rlom sems su
186a7(khri brgyad): byed/shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed do//da ci'i phyir zhe na/de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin
186b1(khri brgyad): du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mthar phyin pa yin la/de bzhin du sbyar te/'di
186b2(khri brgyad): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag
186b3(khri brgyad): med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha mthar phyin pa yin na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni phra mthar yang mi
186b4(khri brgyad): shes pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir ro//de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis yongs
186b5(khri brgyad): su ma zin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyo bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas/nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sor ltung bar 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
186b6(khri brgyad): nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas yongs
186b7(khri brgyad): su ma zin pas/nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
187a2(khri brgyad): byang chub thob par 'gyur zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yi ra 'dzin pa'i sems
187a3(khri brgyad): kyis sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed cing /shes rab kyi bar du bsgom par byed de/de 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin na sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o//'di la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/
187a4(khri brgyad): snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/de sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/bdag
187a5(khri brgyad): gi sbyin pa'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed bdag gis
187a6(khri brgyad): shes rab po snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /shes rab
187a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187b1(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du pha mthar phyin pa yin la/byang chub sems dpa' de'ang phra mtha' yang shes pha rol kyang shes te/rlom sems su mi byed pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
187b2(khri brgyad): zin pa yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
187b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin te/nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur
187b4(khri brgyad): zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin
187b5(khri brgyad): cing de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin te/nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//nag po'i phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po'i
187b6(khri brgyad): phyogs thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gru'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o///
187b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
188a1(khri brgyad): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a2(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par
188a3(khri brgyad): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
188a4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
188a5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen bkur bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha
188a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i bar du slob par 'dod pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsten par bya/bsnyen par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o//de dag kyang
188a7(khri brgyad): de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/rigs kyi bu tshur shog khyod kyis sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
188b1(khri brgyad): tu yongs su bsngos shig rigs kyi bu tshur shog khyod tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba dang /bzod pa sgom pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
188b2(khri brgyad): shes rab sgom pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs lngas
188b3(khri brgyad): rtog par ma byed cig/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa las rtog par ma byed cig/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
