188b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog
188b5(khri brgyad): par ma byed cig/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las rtog par ma byed cig/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu
188b6(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams las rtog par ma byed cig/mngon par shes pa lnga dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
188b7(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las rtog par ma byed cig/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med
189a1(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang rtog par ma byed cig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rtog par ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir
189a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/gzugs la mi rtog na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur zhing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la
189a3(khri brgyad): mi rtog na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
189a4(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rtog/nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med
189a5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi rtog/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi rtog/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /
189a6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam la mi rtog mngon par shes pa rnams dang /stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs
189a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi rtog na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
189b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa na/gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni 'dod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu khyod tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
189b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu rnam par shes pa mi 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu khyod sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
189b3(khri brgyad): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
189b5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa ma skyed cig/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/mngon
189b6(khri brgyad): par shes po lnga dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/rigs kyi bu
189b7(khri brgyad): khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang 'dod pa ma skyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'dod pa med cing /'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i
190a1(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rigs kyi bu khyod rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
190a2(khri brgyad): dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/byang chub sems dpe'i skyon med pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu byung
190a3(khri brgyad): chub ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
190a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
190a5(khri brgyad): gnyer zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
190a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin to/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/bla na
190a7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag ni
190b1(khri brgyad): dka' ba byed pa yin no//rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /rmi lam lta bur shes nas/bla na med pa yang
190b2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir yang dag
190b3(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin te/bdag 'jig rten gyi skyob par gyur cig/ces bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/'jig rten gyi skyabs
190b4(khri brgyad): su gyur cig 'jig rten gyi gnas dang /'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen dang /'jig rten gyi gling dang /'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa dang /'jig rten gyi rten du gyur cig ces
190b5(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la phan
190b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga lngas yongs su grol
190b7(khri brgyad): bar byas nas/mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
191a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//rab 'byor
191a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde
191a4(khri brgyad): ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad las grol bar byas nas/mya ngan las 'das pa 'jig pa med pa bde ba'i thang la 'god par byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
191a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
191a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyo bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi skyob pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a7(khri brgyad): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag las
191b1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams la skyob cing /de dag spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/de dag gis chos de thos nas/rim gyis theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
191b2(khri brgyad): te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi
191b3(khri brgyad): skyob pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar
191b4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
191b5(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i chos
191b6(khri brgyad): can rnams skye ba dang /rga ba dang na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol
191b7(khri brgyad): bar byed la/yongs su bkrol nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
192a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi skyabs yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar 'jig
192a2(khri brgyad): rten gyi gnas yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/rab 'byor de ltar
192a3(khri brgyad): nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas
192a4(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad 'dre ba ma mchis pa lugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs
192a5(khri brgyad): kyi 'dra ba med pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin te/de ni gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no//gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa yin te/de
192a6(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes po'i skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par
192a7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa yin te/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
192b1(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//rab 'byor byang chub
192b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/
192b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams lnga 'di skad du chos ston te/gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no//
192b4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
192b5(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes chos ston te/rab 'byor gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no//rab 'byor
192b6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad gzugs ji lta ba bzhin lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
192b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags sam/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis la/tshor ba dang /
193a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci 'dra ma mchis te/de bzhin du 'di ni gzugs so//'di ni tshor ba'o/
193a2(khri brgyad): 'di ni 'du shes so//'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so//'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bgyi ba dang /'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i bar du rnam pa
193a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na/rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin ni de de
193a4(khri brgyad): bzhin te/rab 'byor gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na/rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med de rab 'byor
193a5(khri brgyad): 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de lta bu dag la nges par sems shing zhum par yang mi 'gyur la de ltar chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par
193a6(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam ste/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos de dag ni 'di ltar zhi ba'o//'di ltar gya nom pa'o//
193a7(khri brgyad): zhes ston par byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
193b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
193b2(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/chu klung chen po rnams sam rgya mtsho chen po dag na/
193b3(khri brgyad): sa phyogs gang dag chus yongs su chod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//rab 'byor tshor ba
193b4(khri brgyad): drang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chud pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang
193b5(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de dag gis chos thams cad yongs su chad do//rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi
193b6(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang /dmigs su med pa dang /lam chad pa dang /sred pa zad pa dang /lhag ma med pa
193b7(khri brgyad): dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/de ni zhi ba'o de ni gya nom pa'o//de ni ji lta ba'i bdag nyid yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
194a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang
194a2(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par ston pa ni 'jig rten gyi gling yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
194a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dron par 'gyur zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
194a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams sems can gyi ris la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/gzugs skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
194a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa skye ba
194a6(khri brgyad): med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med par chos ston te/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad
194a7(khri brgyad): dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam
194b1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do//rang byang chub skye
194b2(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang /
194b3(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do//de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i
194b4(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do//rab 'byor de
194b5(khri brgyad): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams kyi yongs su
194b6(khri brgyad): 'dren par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ji ltar
194b7(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
195a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nas/gzugs ni nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes chos ston cing 'chad do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
195a2(khri brgyad): pa ni nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes sems can rnams la chos ston cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can no zhes chos ston to//gzugs kyi stong
195a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams kyi stong pa
195a4(khri brgyad): nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to//de
195a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/rab
195a6(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sngams can
195a7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/de dge tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
195b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mtshan
195b2(khri brgyad): ma med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul dri las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/smon pa med pa la
195b3(khri brgyad): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mngon par 'du byed pa
195b4(khri brgyad): med pa la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
195b5(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye ba med pa dang 'gog pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa
195b6(khri brgyad): la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lom lta bu'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rmi lam la 'gro ba
195b7(khri brgyad): 'am/'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can dang /mig yor lta bu'i tshul can dang /sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te/de dag ni
196a1(khri brgyad): tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sprul pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang dngos po med
196a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa la 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams
196a3(khri brgyad): cad ni mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul dri los mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mtha' yas mu med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab
196a4(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba med pa dang bstan pa med pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dbri ba med pa dang bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba
196a5(khri brgyad): 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i tshul can no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa'i tshul
196a6(khri brgyad): can no rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phrad pa med pa dang bral ba med pa dang 'dre ba med pa dang mi 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can te de dag
196a7(khri brgyad): ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bdag la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi tshul can no//
196b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang sheng las skyes pa dang shed bu dang byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang slong ba po dang shes pa po dang
196b2(khri brgyad): mthong ba po'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bdag gton med cing sems can dang srog dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag
196b3(khri brgyad): dang shed las skyes dang sheng bu dang byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang slong ba po dang shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'ang gtan med na/rab 'byor 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta dmigs par
196b4(khri brgyad): ga la 'gyur rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rtag pa ci'ang gtan med na/'gro ba'am
196b5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba lta ga la yod rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can dang /sdug pa'i tshul
196b6(khri brgyad): can te de dag ni tshul de lasu mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rtag pa dang bde ba dang /bdag dang /sdug pa gtan med na de dag gi 'gro ba'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod/
196b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i tshul can yin no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang bdag mod pa dang mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de
197a1(khri brgyad): las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mi rtag pa gtan med cing sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag med pa 'am/mi sdug pa gtan med na de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong
197a2(khri brgyad): ba lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po gtan
197a3(khri brgyad): med na 'dod chags lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po
197a4(khri brgyad): gtan med na/zhe sdang lta grwa la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gti mug
197a5(khri brgyad): gi dngos po gtan med na gti mug lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta bar gyur pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
197a6(khri brgyad): 'byor lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po gtan med na lta bar gyur pa lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//
197a7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can no//rab 'byor chos
197b1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang /bsdam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de
197b2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i tshul can te/de dag ni
197b3(khri brgyad): tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos 'ga' la'ang g.yo ba med pas 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul
197b4(khri brgyad): can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs gtan med na/de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
197b5(khri brgyad): ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gtan mi
197b6(khri brgyad): dmigs na/de'i 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de
197b7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan med na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can
198a1(khri brgyad): no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi
198a2(khri brgyad): 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med na/de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul
198a3(khri brgyad): can yin no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dngos po med pa'i ngo
198a4(khri brgyad): brobo nyid stong pa nyid gtan med na de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de
198a5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gtan med na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/yang dag par spong ba
198a6(khri brgyad): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
198a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba
198b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba
198b2(khri brgyad): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro
198b3(khri brgyad): ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir
198b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
198b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang
198b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod pa dang /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su smin par byas shing /dge ba'i
198b7(khri brgyad): rtsa ba bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya
199a2(khri brgyad): ste//bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o/////rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha
199a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang /rnam pa rnams dang mtshan ma rnams dang /rang bzhin du 'gyur ba gang lags/de skad ces gsol
199a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199a5(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di la/mos pa de dag ni 'dod chags bsil bas/dben pa'i rang bzhin can dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro///
199a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /gti
199a7(khri brgyad): mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang
199b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang
199b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs par gyur pa de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs pa de dag ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
199b4(khri brgyad): kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni sems
199b5(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi rten lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te de de bzhin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
199b6(khri brgyad): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di lta mos pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no//rab
199b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
200a1(khri brgyad): bar bya'o zhes go chad 'tshal la de la sems can dang sems can du gdagus pa'ang mi dmigs pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
200a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya dran las 'da'
200a3(khri brgyad): bar bya'o zhes go cha de bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no//de ci'i
200a4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan mod pa'i phyir te/de bas na gro cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no zhes bya'o//rab 'byor go cha de ni
200a5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
200a6(khri brgyad): gtan med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de bas na go cha de ni dam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no//rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag gi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin zhing /sems can dang srog dang
200a7(khri brgyad): skye ba po dang //gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang shed las skyes dang /sheng bu dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /slong ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po dang
200b1(khri brgyad): 'brel ba ma yin no//rab 'byor go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan
200b2(khri brgyad): med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
200b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar dang 'brel bapa ma yin no//rab 'byor kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gi 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su
200b4(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
200b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i
200b6(khri brgyad): gnas gnyis su mi mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma lags te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
200b7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//de
201a1(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa mtshams bkum ste/sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags pa'i
201a2(khri brgyad): slad du'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad
201a3(khri brgyad): du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
201a4(khri brgyad): sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o zhes zer/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
201a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can
201a6(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
201a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
201b1(khri brgyad): po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgros pa ma yin gyi/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
201b2(khri brgyad): ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir go cha bgos pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags te/
201b3(khri brgyad): de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/gang du'ang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab
201b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni gang bsgom pa dang /gang la bsgom pa dang /gang gis sgom pa'i chos 'ga' yongs su grub pa'ang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das 'di
201b5(khri brgyad): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad ma mchis pa bsgom
201b6(khri brgyad): pa legs so//'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni
201b7(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan
202a1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
202a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202a3(khri brgyad): byiphyin pa bsgom pa de ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
202a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/shes
202a5(khri brgyad): pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
202a6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi bsgom pa rnam
202a7(khri brgyad): par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
202b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
202b2(khri brgyad): pa lags so//'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
202b3(khri brgyad): lam bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//'di lta ste shes rab
202b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
202b6(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so///
202b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no///
203a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no//
203a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam zhes/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
203a3(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
203a4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
203a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag lus phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
203a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya ste/ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tA ma/ci phyir mi ldog
203a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni gzhan gyis smras pa dang gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am//
203b1(khri brgyad): ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
203b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa drag gis mi 'phrogs sum zhe sdang dang /gti mug
203b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de sbyin
203b4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
203b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/shes rab kyi pha
203b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa nA/mi sreg gam/mi dngang ngam/dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/zhum par mi 'gyur ram/'gong bar mi 'gyur ram/de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/
203b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi 'grel lam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon par dga' 'am/thos nas kyang 'dzin tam/
204a1(khri brgyad): 'chang ngam klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor phyir
204a2(khri brgyad): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi dus na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba byas pa dang /bzung ba dang /bcangs
204a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /klags pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
204a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing /zhum par mi 'gyur/'gong bar mi 'gyur te/
204a5(khri brgyad): yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
204a6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing //
204a7(khri brgyad): zhum par mi 'gyur 'gor bar mi 'gyur te de'i yid phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur ba lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
204b1(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa
204b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri la rnam par dpyad par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
204b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par
204b4(khri brgyad): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang /stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang /
204b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la bab pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no//rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang /smon pa med pa la
204b6(khri brgyad): gzhol ba dang /sems kyi rgyud nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med
204b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang /sems kyi rgyud de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
205a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no//rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud rmi
205a2(khri brgyad): lam lta bu la gzhol ba dang /sprul pa lta bu la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
205a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lnga rnam par dpyod pa yin/
205a4(khri brgyad): no zhes bgyi ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
205a5(khri brgyad): rnam par dpyod pa yin no zhes bka' stsal na/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/gzugs la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid pa lags sam/
205a6(khri brgyad): tsho ra ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la'ang rnam par dpyod par bgyid lags sam/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
205a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs
205b1(khri brgyad): la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor
205b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe no//rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams
205b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang ma byas/'gyur bar ma byas/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang ma song /gang na'ang mi 'dug la/yul na'ang mi gnas/phyogs na'ang mi gnas
205b4(khri brgyad): te/de la ni grangs dang /'gro ba dang /'ong ba mi dmigs la/gang la grangs dang /'ong ba dang /'gro ba mi dmigs pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
205b5(khri brgyad): mi nus te/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /
205b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs
205b7(khri brgyad): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa dang /tsher ba nyid dang /'du shes nyid dang /'du byed nyid dang /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin
206a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
206a2(khri brgyad): 'dri ni de bzhin nyid gcig gro/de bzhin du tsho ra ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
206a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig go/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin
206a4(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
206a5(khri brgyad): pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no//de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
206a6(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa las/'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brkyang stong pa/bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa/
206a7(khri brgyad): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma blangs shing /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dag blangs
206b1(khri brgyad): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su gtor to//gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
206b2(khri brgyad): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
206b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin grwa shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du
206b4(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
206b5(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
206b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin
206b7(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do zhes
207a1(khri brgyad): ston pa 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/brtag mi
207a2(khri brgyad): nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rlig pa lags te/'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa legs so//
207a3(khri brgyad): de skad ces gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha'i bu dag de de
207a4(khri brgyad): bzhin no de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du
207a5(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//de bzhin du
207a6(khri brgyad): sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
207a7(khri brgyad): dodang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi
207b1(khri brgyad): bAr gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//don
207b2(khri brgyad): gyi dbang de gzigs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te/chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kye ma 'di lta ste/de bzhin
207b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste brtag mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin la/zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang //
207b4(khri brgyad): 'dzangs pas rig pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par spangs ma rgyas shing /gang du'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
207b5(khri brgyad): rgyas te/gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do//lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa dang
207b6(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings zab pa dang /yang drag pa'i mtha' zab pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa dang /
207b7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /skye ba dang /'gag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
208a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /bdag zab pa nyid dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po//lha'i
208a2(khri brgyad): budag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo///
208a3(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i
208a4(khri brgyad): phyir chos 'di zab bo//nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//dran pa nye bar
208a5(khri brgyad): bzhag pa zab pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam zab pa'i phyir chos
208a6(khri brgyad): 'di zab bo//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang /rnam pa thams
208a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir/lha'i bu dag kye ma chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'jig rten thams cad dang mi
208b1(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/tshor
208b2(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
208b3(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar du bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i
208b4(khri brgyad): slad du'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma
208b5(khri brgyad): lags/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzung ba'i slad du
208b6(khri brgyad): bstan pa ma lags/mi bzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so//bdag ni gzugs so//bdag gi tshor ba'o//'du shes so//
208b7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams so//rnam par shes pa'o//bdag ni rnam par shes pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
209a1(khri brgyad): bu'o//bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag gi
209a2(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do//bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid do//bdag gi rang byang chub bo//bdag ni rang
209a3(khri brgyad): byang chub bo//bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
209a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag chos de ni gzugs bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/mi bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin no//
209a5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/mi bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin no//lha'i bu dag gang dag
209a6(khri brgyad): gzugs bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i skal ba med de/bsam
209a7(khri brgyad): gtan dang brtson 'grus dang bzod pa dang /tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsgom par mi nus so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
209b1(khri brgyad): bsgom par mi nus so//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags te/chos 'di ni chos gang dag dang mthun pa lags she na/
209b2(khri brgyad): chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
209b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang mthun pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid
209b4(khri brgyad): dang mthun pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad
209b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ci la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/gzugs la thogs pa ma
209b6(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
209b7(khri brgyad): la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa
210a1(khri brgyad): nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis pa
210a2(khri brgyad): dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis
210a3(khri brgyad): pa'i mtshan nyid lags so//chos 'di ni gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
210a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gog pa ma mchis
210a5(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du skye bo ma mchis pa lags so//chos 'di ni gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
210a6(khri brgyad): pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhi ma mchis pa lags so//
210a7(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod po na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom
210b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsams te/ston pa'i slad du'o//de
210b2(khri brgyad): nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab
210b3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so zhes smras pa ni ji ltar rjes su skyes pas/gnas brtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/de
210b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de
210b5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
210b6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni/rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na/granas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar
210b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam
211a1(khri brgyad): par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing /rnam par rtog pa med la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
211a2(khri brgyad): nyid gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la 'dra thogs pa med de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /chos
211a3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin nyid ni ma byas pa ste/de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang
211a4(khri brgyad): med de/gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med cing /nam yang de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su
211a5(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
211a6(khri brgyad): ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med
211a7(khri brgyad): do//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa/dmigs su med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su
211b1(khri brgyad): red pa'o//de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa ste/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
211b2(khri brgyad): rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
211b3(khri brgyad): las gud na yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing de ni rtag tu de bzhin nyid do//gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste
211b4(khri brgyad): de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang glang du'ang skyes pa med do//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs
211b5(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin no//de bzhin du gnas brtan rab
211b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o//
211b7(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
212a1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
212a2(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid
212a3(khri brgyad): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid
212a4(khri brgyad): de/de ltar na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//
212a5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du
212a6(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang /
212a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam
212b1(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
212b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyisku bdag gi de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin du shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
212b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do//de ltar na bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang /shes
212b4(khri brgyad): pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
212b5(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs
212b6(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin
212b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
213a1(khri brgyad): dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med
213a2(khri brgyad): de gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin
213a3(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams
213a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do//de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis
213a5(khri brgyad): su dbyer med do//lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
213a6(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes so//de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
213a7(khri brgyad): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'gul rab tu 'gul-i/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so//ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldag
213b1(khri brgyad): go/chem chem rab tu chemachem/kun tu rab tu chem tshim mo//'ura'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur ro//'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//shar
213b2(khri brgyad): phyogs mtho na/nub phyogs dma'o//nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o//byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o//lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o//mtha' mtho na
213b3(khri brgyad): dbus dma'o//dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsun+dan
213b4(khri brgyad): gyi phye ma dag gis gtor mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor nas/'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dri de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
213b5(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes tshig tu brjod do//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi
213b6(khri brgyad): rgyud nas bzung ste/lha'i bu de dag lnga 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma
213b7(khri brgyad): skyes so//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang rnam par
214a1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam par shes pa'i
214a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan
214a3(khri brgyad): gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so///
214a4(khri brgyad): 'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus byos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su
214a5(khri brgyad): ma skyes so//'dus ma byos kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin
214a6(khri brgyad): nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang gis rjes su spyod pa dang /gang rjes su skye ba'i chos de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom
214a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
214b1(khri brgyad): dang /chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni zab pa ste/de la
214b2(khri brgyad): ni gzugs mi dmigs gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/de la ni tshor ba dang /'du
214b3(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i
214b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/de bzhin du sbyar te/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
214b5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis
214b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni zab pa ste/de la gzugs mi dmigs gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs
214b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/de la tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs//
215a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i dri bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur//
215a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
215a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur te/de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhon ma
215a4(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la
215a5(khri brgyad): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
215a6(khri brgyad): nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la
215a7(khri brgyad): bsnyen bkur byas te/thams cad du sbyin pa byin tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan bskyed/shes rab bsgoms
215b1(khri brgyad): kyang /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pas/'di ltar spyad de/'di ni sbyin pa'o 'di la sbyin par bya'o//bdag
215b2(khri brgyad): gis tshul khrims 'di bsrung ngo //bzod pa 'di bsgom mo//brtson 'grus 'di brtsam mo//bsam gtan 'di la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o//shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/
215b3(khri brgyad): snyam du de ltar spyod pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin pasra/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang brtson 'grus
215b4(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab bsgom zhing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs la spyod pas tha dad pa med pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir/de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
215b5(khri brgyad): la ma zhugs so//de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo//shA ri'i bu gzhan
215b6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam stong pa nyid dam/mtshan ma med pa'am/smon pa med pa yod mod kyi de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
215b7(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom
216a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgoms su 'dra'ang thabs la mkhas
216a2(khri brgyad): pa dang bral ba dag yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong pa
216a3(khri brgyad): nyid dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
216a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
216a5(khri brgyad): sems dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing /thabs la mkhas pa la ma brten pas nyan thos dang rang sangs
216a6(khri brgyad): rgyas su 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang
216a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing /thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug cing /bla na med
216b1(khri brgyad): pra yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/'dab chags bya zhig lus dpag tshad brgya 'am/lus dpag tshad
216b2(khri brgyad): nyis brgya 'am/dpag tshad sum brgya 'am/dpag tshad bzhi brgya 'am/dpage tshud lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/de sum cu rna gsum gyi lha'i ris nas/dzam+b+hi'i gling du 'ong bar
216b3(khri brgyad): sems la byed 'dra 'dab mamed pa zhig yin zhing /de sum cu rtsa gsumA g+hi wA'irI ris nas bdag nyid mchongs te/dzam+bi'i gling du 'gro bar bya bar sems la gal te byangs
216b4(khri brgyad): lam lhung bar 'di snyam du sems te/ma la bdag sum cu rje gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems ni shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/byed phyir sum cu
216b5(khri brgyad): gsum gyi lha'i nang du gnas par nus snyam mam/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thogs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
216b6(khri brgyad): glal te de bar de nas 'di snyam du ma la bdagra ma smras ma snad par dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par bye'o snyam du bsamAn shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/byi de ma smras ma sna pa dzam+b+ha'i
216b7(khri brgyad): gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam/shA ri'i bus gsil pa bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thogs lags te/bcom ldan 'das bya de ni smras pa'om snad par ying 'gyu
217a1(khri brgyad): dzam+bu'i gling du ma mchis par 'gum pa 'am/'gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di
217a2(khri brgyad): ltar de ni lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis shing /mthon po zhig nas mchongs pas/de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
217a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sbyin pa sbyin par byed/tshul khrims srung /bzod pa sgom/brtson 'grus com/bsam gtan
217a4(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/de'i 'jug pa'ang che/sems bskyed pa'ang
217a5(khri brgyad): che/phan gdags par bsam pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
217a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar sbyin pa byin//
217a7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan bskyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la
217b1(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur te/des na nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
217b2(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la sems
217b3(khri brgyad): shing /kun tu 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i bar du mi shes na/de mi
217b4(khri brgyad): shes shing khong du ma chud pas/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i sgra thos na/zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/mtshan mar bzung nas/bla na med pa yang
217b5(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do//de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
217b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
217b7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ni de ltar 'gyur te/de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo //shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
218a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/tshul
218a2(khri brgyad): khrims srung /bzod pa sgrub/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste//
218a3(khri brgyad): 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i
218a4(khri brgyad): ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting
218a5(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar
218a6(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma
218a7(khri brgyad): bzung /tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgrubs/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /'das
218b1(khri brgyad): pa dang ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye
218b2(khri brgyad): shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu
218b3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /bsam gtan la snyoms par
218b4(khri brgyad): 'jug pa dang /shes rab bsgom pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
218b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/byang chub sems
