318b2(khri brgyad): sbyar te/rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la bkod cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par
318b3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur
318b4(khri brgyad): snyam mAm/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
318b5(khri brgyad): 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas shing /gzhan dag la'ang shes rab kyi
318b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par byed/ston par byed/'dogs par byed/'god par byed/rnam par 'grel por byed/rnam par 'byed par byed/gsal bar byed
318b7(khri brgyad): cing yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa do/ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
319a1(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
319a2(khri brgyad): ba'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i sems can gang yang med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i
319a3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub par byed cing /de dag shes rab kyi pha
319a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sems can thams cad bsad par gyur po lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/de dag snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub par
319a5(khri brgyad): byed de/de dag gnos pa des gnas shing /dga' bas rab tu dga' bar byed cing /de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub par byed kyang /de dag mtshan
319a6(khri brgyad): ma de dang lhan cig mi gnas par de dag btang snyoms chen po thob par byed pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
319a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yin te/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i snang ba dang /bsam gautan dang /brtson 'grus dang /bzod pa dang /tshul
319b1(khri brgyad): khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba yin no//rigs kyi bu de dag ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang /sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i
319b2(khri brgyad): gnas su gyur po'ang yin la/blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog go//glang gis gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /sten dang
319b3(khri brgyad): na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag yongs su spyad na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas la/sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag
319b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi sbyin pa de dag yongs su sbyong zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yong nye bar gyur pas na/de'i yo byad de dag ni 'bras bu che ba dang /phon yon cha
319b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de lta bso na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par spyod par 'dod pa dang /sems
319b6(khri brgyad): can thams cad la la mo nye bar ston par 'dod pa dang /snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pa dang /sems can bcings par gyur pa rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa
319b7(khri brgyad): dang /sems can thams cad la bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig nye bar ston par 'dod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas
320a1(khri brgyad): par bya'o//rab 'byor gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis yid
320a2(khri brgyad): la byed cing gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis yid la byed na des shes rab kyi pha
320a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi gtam yang brjod par bya'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi gtam brjod nas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol
320a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi yid la byed pa dag yid la bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis yid la byed pas gnas pa des yid la byed pa gzhan
320a5(khri brgyad): dag gis go skabs mi dbye bar ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis brtson pa mi btang bar nyin mtshan du gnas par byed pa de
320a6(khri brgyad): ltar bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i mi zhig yod la/des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po tsha rnyed par gyur te/
320a7(khri brgyad): dos nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas/dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /yid bde ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur pa las des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag
320b1(khri brgyad): tu stor bar gyur na/de gzhi de las sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mI bde bu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par/e ma'o kye hud bdag ni nor bu rin po che
320b2(khri brgyad): de dang bral bar gyur to/snyam du nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
320b3(khri brgyad): pos kyang 'di ni rin po che yin no snyam du bsam zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang mi 'bral bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa da
320b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyid pa thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba lags la/yid la bgyid
320b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
320b6(khri brgyad): la brji pa dag dang ma bral bar gyur pa lags/bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' dang yid la bgyid pa dag dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dmigs su
320b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems
321a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de dag ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis
321a2(khri brgyad): ma byas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/chos kyi dbyings dang /chos glanas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang //
321a3(khri brgyad): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
321a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben
321a5(khri brgyad): zhing /rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas na/de la rnam par 'phel ba med cing yongs su 'gri bo pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das//
321a6(khri brgyad): gal te shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing /rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
321a7(khri brgyad): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgrub par bgyis shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
321b1(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
321b2(khri brgyad): bsgrub kyang /rnam par 'phel ba 'am/yongs su 'grib pa med de/yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang rnam par 'phel ba 'am/yongs su 'grib po med la/chos kyi
321b3(khri brgyad): dbyings la'adra rnam par 'phel ba'am/yongs su 'grib pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/gcig kyang ma yin la gnyis
321b4(khri brgyad): kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gal te de ltar bsten pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong /mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang
321b5(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po do ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas shing mthar thug par 'gro ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
321b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
321b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gso ba nyid dang /ya ma brla nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/shes
322a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
322a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos 'ga' yang dmigs su mchis lags sam bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni
322a3(khri brgyad): ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//
322a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod lags sam/bka' sprul pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das stong pa
322a5(khri brgyad): nyid las gzhan pa zhig stong pa nyid la spyod lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs shes rab kyi pha
322a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags
322a7(khri brgyad): sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags
322b1(khri brgyad): sam/de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/
322b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /yA mo brla nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba
322b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang chos kyis dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag
322b4(khri brgyad): pApa'i mtha' gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/bka' stsol pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du
322b5(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /ya ma brla nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol
322b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
322b7(khri brgyad): mi spyod lags na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/de skad ces
323a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis chos gang
323a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mamra/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab
323a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis gang la byang chub sems dpas spyad par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mam/gsol pa/
323a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis gang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i chos de la chos 'ga' zhig dmigs
323a5(khri brgyad): su yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/chos gang dmigs su med pa de la skye ba 'am
323a6(khri brgyad): 'gag par 'gyur ba yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
323a7(khri brgyad): po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin te/rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
323b1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa'
323b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgrub cing de ltar spyod pa dang /de ltar 'bad cing de ltar brtsol bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes dang /ye shes
323b3(khri brgyad): chen po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
323b4(khri brgyad): chen po de mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas na/'di ltar de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de la gzhol
323b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos
323b6(khri brgyad): thams cad skye ba'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur lags sam/bka' stsal
323b7(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
324a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
324a2(khri brgyad): gal te skye ba'i slad du'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mi 'gyur la/skye ba ma mchis pa'i
324a3(khri brgyad): slad du 'ong ma lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
324a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis
324a5(khri brgyad): chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
324a6(khri brgyad): te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/bcom
324a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
324b1(khri brgyad): rgya ba dang /gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
324b2(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa ni 'di snyam du bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
324b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//'dis mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
324b4(khri brgyad): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la rnam par rtog pa/de dag thams cad du mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe
324b5(khri brgyad): na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/rnam par rtog pa spang bar bstan
324b6(khri brgyad): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bram po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa//de nas bcom
324b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/shin tu dben pa nyid kyi slad du shes rab kyi
325a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa/mthong bar dka' ba/khong du chud par dka' ba/brtags mi nus pa/rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa/zhib mo
325a2(khri brgyad): brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig par bgyi ba'i bar dag lags te/bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa
325a3(khri brgyad): dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par bgyid cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
325a4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gis skabs mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags
325a5(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/kau shi ka gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin
325a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
325a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no//kau shi ka
325b1(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur cing /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa
325b2(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin
325b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed la bzung zhing bcangs la/bklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed na/kau shi ka
325b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//skyong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs dang cha dang /
325b5(khri brgyad): bgrang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de nas dge slong zhig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//ko shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu ma
325b6(khri brgyad): gang dag g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog la kun chub par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par
325b7(khri brgyad): byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag gi skabs mi
326a1(khri brgyad): 'byed pa/de dag gis ni dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang /tshad med
326a2(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag zil gyis non pa yin no//de skad ces smras
326a3(khri brgyad): pA dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so//dge slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang dzam+bu'i
326a4(khri brgyad): gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
326a5(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag zil gyi sa non na gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'ching
326a6(khri brgyad): ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing /kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag gis lta
326a7(khri brgyad): smos kyang ci dgos te/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
326b1(khri brgyad): ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin
326b2(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nyi tshe zil gyis non par 'gyur ba'ang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong
326b3(khri brgyad): ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /rang
326b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha
326b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang mi ljon zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dgro thams cad kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//ga dag sbyin pa'i
326b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
326b7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang mi ldan zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//
327a1(khri brgyad): gang dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/byang chub sems
327a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la
327a3(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang mi ldan zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dag kyang zil gyis non por 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
327a4(khri brgyad): ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni lce dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis non par mi nus so//byang chub
327a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su
327a6(khri brgyad): 'jug pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdung rgyun mi chad par byed par gnas pa yin no//byang chub
327a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgrub pa de dag ni
327b1(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi snying po las ldog par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can bying ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa yin no//byang chub
327b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste nyan thos kyi bsgrub pa la slob pa ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas kyi
327b3(khri brgyad): bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang 'gro bar sems shing 'ongs nas
327b4(khri brgyad): kyang 'di skad du skyen par slobs shig/myur du slobs shig/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i
327b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bzhes pa yin pas khyod byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
327b6(khri brgyad): nas kyang blang bar bya ba yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i drung du rgyal po chen po
327b7(khri brgyad): bzhi po dag kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i'o ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//kho bo'ang sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems
328a1(khri brgyad): so//lha'i bu rab 'thub bral yang /'thab bral ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi
328a2(khri brgyad): lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//de bzhin du lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang /lha'i bu dbang sgyur dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang tshangs ris kyi
328a3(khri brgyad): lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//de bzhin du lha'i bu 'od gsol yang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//de bzhin du
328a4(khri brgyad): dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che dang /mi che dang /mi gdung dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom snang dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'gro bar sems
328a5(khri brgyad): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mi 'di la spyod pa de la ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
328a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
328a7(khri brgyad): mo 'di la spyod pa de'i lus la ni/'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad kyi
328b1(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//dge slong 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
328b2(khri brgyad): 'di la spyod pa de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan yin no//de'i lus la 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/mig nad dang /rna ba'i nad dang /sna nad dang /lce nang
328b3(khri brgyad): dang /so nod dang /lus kyi nad dang /sems kyi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
328b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'di'i yon tan du shes par bya ba yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ci lha'i
328b5(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin 'di dag rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/'on te sangs rgyas kyis mthus ston snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
328b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa kun dga' bo
328b7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar kho bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
329a1(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo de de bzhin no rje de bzhin te/'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de
329a2(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs yin no//kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
329a3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/stong
329a4(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can de dag thams cad 'di snyam du ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha'
329a5(khri brgyad): mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing /yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ram/lan cig phyir
329a6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ram/rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/'on te bla
329a7(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam du the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi
329b1(khri brgyad): tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/bdud sdig can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro//
329b2(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spu bkong bar bya ba dang /spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /sems zhum
329b3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba'i phyir/skar mda' gtong zhing
329b4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bskyed par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' blos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ongs ci byang chub sems dpa'
329b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' tshon po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
329b6(khri brgyad): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin te/kun dga' bo byang chub sems
329b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig gi drung du ni bdud sdig can the 'tsham pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro//kha cig gi drung du ni 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bos
330a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu dag gi drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas mchi bar
330a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/ji lta bu dag gi drung du ni mchi bar mi 'gyur lpags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
330a3(khri brgyad): gang dag sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/sems mos par ma gyur pa de dag gi drung du ni bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pas
330a4(khri brgyad): 'ong bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/'di shes rab kyi pha rol
330a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yin nam/'on te 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin snyam du the tshom za bar gyur na/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
330a6(khri brgyad): de dag gi drung du'ang /bdud sdig can tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i
330a7(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur na/des dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag mi mthong bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so//ma thos na mi shes
330b1(khri brgyad): pas/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsgom par byazhes de bzhin nyid du sgrub par mi byed do//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
330b2(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/dam pa ma yin pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed de/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la'ang/
330b3(khri brgyad): bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi
330b4(khri brgyad): bsngags pa brjod na/de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi bsngags pa brjod pa 'di ni bdag gi grogs yin te gang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kyi
330b5(khri brgyad): bsngags pa brjod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po dag gis nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
330b6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag kyang /'di lta ste/sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag la gnas par 'gyur bas na/'di ni bdag gis bsam pa yongs
330b7(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par byed pa yin no snyam du sems so//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu dag la bdud sdig can gyis glags
331a1(khri brgyad): rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
331a2(khri brgyad): bstan/ gas rab kyi par mi hU~M sbyin pa pa sa 'dim nyan pa /shid hU~M dang /grang ba dang / pa /glen chu bar byub dru /ses
331a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs par byas te/ci rung ngas kyang da dung 'di'i gting ma rnyed na/khyod kyis lta rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes zer na/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
331a4(khri brgyad): chen po de la'ang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
331a5(khri brgyad): la rlom sems su byed de/kho bo ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin gyi/khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//de bzhin du
331a6(khri brgyad): sbyar te/kho bo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa yin gyi/khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed
331a7(khri brgyad): no/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
331b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po bdag la bstod par sems na/de'i tshe bdud sdig can dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang yid rangs pa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba dang yid
331b2(khri brgyad): bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la'ang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan
331b3(khri brgyad): yang gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpe'i ming smos sam/rus smos te/yongs su bsgrags nas/ming smos pa 'am/rus smos pa des de la sa gzhan pa'i byung
331b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' nges pa dge ba'i chos can dag la rlom sems su byed cing /bdag bstod par byed/gzhan smod par byed la/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
331b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /rtags dang mtshan ma gang yin pa'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med la/de rnam pa dang /rtags dang /mtshan
331b6(khri brgyad): ma de dag med bzhin du nyon mongs pa bskyed cing bdag la stod par byed/gzhan la smod par byed de/ji ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /byang chub
331b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i rigs la yang dag par snang ba ltar/khyod ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /byang chub sems dpo'i rigs la yang dag par mi snang ngo zhes/de des
332a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la brnyas shing spyod par byed na/de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas kyang sbyongs par mi 'gyur
332a2(khri brgyad): lA/sems can+d+ra dmyal ba chen po dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gu shrI ni rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul dag kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems
332a3(khri brgyad): shing /bdud sdig can gyis ci nas kyang /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshig bzung bar 'os par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlob par byed do//de'i tshig bzung bar
332a4(khri brgyad): 'os pa/de la 'gro ba mang po dag kyang mnyan par bya bar sems te/de dag gis de la mnyan cing /dad par bya bar bsams pas de dag gis mthong ba na mthun par
332a5(khri brgyad): byed de/de dag gis de mthong nas rjes su mthun par spyod cing de dag dri bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pas/nyon mongs pa
332a6(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'gyur te/de ltar dri dag sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi las gang dang /gang brtsams pa de thams cad kyang mi 'dod pa dang /
332a7(khri brgyad): mi sdug pa dang /yid du mi 'ong ba nyid du 'gyur te/de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin
332b1(khri brgyad): rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro//bdud kyi gnas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te/kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas nA/bdud sdig
332b2(khri brgyad): can yid rangs pa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyo bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
332b3(khri brgyad): grang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang lhan cig rtsod par byed na/de lo bdud sdig can 'di snyam du/u lA la rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
332b4(khri brgyad): nyid ring du byed pa yin te/'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'thab mo dang /ma tshang 'bru ba dang /'thab
332b5(khri brgyad): pu dang /rtsod pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mr-i yin gyi 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam yin la/'di ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /grwa shin
332b6(khri brgyad): rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam yin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
332b7(khri brgyad): zag gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan dang /'thab mo dang /mchong 'bye ba dang /'thab pa dang rtsod pa dag byed par gyur na/de la bdud
333a1(khri brgyad): sdig can 'di snyam du 'di gnyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa yin te/'di gnyis kyis ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
333a2(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
333a3(khri brgyad): kyi lam ma yin te/gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam
333a4(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo//kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa zhig lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems kyi
333a5(khri brgyad): sems bskrad par byed cing /'thab mo dang /'khrug long dang /'ching 'bra dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed par byed la gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
333a6(khri brgyad): nyid yongs su ma btang na/des ji snyed du 'thab mo dang /'tshang 'bru ba dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi bskal par des go cha
333a7(khri brgyad): bgo bar bya dgos so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
333b1(khri brgyad): sems bskyed pa de dag la nges par 'byung ba mchis sam/'on te de snyed kyi bskal pa kho nar go cha bgo bar bgyi 'tshal lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
333b2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo ngas ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
333b3(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/kun dga' bo de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag/
333b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /khro ba dang /spyo bar byed cing 'thabs shing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang chags par mi
333b5(khri brgyad): byed par mdud par 'dzin cing /bag la nyal bas gnas par byed na/kun dga' bo gang zag de la ni nges par 'byung ba yod par nga mi spro ste/gang zag des ni gal
333b6(khri brgyad): te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong na/de snyed kyi bskal par gdon mi za bar go cha bgo bar bya dgos so//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
333b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos 'thabs shing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang 'chags par byed cing /bag la nyal bas mi gnas te/bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nges
334a1(khri brgyad): par thob ste/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na smras pa la bdag gis phyir smra ba dang /'di ltar bdag sems can thams
334a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlog pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gi de ltar mi byi bar/bdag lug ltar lkug par bya zhing
334a3(khri brgyad): mi smra bar bya'o//bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dkrug par mi bya ste/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
334a4(khri brgyad): kyang /sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na/de bdag nyid la bdag gnod sems bskyed pa dang /de bdag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa
334a5(khri brgyad): byed pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de dag la gnod sems mi skyed cing /bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o zhes phyin chad kyang sdom pa 'dzin par byed na/kun
334a6(khri brgyad): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no zhes nga smra ste/de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur
334a7(khri brgyad): ro//kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o//gal te
334b1(khri brgyad): gnas na'ang gang la'ang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang gi phyir 'di dag la gnod sems bskyed pa 'am/'khrug par bya ba ni
334b2(khri brgyad): bdag la rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par songs
334b3(khri brgyad): rgyas nas/sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya dgos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
334b4(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du ji ltar gnas par bgyi
334b5(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ston pa la ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
334b6(khri brgyad): theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du gnas par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni bdag gi grogs yin te theg pa cig la zhugs pa yin zhing 'dis ji ltar bslab par
334b7(khri brgyad): bya ba de ltar bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos la/'dis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de
335a1(khri brgyad): la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro//gal te 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas
335a2(khri brgyad): 'dres par gnas na/bdag gis de la bslab par mi bya'i/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
335a3(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas ni/bdag gis kyang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam ste/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
335a4(khri brgyad): ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o///
335a5(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa
335a6(khri brgyad): nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
335a7(khri brgyad): 'byor nang stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
335b1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid yin no//gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
335b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang byang chub kyis stong ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin te/mnyam pa nyid de
335b3(khri brgyad): la gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rab 'byor gyis
335b4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'o slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa
335b5(khri brgyad): lags sam/gzugs 'dod chagos dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/gzugs 'gog pa'i slad du
335b6(khri brgyad): slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
335b7(khri brgyad): legs sam/de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam//
336a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/tshor ba
336a2(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/skye
336a3(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis pa'i bar gyi slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/byang chub kyi bar du bos par bgyi ba dang /'dod chags
336a4(khri brgyad): dang bral ba dang /'gog pa dang /skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la slob pa lags sam/de bzhin du thams cad
336a5(khri brgyad): la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor
336a6(khri brgyad): gang yang khyod 'di skad du/gang gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/skye ba med pa'i bar du slob
336a7(khri brgyad): na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nom/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir
336b1(khri brgyad): slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/byang chub kyi bar
336b2(khri brgyad): du zad par bya ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gog pa dang /skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam/de
336b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes
336b4(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
336b5(khri brgyad): bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdagos pa'i ngo bzhin nyid de la zad pa 'am/'gag pa 'am/'bri bar 'gyur ba
336b6(khri brgyad): yod snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
336b7(khri brgyad): sprul pa/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa
337a1(khri brgyad): yin te/de bzhin nyid la ni zad pa 'am/'gag pa 'am/'bri bar 'gyur ba'ang med do//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
337a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
337a3(khri brgyad): ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la slob pa yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dang /
337a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa thams
337a5(khri brgyad): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
337a6(khri brgyad): kyis thul bar mi nus pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur ba nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i rjes su thob par 'gyur
337a7(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi tha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor de
337b1(khri brgyad): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mun pa med par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
337b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa
337b3(khri brgyad): chen po la slob pa yin/snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dag
337b4(khri brgyad): la slob pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lan gsum du bzlas te/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i phyir slob
337b5(khri brgyad): pa yin na/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin no//rab 'byor
337b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin no//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
337b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo rnam par dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin
338a1(khri brgyad): te/rab 'byor sems can dman pa rnams kyis ni bslab pa 'di la slob par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la
338a2(khri brgyad): slob pa/de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las 'don par 'dod pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal
338a3(khri brgyad): bar mi skye'o//dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yul mtha' 'khob rnams su mi skye'o//gdol pa'i rigs rnams su mi skye'o//zhar bar ma
338a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur/'thed par mi 'gyur 'on par mi 'gyur lba ba can du mi 'gyur/gzhogs phyed skam par mi 'gyur/dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te/dbang po yongs su rdzogs
338a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur zhing /yongs su ma rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//srog gcod par mi 'gyur/log par lta ba'i bar du mi 'gyur/log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro//
338a6(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do//tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do//rab
338a7(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/lha tshe ring po rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thobs la mkhas pa
338b1(khri brgyad): gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /gzugs med
338b2(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug kyang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang
338b3(khri brgyad): gis mi skye ba'i thabs la mkhas pa de la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang spangs
338b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi so yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag po rtogs par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe
338b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/byang chub sems dpa'
338b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa rtog par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin to/de de bzhin no//ji skad
338b7(khri brgyad): smras pa de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/byang chub sems dpa'
339a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
339a2(khri brgyad): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas/sems can de dag gi don du/byang chub sems dpa'
339a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod de/rab 'byor chos thams cad la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub
339a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
339a5(khri brgyad): po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sa chen po'i phyogs dag na gang na dzam+bu chu
339a6(khri brgyad): bo'i gser gyi sa le sbram dang /dngul dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni nyung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang dag 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
339a7(khri brgyad): bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni nyung gi/sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa de dag ni de bas ches mang ngo //rab 'byor
339b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/dper na/sems can gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/gnas pa de dag ni nyung gi/sems can gang dag khams//
339b2(khri brgyad): kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/gnos pa de dag ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 'di
339b3(khri brgyad): la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni nyung gi/sems can gang dag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor byang chub
339b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
339b5(khri brgyad): po gang dag de bzhin nyid la sgrub pa dag ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang gang dag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor byang chub
339b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de dag pas ni/gang dag phyir mi ldog
339b7(khri brgyad): pa'i sa gnon par mi 'gyur ba dag ches mang ngo //rab 'byor de lta bos na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang
340a1(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa'i sar bgrang bar chud par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
340a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ser sna dang ljon pa'i sems mi bskyed do//'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems
340a3(khri brgyad): mi bskyed do//'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//rnam par g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//'chal pa'i
340a4(khri brgyad): shes rob dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//'dod tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi
340a5(khri brgyad): bskyed do//tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
340a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub kyi bar dang ldan pa'o sems mi bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
340a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ma dmigs pas chos gang la'ang sems bskyed par mi byed pa'i//
340b1(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yang dag par
340b2(khri brgyad): bzung ba yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no//da ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
340b3(khri brgyad): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po
340b4(khri brgyad): dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang du 'dus so//rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i nang du 'dus so//rab 'byor
340b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/'chi ba'i dus byas pas srog gi dbang po 'gag na dbang po thams cad kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
340b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su song ba yin no//rab 'byor de lta bos na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
340b7(khri brgyad): po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
341a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar skyob pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
341a2(khri brgyad): du sems/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dgra 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling
341a3(khri brgyad): gi sems can nyid kyang mang ba lags na/gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/mang lags so//
341a4(khri brgyad): bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams
341a5(khri brgyad): cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
341a6(khri brgyad): chen po zhig gis ji srid 'tshe'i bar du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad re re la na bza' dang /bshos dang /
341a7(khri brgyad): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byas na rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems
341b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom
341b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bos kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa
341b3(khri brgyad): dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dgra ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di 'di ltar byang chub
341b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i don chen po byed pa'i phyir ro//rab
341b5(khri brgyad): 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du
341b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /mun pa can
341b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas nyid rjes su thob par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul du phyin par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol
342a1(khri brgyad): pas rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnga bo che brdung bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par/
342a2(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam zer bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la de ltar bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
342a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi 'thob pa gang yang med pa'i phyir/
342a4(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs
342a5(khri brgyad): pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum
342a6(khri brgyad): tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya mod kyi/de la gnas par mi bya/brten par mi bya ste/shes pa dang /mthong bas rnam par bltas nas/shin tu 'da' bar bya ste/byang chub sems
342a7(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin
342b1(khri brgyad): te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de ltar bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin
342b2(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa'i
342b3(khri brgyad): gnas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no//rab 'byor de
342b4(khri brgyad): ltar bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
342b5(khri brgyad): pa dang ma bral ba yin no//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
342b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis ring du byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
342b7(khri brgyad): chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin no//gal te de 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis
343a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam du gal te de ltar kun tu shes par byed na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//gal
343a2(khri brgyad): te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar kun tu shes pa med de/gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur
343a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
343a4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes/mi mthong la/gal te yang de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i
343a5(khri brgyad): phyir 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin/'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'ang ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis chos gang yang nges par
343a6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med do snyam du sems na/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
343a7(khri brgyad): yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong po las/spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
343b1(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du sems te/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
343b2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
343b3(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pas kyang /sems can thams cad zil gyis non par 'gyur na/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
343b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing /'tsho ba legs
343b5(khri brgyad): par 'tsho ba yin na/gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
343b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni 'dod par bya ba yin no//sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
343b7(khri brgyad): dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man+dA ra ba dag blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang //me tog
344a1(khri brgyad): man+ta ra ba de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//mngon par rab tu gtor
344a2(khri brgyad): to//gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bla na
344a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
344a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/rang byung gi chos 'di dag nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/'odis zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs
344a5(khri brgyad): par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/
344a6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang
344a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub las slar ldog cing /nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ge' tsam yang skye bo ma
344b1(khri brgyad): mchis te/gzhan du na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni da ltar 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sdug
344b2(khri brgyad): bsngal 'di dag mthong nas 'di ltar sems bskyed par bgyid de/bdag brgal nus ma rgal ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar bsgral bar bgyi/bdag grol nas ma grol ba'i sems
344b3(khri brgyad): can rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bgyi ba dag dbugs phyin nas dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
344b4(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi zhes/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa bskyed/
344b5(khri brgyad): par brjid cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam rgya chen po dag kyang 'debs par bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
344b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
344b7(khri brgyad): yun ring du spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
345a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
345a2(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
345a3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni srang la gzhal bas tshad bzung du rung yang srid
345a4(khri brgyad): kyi/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis bsod nams kyi tshad ni de lta ma yin no//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
345a5(khri brgyad): ni srang la gzhal bas tshad bzung du rung yang srid kyi/rjes su yi rang ba'i mong lus byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni de lta ma yin no//kau shi ka
345a6(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po dag ni skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa re re nas bcu zhing tshad bzung du rung yang
345a7(khri brgyad): srid kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis bsod nams kyi tshad ni de lta ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
345b1(khri brgyad): 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni
345b2(khri brgyad): bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs lags
345b3(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa lags so//de ci'i
345b4(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba mngon par sgrub cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
345b5(khri brgyad): tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyid pa de/de dag ni bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis bla na med pa yang
345b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag la ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba lags so//gang dag gis sangs rgyas yongs
345b7(khri brgyad): su ma btang ba dang /chos yongs su ma btang ba dang /dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis kyang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang por bgyi'o//
346a1(khri brgyad): de dag gis rjes su yi rangs nas kyang /ci nas kyang gnyis su 'du shes su 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /gnyis ma lags pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba ma
346a2(khri brgyad): mchis pa de ltar/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/
346a3(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/kau shi ka gang sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni myur ba nyid du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
346a4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing /mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs phyung bar byed par mi 'gyur ro//de ltar sems bskyed
346a5(khri brgyad): pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de dag ni/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag dang der yang bsti stang du bya bar 'gyur/bla mar bya ba
346a6(khri brgyad): dang /ri mor bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro//nam du'ang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur/dri/
346a7(khri brgyad): yid du mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur/r-i yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur/reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur/chos yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par shes par
346b1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//nam du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom
346b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par yang 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
346b3(khri brgyad): gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po grangs med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ba byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag
346b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa dang /sa dang po la gnas pa rnams dang /sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dang /sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa rnams kyi
346b5(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa dang /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi
346b6(khri brgyad): rang ba byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro//de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag
346b7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro//de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /sems can tshad med
347a1(khri brgyad): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
347a2(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
347a3(khri brgyad): tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ci nas kyang sems de la'ang ma yin zhing /sems gzhan la'ang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems
347a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang /phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bo de dag po'ang rjes su yi rang zhing /blan med
347a5(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ci nas kyang sems de la'ang ma yin zhing /sems gzhan la'ang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su ba
347a6(khri brgyad): bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med pa yang dge
347a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
347b1(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
347b2(khri brgyad): mthong lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sgyu ma dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
347b3(khri brgyad): du sems/gang la sgyu ma dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i sems khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i sems gang yin pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
347b4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma dang /sgyu ma
347b5(khri brgyad): lta bu'i sems las gzhan pa'i chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag par rjes su mthong sgyum
347b6(khri brgyad): mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sgyu ma dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan pa'i chos gang bla na med
347b7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
348a1(khri brgyad): chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/chos gang zhig mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ma mchis zhes bgyi bar nye bar bstan par bgyi/chos gang shin
348a2(khri brgyad): tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am/ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags te/chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
348a3(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la/mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur
348a4(khri brgyad): lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni
348a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu dben pa lags la/de bzhin du
348a6(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang shin tu dben pa lags shing de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben pa legs pa'i slad du ste/chos gang shin tu dben
348a7(khri brgyad): pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags/rnam par gzhig par bgyi ba'ang ma lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du/chos
348b1(khri brgyad): gang yang sgrub par mi bgyid lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
348b2(khri brgyad): brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yong ji ltar 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin
348b3(khri brgyad): tu dben pa lags na/ji ltar dben pas dben pa rjes su rtogs par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
348b4(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor legs so legs so//rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa yin no//bsam
348b5(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu dben pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang
348b6(khri brgyad): shin tu dben pa yin no//byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben pa yin te/rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi
348b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dpon pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
349a1(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya ba'ang dben pa yin no//rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma byung la/de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams
349a2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang shin tu dben par ma gyur na/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi bar du'ang mi 'gyur
349a3(khri brgyad): ro rab 'byor de lta bus na/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar/rab 'byor shes
349a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin la/dben pas kyang dben pa mngon par
349a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'ang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang na ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
349a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa lags so//bcom
349a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo dag la spyod pa yin no//
349b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang don zab mo la spyod kyang 'di lta ste don dro dang nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du mi byed pa ni dka' ba
349b2(khri brgyad): byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
349b3(khri brgyad): chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang mngon sum du bgyid pa'i don de'ang dmigs su ma mchis la/gang gis mngon sum
349b4(khri brgyad): du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang dmigs su ma mchis shing /gang mngon sum du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das
349b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis na/gang mngon sum du bgyis nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i
349b6(khri brgyad): don gang mngon sum du bgyi bar 'gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang mngon sum du bgyi bar 'gyur/chos gang mngon sum du bgyi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
349b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs par spyod pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs te/de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la mun pa
350a1(khri brgyad): ma mchis par rjes su 'thob lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi
