350a2(khri brgyad): 'gong zhing mi skrag mi dngang la dang bar mi 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
350a3(khri brgyad): pa lags te/des ni mtshan ma'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
350a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
350a5(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bdag
350a6(khri brgyad): dang nye ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na/nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni la la dang ni nye'o//la la dang ni ring ngo snyam du mi
350a7(khri brgyad): sems lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la ni bye brag ma mchis la/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad
350b1(khri brgyad): du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
350b2(khri brgyad): byang chub ni nye ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das
350b3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na/sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di snyam du/sgyu ma ni bdag dang ring la/sgyu ma mkhan dang ni nye ba'o zhe 'am/skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa 'di dag ni bdag dang nye'o zhe 'am/
350b4(khri brgyad): ring du zhes bgyi bar mi sems lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du
350b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag dang
350b6(khri brgyad): nyeba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/gzugs brnyan ni 'di snyam du dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan byung ba de ni bdag dang nye la/
350b7(khri brgyad): me long ngam/snod kyi chab der ma byung ba dag ni bdag dang ring ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan ni rnam par rtog pa ma
351a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di snyam
351a2(khri brgyad): du/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag dang nye ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//de ci'i
351a3(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni
351a4(khri brgyad): sdug pa 'am/mi sdug pa ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de la gang sdug pa 'am/mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom
351a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa'am/mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang mi
351a6(khri brgyad): mnga' lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan
351a7(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs lags so//
351b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa thams cad sbyangs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
351b2(khri brgyad): ste dper bgyi na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'di snyam du/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
351b3(khri brgyad): tshuchub ni bdag dang nye ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la ni rnam
351b4(khri brgyad): par rtog pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di snyam du nyan thos
351b5(khri brgyad): kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang ring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag dang nye ba'o snyam du mi sems lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di
351b6(khri brgyad): lta ste dper bgyi na/de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na/de na de ni gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i bgyi ba bgyid kyang sprul pa de ni mi rtog/rnam par
351b7(khri brgyad): mi rtog lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bgyi ba gang gi slong du sgom pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
352a1(khri brgyad): ba de ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/shing mkhan nam/shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis
352a2(khri brgyad): bud med kyi gzugs sam/skyes pa'i gzugs sam/glang po che'i gzugs sam/glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar bar gyur na 'khrul 'khor de bgyi ba
352a3(khri brgyad): gang gi slad du bgyis pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bgyi
352a4(khri brgyad): ba gang gi slad du sgom pa'i bgyi ba de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab
352a5(khri brgyad): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'on te bsam gtan gyi pha
352a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang
352a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na ni gzugs
352b1(khri brgyad): kyang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
352b2(khri brgyad): ci mig kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci gzugs
352b3(khri brgyad): kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin la/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi
352b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te/
352b5(khri brgyad): reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med
352b6(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
352b7(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtag po yin nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
353a1(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'ang mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa yin/
353a2(khri brgyad): nam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin
353a3(khri brgyad): nam/'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos thams
353a4(khri brgyad): cad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/chos thams cad mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog pa yin na/sems
353a5(khri brgyad): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba 'di ci las gyur/rgyun du
353a6(khri brgyad): zhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du rab tu dbye ba'ang ci las gyur/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab
353a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can 'di dag ni phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
353b1(khri brgyad): las mngon par 'du byed de/gzhi de las 'dun pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin cing mngon par sgrub par byed do//yongs su bzung bas rnam
353b2(khri brgyad): par rtog pa las byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi'i 'gro ba dag mngon par bsgrub par byed do//che
353b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas zhes rab
353b4(khri brgyad): tu dbyi ba'ang ci las gyur/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du dbye ba'ong ci las gyur ces zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa dang /rgyun du
353b5(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par mi rtog pas/rab tu phye ba yin la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /rang byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pos
353b6(khri brgyad): rab tu phye ba yin no//sangs rgyas kyang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin la/byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
353b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam
354a1(khri brgyad): par rtog pa mi mnga' ba/rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin la/de bzhin du ma byon pa rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur
354a2(khri brgyad): zhing /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
354a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba rnams rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba rnam par rtog pa
354a4(khri brgyad): spangs pa yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/'di ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings
354a5(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas nas chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar
354a6(khri brgyad): rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos rnams
354a7(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/rnam par mi rtog pa bstan pa'i dpe brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
354b1(khri brgyad): lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa
354b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor lo 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de ni snying po
354b3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa yin no//kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po la spyod pa yin no//de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang
354b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po
354b5(khri brgyad): med pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni snying po
354b6(khri brgyad): med pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas snying
354b7(khri brgyad): po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/snying po dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
355a1(khri brgyad): kyi bar yang snying po med pa yin na/snying po dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu ma
355a2(khri brgyad): po dag 'di snyam du sems te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag dang /gang
355a3(khri brgyad): dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang /don de la spyod kyang gang mngon sum du byas pas/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
355a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin te/rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
355a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag chos 'di dag mnyam pa nyid du mngon sum du mi byed po de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu
355a6(khri brgyad): de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gang mngon sum du byas pas/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
355a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag mnyam pa nyid du mngon sum du mi byed pa ni dka' ba ma yin gyi/lha'i bu dag de dag gis sems can grangs med tshad
355b1(khri brgyad): med/dpag tu med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha chen po bgos la gang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang shin tu mi dmigs pa ni dka' ba yin te/
355b2(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dag de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag
355b3(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin no//gang sems can rnams gdul bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni/nam mkha' gdul bar bya'o snyam du sems pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nam
355b4(khri brgyad): mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta ba dang /nam mkha' stong pa'i phyir sems can stong par blta ba dang /nam mkha' snying po med pa'i phyir sems can snying po
355b5(khri brgyad): med par blta ba dang /nam mkha' gsog yin pa'i phyir sems can gsog yin par blta ba'i phyir te/kye ma lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa'
355b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi ched du go cha gyon par byed pa de dag ni/dka' ba byed pa yin no//lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha
355b7(khri brgyad): bgo bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' dang rtsod par 'dod pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni go cha de'ang bgos la/gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i
356a1(khri brgyad): sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dben pa'i phyir/go cha dben par blta ba'i phyir te/gal te de skad bstan pa na///
356a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs dben
356a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa dang //
356a4(khri brgyad): gzugs dben pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dben pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/gzugs dben pa'i phyir/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i
356a5(khri brgyad): phyir ro//gal te chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing mi skrag mi dngang la dngang
356a6(khri brgyad): bor mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
356a7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
356b1(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das dben pa dang /zhi ba dang
356b2(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur lags te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/byang chub
356b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur logs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba
356b4(khri brgyad): dang /gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang /gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te de
356b5(khri brgyad): skad bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum pa ma mchis shing mi skrag la/mi zhum mi 'gong mi skrag/mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na shes
356b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang /gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang /gang
356b7(khri brgyad): la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar
357a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha
357a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis phyag bgyi ba lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub
357a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /skye dgu'i
357a4(khri brgyad): bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams nyi tshes phyag bya bar yang ma zad kyi/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
357a5(khri brgyad): spyod pa de la ni kha dog las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i bu dge rgyas pa rnams dang /'bras bu che ba rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag
357a6(khri brgyad): gos kyang phyag bya ba yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
357a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin
357b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
357b2(khri brgyad): yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par
357b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba yin no zhes dgongs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas bcom
357b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas nyid du zhugs pa yin par bzung bar bya'o//rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
357b5(khri brgyad): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can sha stag tu gyur la/bdud sdig can re res kyang bdud sdig can de snyed cig mngon par sprul
357b6(khri brgyad): kyang /de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor chos
357b7(khri brgyad): gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin te/gnyis gang zhe na/des chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du rnam par
358a1(khri brgyad): bltas pa dang /des sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba yin te/rab 'byor chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
358a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
358a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin te/gnyis gang zhe na/ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
358a4(khri brgyad): kyis dgongs pa yin te/rab 'byor chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdud sdig
358a5(khri brgyad): can rnams kyis mi thul ba yin no//rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du lha'i bu rnams kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /yongs
358a6(khri brgyad): su zhu ba dang /yongs su dri ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro bar sems shing rigs kyi bu khyod ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
358a7(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de lta bas na rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang /mtshan ma med pas gnas pa dang /smon pa med pas
358b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa'i gnas pa de dag gis gnas par gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu khyod gnas pa de dag gis gnas na/sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du
358b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang /sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang /sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba dang /sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams
358b3(khri brgyad): kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang /sems can gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ba dang /sems can mun par
358b4(khri brgyad): gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems
358b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag dge slong
358b6(khri brgyad): gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
358b7(khri brgyad): spyod cing /'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang /rigs
359a1(khri brgyad): yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/da ltar nga byang chub
359a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
359a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gtsug tor can gyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis/chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa dang /nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
359a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i drung du tshangs par spyad pa spyod
359a5(khri brgyad): cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched
359a6(khri brgyad): du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa bzhin no//rab 'byor shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
359a7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag la dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul
359b1(khri brgyad): gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /steng dang /'og dang /phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag
359b2(khri brgyad): na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
359b3(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de dag la dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du
359b4(khri brgyad): brjod par mdzad do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
359b5(khri brgyad): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i bar de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du
359b6(khri brgyad): brjod pa'ang ched du brjod par mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de ltar sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pa'i
359b7(khri brgyad): phyir bzhugs pa dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de skad tsos bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
360a1(khri brgyad): /bcom ldan 'das sang+yas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyur ldog pa'//slar ma ldog pa gdu dag /
360a2(khri brgyad): ming yongs su brjod cing dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston par mdzad logs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
360a3(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag phyir mi ldog pa dag kyang yod/
360a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lung ma bstan pa dag spyong yod do//de dag la stongs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dog
360a5(khri brgyad): dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod de 'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags
360a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/bcom ldan 'das
360a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa de dag ni/rab 'byor phyir me ldon
360b1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/de dag lalnga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'adra
360b2(khri brgyad): ched du brjod par mdzad do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi rjes su slob pa'i
360b3(khri brgyad): tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du
360b4(khri brgyad): brjod par mdzad do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad skye ba med
360b5(khri brgyad): par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dag dang /chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dag dang /chos thams
360b6(khri brgyad): cad zhi ba zhes bya bar mos pa dang /chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /gsog ces bya ba dang /ya ma brla zhes bya ba dang /snying po med pa zhes
360b7(khri brgyad): bya bar mos kyang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
361a1(khri brgyad): dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod par mdzad do//rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
361a2(khri brgyad): byang chub skyem sa cu sems ba na 'agling ngag gis ming yongs su brjid de'i tshus rgyas rgyas spyor bya dang /dgu bar mdzad de'i tshul gyis
361a3(khri brgyad): ston cing tshad du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni rab 'byor nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
361a4(khri brgyad): yongs su spangs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba yin no//rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang
361a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang
361a6(khri brgyad): ched du brjod par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur zhing de la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
361a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo thos nas/'di ni de bzhin
361b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na/des ni phyis kyang de
361b2(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las 'di nyid rgya cher thos
361b3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par 'gyur zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
361b4(khri brgyad): mos pa na 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no zhes mos shing phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos
361b5(khri brgyad): pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de ltar gces spras byed pa yin no/gang mos shing mos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du gnas shing de bzhin nyid du bsgrub
361b6(khri brgyad): par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du gnas shing de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos rab 'byor gyis gas
361b7(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin nyid du gnas shing /de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs na/chos gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba legs na/ji ltar rnam pa thams cad
362a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis na su zhig
362a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur//
362a3(khri brgyad): su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
362a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston
362a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
362a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to//rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma mchis na/su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur//
362a7(khri brgyad): su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nang/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas
362b1(khri brgyad): chos ston par 'gyur te/de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par
362b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/chos ston par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/de ni gnas ma
362b3(khri brgyad): mchipa lagasas zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gang yang
362b4(khri brgyad): dmyigs su med na/gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang /gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
362b5(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur te/de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med no//gang de bzhin nyid
362b6(khri brgyad): la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/chos ston par 'gyur ba'i bar dag lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir
362b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams drung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma
363a1(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa nyid
363a2(khri brgyad): kyi phyir te/rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa su'ang med/de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
363a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'ang maud/de bzhin nyid la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur
363a4(khri brgyad): ba dang /gang de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa dang /gang de bzhin nyid la gnas
363a5(khri brgyad): nas chos ston par 'gyur ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/de ltar de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med pas/de la skye ba'ang dmigs su med/'jig pa'ang med/gnas pa'ang
363a6(khri brgyad): med/gzhan du 'gyur ba'ang med de/de'i phyir chos de la skye ba dmigs su med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas na/su
363a7(khri brgyad): zhig de la gnas par 'gyur/su zhig de la gnas nas bla no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/su zhig de la gnas
363b1(khri brgyad): nas chos ston par 'gyur te/de ni gnas med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
363b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
363b3(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gang yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa su'ang ma mchis shing bla na med
363b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang yang ma mchis la/chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis kyang /de la zhum par yang mi
363b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur/de la nem nur yang mi bgyid/rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
363b6(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos zab mo rnams la ne mau nur med cing rmongs pa med pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no zhes
363b7(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin pas na/de la su zhig nem nur ram rmongs par 'gyur/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin
364a1(khri brgyad): gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid las brtsams shing ston te/ci
364a2(khri brgyad): la'ang chags pa med do//'di lta ste dper na/mda' nam mkha' la 'phangs pa ni gang du'ang tshogs pa med do//de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang
364a3(khri brgyad): gang du'ang chags pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/chags pa med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas bcom
364a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad smras shing //de skad bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
364a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rjes su smra zhing chos smra ba dang /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos yang dge par brjod pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//kau shi ka gang
364a6(khri brgyad): khyod kyis de skad smras shing de skad bstan pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su smra zhing chos smra ba dang /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brjod pa yin/
364a7(khri brgyad): no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis spobs pa de thams cad ni stong pa nyid las brtsams shing spobs pa
364b1(khri brgyad): dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa las brtsams shing spobs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi bar las brtsams shing spobs pa ste
364b2(khri brgyad): ngo mtshar lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka rab 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyis gnas
364b3(khri brgyad): pas na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de bzhin du sbyar te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
364b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na gang dag dran pa
364b5(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de bzhin du sbyar te/lam nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs na/gang dag lam sgom par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos//
364b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag bsam gtan
364b7(khri brgyad): dang /tshad mod pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/stobs rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag stobs
365a1(khri brgyad): rnams la sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/mi 'jigs pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/
365a2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/byams pa chen po nyid
365a3(khri brgyad): kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag byams pa chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag snying rje chen po la
365a4(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
365a5(khri brgyad): mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci
365a6(khri brgyad): dgos/rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/de bzhin
365a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/skye ba med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag
365b1(khri brgyad): skyob med pa mngan sum du byung bar 'gyur ba lta/smos snang ci dgas/mnan rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dag gi lus la mtshan rnams 'byung bar 'a gyu r+ya bAk+ka rlung /
365b2(khri brgyad): kyong ci dgos/dpe byad bzang po rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang gi lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
365b3(khri brgyad): ko shi ka dge slong rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la gnas pa yin la/kau sh+lo ka dge slong rab 'byor ni dmigs pa med pa la gnas pa dang /stong pa nyid la gan
365b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /mtshan ma med po la gnas pa dang /smon pa med pa la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka dge slong rab 'byor gyi gnas pa ni de lta bu yin te/kau shi ka
365b5(khri brgyad): skyong rab 'byor gyi gnas pa glang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa'i brgya'i tshar yang nye bar
365b6(khri brgyad): 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//'brum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs dang cha dang /bgrad pa dang /
365b7(khri brgyad): dpa dang /rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'o gnas pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
366a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa de dag gi nang na/byang
366a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ces bya ba dang /thu bo dang /khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
366a3(khri brgyad): rab dang rab mchog dang /gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
366a4(khri brgyad): po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gnas pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
366a5(khri brgyad): kau shI ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' zhing /byang chub sems
366a6(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang /rnam pa thams
366a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs
366b1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad spangs pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de nas 'khor de nyid las sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis me tog man+dA ra ba dag blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das
366b2(khri brgyad): la gtor to//mngon par gtor te//mngon par rab tu gtor to//dge slong drug stong yang stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur nas pus mo g.yas
366b3(khri brgyad): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/mig mi 'dzums par phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi
366b4(khri brgyad): mthus de dag gi snyim pa me tog man+dA ra be dag gis rab tu gang bar gyur nas/me tog man+dA ra ba de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
366b5(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//mngon par rab tu gtor to//de dag gis gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor ba'i tshe/tshig
366b6(khri brgyad): 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma lags pa'i gnas pa dam pa 'dis gnas
366b7(khri brgyad): par gyur cig ces kyang smras so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
367a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa na/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog
367a2(khri brgyad): sna tshogs 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/de dag gis stong gsum gyi
367a3(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
367a4(khri brgyad): gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
367a5(khri brgyad): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
367a6(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni
367a7(khri brgyad): gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga'
367b1(khri brgyad): bo dge slong drug stong po 'di dag ni bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te//
367b2(khri brgyad): me tog gtor ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag tu 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
367b3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gtor ba zhes bya ba de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun yang mtshungs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs
367b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//tshe'i tshad kyang lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur ro//de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mngon par byung nas/rab tu 'byung ba dang /
367b5(khri brgyad): gang dang gang du rab tu byung ste/gnas par 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog lnga pa'i char dag kyang rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnas
367b6(khri brgyad): pa dam pas gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas
367b7(khri brgyad): pas gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
368a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa
368a2(khri brgyad): 'am/dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yin te/mi rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos par gyur pa 'am/dga' ldan gyi ris
368a3(khri brgyad): kyi lha rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos par gyur pa yin no zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
368a4(khri brgyad): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par gyur pa yin no//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/
368a5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang /thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul
368a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rjes su ston par byed na/kun dga' bo byang
368a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di snyam du bdag cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
368b1(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /klags pa dang /kun chub par byas shing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
368b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yin no zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de
368b3(khri brgyad): dag gis 'di snyam du bdag cag gis ni nyan thos rnams las/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin zhing /nyan thos rnams las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
368b4(khri brgyad): thos pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thub mo 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /
368b5(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang /klog po dang /kun chub par byed cing /don dang chos dang tshul las rjes su rtogs par byed na/kun dga' ba rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
368b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du gyur pa yin no zhes nges par rtogs par bya'o//kun dga'
368b7(khri brgyad): bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na/mi spong mi smod cing dad pa thob par 'gyur na/kun dga' bo
369a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
369a2(khri brgyad): zin pa yin par rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
369a3(khri brgyad): las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang nyan thos nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba mi slu mod kyi/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems
369a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pas legs par rtogs par bya'o//kun
369a5(khri brgyad): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pas/legs
369a6(khri brgyad): par rtogs par byas pa ni/nyan thos nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
369a7(khri brgyad): khyod la yongs su gtad do//kun dga' bo gal te ngas chos gang dag bstan pa rnams las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma rtogs pa'i chos bston pa de dag thams
369b1(khri brgyad): cing khyod kyis bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gzan cing /de'i 'og tu spangs par gyur kyang kun dga' bo nga de tsam gyi tshod kyis ni khyod la skyon du mi rtsi'i//
369b2(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung nas tshig gcig tsam yang chud gzan par gyur na/kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni ngas khyod
369b3(khri brgyad): la skyon du brtsi'o//kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung nas/de'i 'og tu chud ma gzan ma bor na kun dga' bo de ni ngas khyod
369b4(khri brgyad): la skyon du mi rtsi ste/kun dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni khyod la yongs su gtad kyis ci nas kyang gzung zhig/chongs shig klogs shig//
369b5(khri brgyad): kun chub par gyis shig/rtag tu yid la gyis shig/legs par bzung ba dang legs par bcang bar gyis shig/yi ge dang tshig dang /tshig 'bru legs par rdzogs/
369b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /nges pa'i tshig legs par zin par gyis shig/kun dga' bo ragis kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang
369b7(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa des ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
370a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi byang chub rjes su yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la da ltar nga la mngon sum du me tog gam
370a2(khri brgyad): spos sam me tog phreng ngam/bdug pa 'am byug pa'am/phye ma 'am gos sam/gdugs sam/rgyal mtshan nam/ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa dang /bla mar
370a3(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /ri mo byed pa dang /mchod pa byed par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung bar bya/bcang bar bya klog par bya/kun chub
370a4(khri brgyad): par bya'o//bzung zhing bcangs la klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang me tog dang /spos dang bdug pa dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang
370a5(khri brgyad): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bsti stang du bya/bla mar bya/ri mo bya/mchod par bya'o//shes rab kyi
370a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed ri mo byed/mchod par byed pa des ni nga yang mchod pa yin la/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /dA lhor byung ba'i sangs
370a7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang mchod po byas pa yin no//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
370b1(khri brgyad): bshad pa la/gus pa dang dga' ba dang /dad pa bskyed par 'gyur ba des ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gus pa
370b2(khri brgyad): dang /dga' ba dang dad pa dang /ri mo bskyed pa yin no//kun dga' bo gal te khyod nga la dga' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang yongs su mi gtong ba de ltar khyod kyis shes
370b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dgo' ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /yongs su mi btang bar gyis la/ci nas kyang khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir/
370b4(khri brgyad): tshig gcig tsam yang chud ma zos par gyis shig/kun dga' bo ngas khyod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su gdams pa las brtsamos te/mang du
370b5(khri brgyad): smras pa'ang /kun dga' bo mdor na/ji ltar nga khyod kyi ston pa yin pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang khyod kyi ston pa yin gyis/kun dga' bo
370b6(khri brgyad): dri bas na ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gtad pa tshad med pas khyod la yongs su gtod do//kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ngas lha dang /me dang lha ma
370b7(khri brgyad): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang sbyin te/gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang /tshes yongs su ma btang ba dang /dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba
371a1(khri brgyad): dang 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
371a2(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di yongs su mi btang bar bya ste/'di ni ngas rjes su bstan pa yin no//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab
371a3(khri brgyad): mo 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
371a4(khri brgyad): mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /brjod pa dang /'chang ba dang /shes par byed pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /rnam par 'grel pa dang /
371a5(khri brgyad): rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal bar byed na/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
371a6(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
371a7(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
371b1(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
371b2(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin la/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma
371b3(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol
371b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba yin zhing kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar shar phyogs
371b5(khri brgyad): dang /lho dang nub dang /byang dang 'og dang /steng dang phyogs mtshams dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs
371b6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
371b7(khri brgyad): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslab par bya'o//
372a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di ltar 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskyed
372a2(khri brgyad): par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang
372a3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/kun dga' bo de lta bas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa 'di dag rgya cher yongs su gtad pa yin no//
372a4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
372a5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod yin te/de ni mi zad pa'i mdzod yin pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
372a6(khri brgyad): gang dag shar dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
372a7(khri brgyad): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod 'di nyid las chos ston par mdzad do//kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na/
372b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la bslabs nas/bla
372b2(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga' bo gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i de bzhin
372b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid la bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
372b4(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
372b5(khri brgyad): 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//yongs
372b6(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa las
372b7(khri brgyad): brtsams te/chos bstan par gyur la/chos bstan pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa
373a1(khri brgyad): nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur kyang de tsam gyis ni khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par gyur pa ma yin gyi/kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis
373a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig tsam rab tu bstan na/de ni nyan thos khyod kyis nga mnyes
373a3(khri brgyad): par byas shing /nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas pa yin no//kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/chos bstan pa snga ma des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
373a4(khri brgyad): gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byis par gyur na/dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa
373a5(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'o bsod
373a6(khri brgyad): nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ba yin snyam mamra/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa
373a7(khri brgyad): mang lags so//bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po la tha
373b1(khri brgyad): na nyi ma gcig tsam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston par byed na/de ni bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog
373b2(khri brgyad): gi/kun dga' bo gal te nyi ma phyed dam/kun dga' bo nyi ma phyed lta'ang zhog gi/gal te snga dro gcig tsam mam/kun dga' bo snga dro gcig tsam lta'ang zhog gi/gal te/
373b3(khri brgyad): chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar ram/kun dga' bo chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar lta'ang zhog gi/gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
373b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po la skad cig gam/thang cig gam yud tsam zhig gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur na/kun dga' bo de
373b5(khri brgyad): ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/des ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par
373b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la tha na nyi ma gcig gam/nyi
373b7(khri brgyad): ma phyed dam snga dro'am/chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar ram skad cig gam/thang cig gam yud tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan par gyur
374a1(khri brgyad): na/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi
374a2(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
374a3(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'dod la/gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing yang dag par ston pa dang /yang dag par gzengs
374a4(khri brgyad): bstod pa dang /'dzud pa dang rab tu 'god par byed pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa
374a5(khri brgyad): dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel ba gang gi phyir//
374a6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnaso ma yin/skabs ma yin te de ni gnas med do//shes rab kyi pha rol
374a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po dang lha dang mi dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
374b1(khri brgyad): ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/mngon par mdzad
374b2(khri brgyad): pas 'khor de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /dge
374b3(khri brgyad): slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas la/'khor rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa/sems
374b4(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu
374b5(khri brgyad): sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang /byang chub sems
374b6(khri brgyad): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus te/rdzu 'phrul de phyir bsdus pa dang /'khor
374b7(khri brgyad): bzhi po de dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la sogs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
375a1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang ma mthong /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
375a2(khri brgyad): rgyus mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'ong ma mthong /sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag kyang mig gi dbang po'i spyod yul du mi snang bar gyur
375a3(khri brgyad): to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa slar bsdu ba mdzad pas de'i phyir ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
375a4(khri brgyad): tshwa dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de bzhin gshegs pa
375a5(khri brgyad): mi 'khrugs pa de dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
375a6(khri brgyad): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun de dang /byang chub sems dpe'i dge 'dun de dag ni mig lam du'ang mi gda' legs so//bka' stsal pa
375a7(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/chos la chos mi snang ngo //chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo //ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
375b1(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang /nyan thos de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig
375b2(khri brgyad): lam du mi snang ba de bzhin du/kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang mig lam du mi snang ba yin te/chos kyis chos mi mthong ngo //chos kyis chos kun tu mi shes te/kun dga'
375b3(khri brgyad): bo chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa mthong ba med pa bya ba la mthu med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni snying po med pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang /
375b4(khri brgyad): bzung ba med pa yin te/kun dga' bo chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa dang /bzung ba med pas na/bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te/kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni skye
375b5(khri brgyad): ma'i skyes bu ltar rig pa med pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin
375b6(khri brgyad): te/chos gang la'ang mngon par zhon pa med pa yin no//kun dga'o bo de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
375b7(khri brgyad): slob pa yin no//kun dga' bo pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsla
376a1(khri brgyad): par bya ste/de ltar slob pa ni mchog ces bya'o//thu bo zhes bya'o//rab ces bya'o//rab mchog ces bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa dang /gong na med
376a2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ste/'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang /'jig rten thams cad la bde ba dang /mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang
376a3(khri brgyad): bA dang /sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yin te/de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum
376a4(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas gyen du bteg cing yang slar gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis/'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
376a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gyen du bteg pa'am/phyir bzhag par yang mi shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang /shes
376a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa skyes
376a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo bslab pa gang ji snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o//
376b1(khri brgyad): thu bo dang rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa zhes bya'o//kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dam/mtha' bzung bar
376b2(khri brgyad): sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam mtha' bzung bar sems par zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo
376b3(khri brgyad): ngas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma bstan te/kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang /tshig gi tshogs dang /yi ge'i cho gas dag la ni tshad bzung du yod kyi shes rab kyi
376b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad bzung du med do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bros 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
376b5(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad ma mchis shing /gzhal du ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo mi zad pa'i
376b6(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no//kun dga' bo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no//kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na
376b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu
377a1(khri brgyad): bskyed pa yin yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad par ma gyur to//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
377a2(khri brgyad): rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu bskyed par 'gyur
377a3(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad par mi 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar
377a4(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab
377a5(khri brgyad): tu bskyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya
377a6(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar 'dod du zad de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur la de bzhin du sbyar te/bsam gtan/
377a7(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur zhing /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
377b1(khri brgyad): yang ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur te/chos de dag la ni skye ba med la chos gang dag la skye ba myed pa de dag la zad par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
377b2(khri brgyad): kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos kun du khebs par mdzad nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
377b3(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ljags kyi dbang po 'di lta bu dang ldan pa log par gsung zhing gzhan du gsung bar 'gyur snyam mam/kun dga' blos gsol pa/bcom
377b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das da ni ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de lta bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
377b5(khri brgyad): 'khor bzhi po dag la rgya cher ston cig shod cig/khod cig rab tu khod cig/rnam par phye zhig/gsol bar gyis shig/yang dag par rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo nyan
377b6(khri brgyad): thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha
377b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid las rgya cher bstan te de la ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du slob na/rang rang gi sa dag la gnas par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
378a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug go yi ge med pa thams cad la 'jug go//kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzungs
378a2(khri brgyad): kyi sgo gang dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba'i gzungs thams cad kyi sgo yin te/gzungs de dag 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
378a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni spobs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'das pa dang /
378a4(khri brgyad): ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod mi zad pa yin par ngas bstan to//kun dga' bo de lta bas na mos par
378a5(khri brgyad): byas shing khong du chud par bya ste/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa de ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang nga
378a6(khri brgyad): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzungs yin par ngas bstan te//
378a7(khri brgyad): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzungs 'di bzung na/chos thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las
378b1(khri brgyad): yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/drug cu pa'o///'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/de nas
378b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab ste/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu gor ma tshig snyam mo///
378b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa lags sam/bka'
378b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad do//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par
378b5(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bgyi/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor tshor ba dang /'du shes
378b6(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi zad pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad
378b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du sbyor te/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi zad pa'i phyir/
379a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor gzugs dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
379a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'i//tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
379a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//'du shes dang nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
379a4(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o//'du byed rnams dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
379a5(khri brgyad): par bya'o//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
379a6(khri brgyad): bya'o//rab 'byor phung po rnams dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//
379a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams dang /nam mkha' mi zad pa dang /skye mchod dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha ro
379b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha
379b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor ma rig pa dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
379b3(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor 'du byed dang nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
379b4(khri brgyad): par bya'o//rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
379b5(khri brgyad): bya'o//rab 'byor ming dang /gzugs dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
379b6(khri brgyad): bya'o//rab 'byor skye mched drug dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o///
379b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor reg pa dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor
380a1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang nam mkha' mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor sred
380a2(khri brgyad): pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor len pa dang nam
380a3(khri brgyad): mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor srid pa dang /nam mkha' mi zad
380a4(khri brgyad): pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor skye ba dang /nam mkha' mi zad pas//
380a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor rga shi dong /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don
380a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dang nam mkha' mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
380a7(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor
380b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba dang /thog ma dang /tha ma rnam par spangs pa
380b2(khri brgyad): la rnam par lta ba yin no//de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres
380b3(khri brgyad): pa'i chos yin te/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar lta bas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
380b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la la nam mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul 'dis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam
380b5(khri brgyad): par lta ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi so la gnas par mi 'gyur te/de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu
380b6(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang la la phyir ldog par gyur na/des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa la ma brten pas phyir ldog
380b7(khri brgyad): pa yin te/rab 'byor des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pos/ji ltar namo mkha' ltar mi zad pa mngon par
381a1(khri brgyad): bsgrub pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta bar bya ba dang /mngon par bsgrub par bya ba mi shes so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg
