411b6(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des mthong ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs ni/chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni gnas med pa'i
411b7(khri brgyad): phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
412a1(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon 'di dag ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
412a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa dang /yongs su bzung ba med pa ste/chags pa med pa dang /yongs
412a3(khri brgyad): su bzung ba med pa'i chos la ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes kun tu shes shing /gal te de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
412a4(khri brgyad): spyod pa yin no//gal te de ltar yongs su mi bzung ba'i chos la mngon par zhen na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba yin/
412a5(khri brgyad): no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par zhen pas brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu
412a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam/rnam pa thams
412a7(khri brgyad): cod mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ma bral ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab
412b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags na/'o na ji ltar shes rab kyi
412b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag mngon par bsgrub par bgyi lags/bcom
412b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la mngon par zhen pa
412b4(khri brgyad): med de/'di ni gzugs so//'di'i gzugs so zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa med do//chos thams cad kyi bar la'ang ngode bzhin du sbyor ro//gzugs rtag pa 'am/mi rtag
412b5(khri brgyad): pa'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/bdag med pa 'am/zhi ba 'am/ma zhi ba 'am/stong pa 'am/mi stong pa 'am/dben pa 'am/mi dben pa zhes bya bar
412b6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni rtag pa zhes bya
412b7(khri brgyad): ba'am/mi rtag pa zhes bya ba 'am/bde ba zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/zhi zhes bya ba 'am/mo
413a1(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba 'am/stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya ba 'am/dben zhes bya ba 'am/mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par bsgrub par mi nus te/
413a2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab
413a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par
413a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'khor los sbyor ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du
413a5(khri brgyad): 'gro ba de dang der dpung gi tshegs yan lag bzhi pa'ang 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang dang
413a6(khri brgyad): gang du 'gro ba de dang der pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang 'gro zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di
413a7(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/kha lo bsgyur ba ni rta bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon nas lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o//de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa
413b1(khri brgyad): lnga po 'di dag gi kha lo bsgyur zhing lam mnyam pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der 'gro'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
413b2(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi lam ni gang lags/lam ma lags pa ni gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nyan thos kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
413b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi lam ma yin pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni
413b4(khri brgyad): lam yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ni de yin no//lam ma yin pa ni de yin no//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab
413b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni la mo lags so//'di ni lam ma lags so zhes ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa
413b6(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lam dang lam ma yin pa ston pa ni byang chub
413b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhing sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/sems can
414a1(khri brgyad): grangs med pa rnams kyi don du nye bar gnas kyang /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci'ang ston par mi byed de/gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing //
414a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin te/nyon thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nye
414a3(khri brgyad): bar gnas pa ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
414a4(khri brgyad): su 'dren pa yin gyi/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasarje sa dag tu yongs su 'dren pa ni ma yin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin no//de ltar
414a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gnas pa nyid tshad mar byas nas/chos gang yang skyed pa ma yin/'gog pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
414a6(khri brgyad): gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang skyed pa ma lagos/'gog pa ma lagaso na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
414a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ji ltar sbyin pa bstsal bar bgyi/ji ltar tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi/ji ltar bzod pa bsgom par bgyi/ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsam
414b1(khri brgyad): par bgyi/ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi/ji ltar shes rab bsgom par bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam
414b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o//rnam pa thams
414b3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/bzod pa bsgom por bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o//rnam pa thams
414b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/shes rab bsgom par bya zhing //
414b5(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/de ltar byang chub
414b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa
414b7(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad
415a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma
415a2(khri brgyad): bral ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba yin no//rab 'byor de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag
415a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bsgrub par bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o//
415a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
415a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//gsol po/
415a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bgyi/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
415a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar gzugs ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa ma yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
415b1(khri brgyad): shes pa ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no zhes so sor
415b2(khri brgyad): rtog par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
415b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la gnas par bya'o zhes brtson par mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par bya'o zhes brtson par mi bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
415b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par bya'o zhes brtson par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni gang la'ang mi gnas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gang la 'ong
415b5(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen pos mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
415b6(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bor bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mi zhig shing a mra'i 'bras bu dag gam shing pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag za 'dod par gyur na de a mra'i 'bras
415b7(khri brgyad): bu'am pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag bskyed par bya'o bskyed nas kyang dus dus su chu bcu par bya yur ma yur bar bya'o//de'i rim gyis yal ga gel zhing 'phel bar gyur pa na//
416a1(khri brgyad): tshogs pa rnyed pas/a mra'i 'bras bu dag gam/pa na sa'i 'bras bu dag 'byor cing tshogs par 'gyur bas de a mra'i 'bras bu dag gam pa na sa'i 'bras
416a2(khri brgyad): bu dag za bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
416a3(khri brgyad): rgya bar 'dod pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab nas sems can rnams sbyin pas rjes su bzung bar bya'o//tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /ting
416a4(khri brgyad): nga 'dzin dang shes rab kyis rjes su bzung bar bya zhing sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
416a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg par 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par
416a6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
416a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsung lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
416b1(khri brgyad): byiphyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes nga sgra'o//chos thams cad la dbang ba bsgom pa thob par 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes nga smra'o//de ci'i phyir na
416b2(khri brgyad): no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa 'thob par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi sgo yin pa'i phyir ro//rab
416b3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dpe na/rgyamatsho chen 'on chu klung thams cad kyi sgra yin la/chu klung dang chu thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen po bzhugs na rogacig tu 'gyur ro//rab 'byor
416b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos thams cad kyi sgo yin te/chos thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par phye na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
416b5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de lto bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
416b6(khri brgyad): rnams kyis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
416b7(khri brgyad): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
417a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la bslab par bya zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper
417a2(khri brgyad): na 'phong gi slob dpon lag tshod la bab pa'i gzhu thogs pa ni/phyir rgol ba rnams sam/dgra bo rnams kyis thul bar dka'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
417a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar dka'o//rab 'byor de lta bas na/byang chub
417a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
417a5(khri brgyad): la bslab par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
417a6(khri brgyad): dgongs pa mdzad do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs
417a7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/ji ltar byang chub
417b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol/
417b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
417b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la
417b4(khri brgyad): dgongs pa mdzad de/ci nas kyang sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab mi dmigs shing /de ltar mi
417b5(khri brgyad): dmigs pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dgongs pa mdzad do//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang rgya cher sbyar
417b6(khri brgyad): bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do//rnam
417b7(khri brgyad): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dgongs pa mi mdzad do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnas mang po la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
418a1(khri brgyad): chen pos ni gang la'ang bslab par mi bgyi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/rab 'byor gnas mang po
418a2(khri brgyad): la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni gang la'ang bslab par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
418a3(khri brgyad): gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
418a4(khri brgyad): gang de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par bka' stsal lags na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
418a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub par bgyi'o//g.yar ton shin tu byang ba'i
418a6(khri brgyad): bar du bgyi'o//g.yar ton shin tu byang bar bgyis nas kyang /yid kyi rjes su brtag par bgyi ste/ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi 'jug
418a7(khri brgyad): pa de ltar rjes su brtag par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po mdo dang rgyas par
418b1(khri brgyad): bstan pa/'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas par shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
418b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs sam/
418b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid shes na//
418b4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin
418b5(khri brgyad): nyid gang la skye ba med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yin te/de la byang chub sems dpa'
418b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' shes na/chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
418b7(khri brgyad): 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' de gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mtha' med pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/mtha' de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
419a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi dbyings shes na chos thams
419a2(khri brgyad): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dbyings med pa ni chos kyi
419a3(khri brgyad): dbyings te/chos kyi dbyings de la ni chad pa med cing yongs su chad pa med de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos kyi dbyings shes na/chos thams
419a4(khri brgyad): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar bgyi/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
419a5(khri brgyad): ji ltar chos thams cad kyi ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar shes par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos gang dag ldan pa'ang ma lags//
419a6(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma lags pa de dag kyang gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes
419a7(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi
419b1(khri brgyad): khams kyi bar du'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grang ldan pa 'am mi ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rang bzhin med la/gang rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos
419b2(khri brgyad): po med pa yin pas/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/chos thams cad kyang de ltar shes par bya'o//rab 'byor
419b3(khri brgyad): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par bsdus pa yin te/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsdus pa 'di la ni las dang po pa'i byang
419b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bslab par bya'o//sa bcu po dag la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang mngon par bsdus pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor
419b5(khri brgyad): mngon par bsdus pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
419b6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnon po'i 'jug pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
419b7(khri brgyad): chen po dbang po rtul po'i 'jug pa'ang yin no//'di ni dbang po 'bring dang /dbang po mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i 'jug pa'ang yin te/'di ni slob par 'dod pa'i
420a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi'ang 'jug pa ma yin pa ma yin no//'di ni le lo can gyi 'jug pa ma yin zhing /'di ni brtson 'grus
420a2(khri brgyad): zhan pa dang /brjed ngas pa dang /sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'jug pa ma yin gyi/'di ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /le lo med pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
420a3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jug pa yin no//'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pa'i 'jug pa yin no//gal te ji skad bstan
420a4(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
420a5(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
420a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lo bdud kyi las gang drug ci 'ang rung ste/byung ma thog nyid du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//de lta bas na thabs la
420a7(khri brgyad): mkhas pa yongs su bzung bar 'dod pa'i/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang
420b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed/
420b2(khri brgyad): pa de'i tshe/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing grwa zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dong
420b3(khri brgyad): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa de la dgengs pa mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/'das pa dang /man
420b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems
420b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar bdag gis kyang 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
420b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyis gang dag brnyes pa'i chos de dag thob por 'gyur ro snyam du re bar bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
420b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de ltar brtson par bya'o//de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
421a1(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
421a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral bar bya'o//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tha na
421a3(khri brgyad): se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur/
421a4(khri brgyad): gyi/gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag sbyin phas tshim par byed pa dang /tshul khrims la bkod pa dang //
421a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la bkod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa
421a6(khri brgyad): dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa dang /rang byang chub la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin te/gang se grol gtogs pa tsam zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
421a7(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di bsgom na/de nyid bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
421b1(khri brgyad): shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /rang byang chub kyi bar dag ni 'di las nges par skyes pa
421b2(khri brgyad): yin la/gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
421b3(khri brgyad): 'di nyid las nges par byung zhing gang dag 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu
421b4(khri brgyad): phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang la la zhig gi yud tsam mam/nyin gcig gam nyi ma brgya'am/lo 'am lo brgya'am/bskal pa 'am/bskal ba
421b5(khri brgyad): las lhag pa'am/bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bsgom
421b6(khri brgyad): par byed na de nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa la
421b7(khri brgyad): bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang gi 'di ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por btags pa
422a1(khri brgyad): dang /rang byang chub kyi bar du btags pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems
422a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par
422a3(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
422a4(khri brgyad): chen po gang thabs la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
422a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin
422a6(khri brgyad): pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems
422a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po dag bsgoms shing bsam pa yin par rig par bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
422b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bsgoms pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa dang /
422b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhon nur gyur pa yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig par
422b3(khri brgyad): bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas rnams dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang mi 'bral ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang mi
422b4(khri brgyad): 'bral ba dang /spobs pa mi chod pa dang /gzungs thob pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin
422b5(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bston pa dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ni bsams bzhin du srid
422b6(khri brgyad): par skye ba yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ni rnam pa la 'jug mkhas pa dang /brjod pa la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
422b7(khri brgyad): de ni yi ge med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa dang /brjod pa la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ni gcig gis tshig bla dgas la mkhas pa dang /
423a1(khri brgyad): mang po'i tshig bla dgas la mkhas pa dang /bud med kyi tshig bla dgas la mkhas pa dang /skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas la mkhas pa dang /gzugs la
423a2(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang rnam par shes pa'i bar la mkhas pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar lo mkhas pa dang /chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa dang /
423a3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid la mkhas pa dang /'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa dang /mtshan nyid med pa la mkhas pa dang /dngos po la mkhas pa dang /dngos po med pa
423a4(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /rang gi ngo bo la mkhas pa dang /gzhan gyi ngo bo la mkhas pa dang /sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /'bral ba la mkhas pa dang /mtshungs
423a5(khri brgyad): par ldan pa dang /mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/mtshungs par mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang //
423a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid la mkhas pa dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la mkhas pa dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la mkhas pa dang /chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa dang /
423a7(khri brgyad): chos skyon med pa la mkhas pa dang /rgyu rkyen la mkhas pa dang /rkyen med pa la mkhas pa dang /phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la
423b1(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang /bden pa la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /bsam gtan la mkhas pa dang /tshad med pa la mkhas pa dang /gzugs
423b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mkhas pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la mkhas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
423b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar la mkhas pa dang /'dus byas kyi khams la mkhas pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams la mkhas pa dang /khams la mkhas pa dang /khams med pa la
423b4(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang /gzugs yid la bya ba la mkhas pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar du yid la bya ba la mkhas pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
423b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du yid la bya ba la mkhas pa dang /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la mkhas pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar na rnam par shes pas stong ngo zhes
423b6(khri brgyad): bya ba la mkhas pa dang /byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la mkhas pa dang /shin tu sbyangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa dang /shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin pa'i/
423b7(khri brgyad): lam la mkhas pa dang /skye ba dang 'gag po la mkhas pa dang /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba lo mkhas pa dang /'dod chags la mkhas po dang /zhe sdang la
424a1(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang /gti mug la mkhas pa dang /'dod chags med pa la mkhas pa dang /zhe sdang med pa la mkhas pa dang /gti mug med pa la mkhas pa dang /
424a2(khri brgyad): lta ba la mkhas pa dang /lta ba ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /log par lta ba la mkhas pa dang /log par lta ba ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/lta ba'i rnam
424a3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad kyi bar la mkhas pa dang /ming la mkhas pa dang /ming dang gzugs la mkhas pa dang /dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang /bdag po la mkhas pa dang /rnam pa
424a4(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /mtshan nyid la mkhas pa dang /sdug bsngal la mkhas pa dang /kun 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /'gog pa la mkhas pa dang /lam la mkhas
424a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /sems can dmyal ba la mkhas pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas la mkhas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten la mkhas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam la
424a6(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang /sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mkhas pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam la mkhas pa dang /mi la mkhas pa dang /mi'i lam la mkhas pa
424a7(khri brgyad): dang /lha la mkhas pa dang /lha'i lam la mkhas pa dang /rgyun du zhugaso ba'i 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i lam la mkhas
424b1(khri brgyad): ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i lam la mkhas pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang /phyir
424b2(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i lam la mkhas pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la mkhas pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i lam la mkhas pa dang /rang byang chub
424b3(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /rang byang chub kyi lam la mkhas pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mkhas pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas po dang /
424b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mkhas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa dang /dbang po la mkhas pa dang /dbang po yongs su rdzogs
424b5(khri brgyad): ba la mkhas pa dang /shes rab myur ba la mkhas pa dang /shes rab rno ba la mkhas pa dang /shes rab mgyogs pa la mkhas pa dang /nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab
424b6(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /shes rab yangs pa la mkhas pa dang /shes rab mnyam pa med pa la mkhas pa dang /'das pa'i dus la mkhas pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus
424b7(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus la mkhas pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /sems can gyi bsam pa la mkhas pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa la
425a1(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang /don la mkhas pa dang /tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang /theg pa gsum la rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub
425a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
425a3(khri brgyad): pa la sgom pa'i phan yon ni de dag yin par rig par bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lto pa/
425a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
425a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bogyi/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs
425a6(khri brgyad): zhi ba dang /gzugs ya ma brla dang /gzugs gsog dang /gzugs snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du
425a7(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang /rnam par shes pa ya ma brla dang /rnam par shes pa gsog dang /rnam par shes pa snying
425b1(khri brgyad): po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi zhes zer ba ni/nam mkha'
425b2(khri brgyad): ltar stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par
425b3(khri brgyad): bgyi zhes zer ba ni nam mkha' ltar stong pa nyid bsgom pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
425b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring po ji srid cig tu spyad no/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
425b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//de ltar mngon par

425b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi go skabs mi dbye bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la
426a1(khri brgyad): byed pa mi dor bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
426a2(khri brgyad): pa bsgom par bya ste/ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi rgyu ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//de ltar mngon par
426a3(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o//de ltar bsgom par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
426a4(khri brgyad): spyad pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags
426a5(khri brgyad): sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na mo bsgoms pas lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin
426a6(khri brgyad): no||gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na bsgoms kyang bsgoms la/ma bsgoms kyang ma bsgoms pas lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin
426a7(khri brgyad): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na bsgoms pa'ang ma lags/ma bsgoms pa'ang ma lags pas lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin
426b1(khri brgyad): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o//gsol
426b2(khri brgyad): pa/de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba bzhin no//gsol pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/chos kyi
426b3(khri brgyad): dbyings ji lta ba bzhin no//gsol pa/chos kyi dbyings ji lta bu lags/bka' stsal pa/bdag gi khams ji lta ba dang /sems can gyi khams ji lta ba dang /srog
426b4(khri brgyad): gi khams ji lta ba dang /gang zag gi khams ji lta ba bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khams dang /gang zag gi khams kyi bar dag ji lta bu
426b5(khri brgyad): lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/bdag gam/sems can dag dmigs su yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
426b6(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bdag gam/sems can dmigs su med na/ji ltar sems can gyi khams gdags par bya ste/rab 'byor
426b7(khri brgyad): de ltar sems can du 'dogs par mi byed/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang 'dogs par mi byed/chos thams cad du'ang 'dogs par mi byed/rnam pa thams
427a1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdags su ma mchis pa lags sam/bsam
427a2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gangags
427a3(khri brgyad): su ma mchis pa lags sam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ong gdags su ma mchis pa lags sa mo/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes
427a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdags su med pa yin no//'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/chos thams
427a5(khri brgyad): cad kyi bar dag kyang gdags su med pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad gdags su ma mchis pa lags na/bcom ldan
427a6(khri brgyad): 'das ci'i slad du sems can dmyal ba gdags su mchis par gyur/dud 'gro'i skye gnas gdags su mchis par gyur/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gdags su mchis
427a7(khri brgyad): bar gyur/mi dang lha gdags su mchis par gyur/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /bla na med pa yang dag par
427b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdags su mchis par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sems can du gdags pa dmigs
427b2(khri brgyad): su yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med na/sems can dmyal ba dang /dung
427b3(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang /mi dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /dgra bcom pa'i bar dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /yang dag par rdzogs
427b4(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ji ltar gdags par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/de ltar
427b5(khri brgyad): gdags su med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
427b6(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pas/gzugs la bslab par bgyi lags sam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi logs
427b7(khri brgyad): sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs la dor ba med pa dang /bsnan pa med par
428a1(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dor ba med pa dang /bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
428a2(khri brgyad): ji ltar dor ba ma mchis pa dang /bsnan pa ma mchis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor skye ba med pa
428a3(khri brgyad): dang /'gag pa med par bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis por bslab
428a4(khri brgyad): par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis par bslab par bgyi lags//

428a6(khri brgyad): ltar mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis par bslab par bgyi legs/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong bas mngon
428a7(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med pa la bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ji ltar bslab par bgyi lags//
428b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong par blta'o//tshor ba ni tshor bas stong par blta'o//'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong par blta'o//'du byed rnams ni 'du byed
428b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis stong par blta'o//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong par blta'o//mig gri bar ni mig gis stong par blta'o//yid kyi bar ni yid kyis stong par
428b3(khri brgyad): blta'o//nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o//bsam
428b4(khri brgyad): gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong par blta'o//'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong par blta'o//dran pa nye

428b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ni gzugs
428b7(khri brgyad): kyis stong /byang chub kyi bar yang byang chub kyis stong lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
429a1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod par ji ltar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor spyod pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
429a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spyod pa ma mchis pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/bka' stsal pa//
429a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ltar des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/spyod pa'ang mi dmigs/gang la spyod pa dang //
429a4(khri brgyad): gang gis spyod pa dang /gang du spyod pa de'ang mi dmigs te/rab 'byor de gang la spyod pa de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
429a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//gsol pa/bcomo ldan 'das gal te spyod pa ma mchis pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
429a6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na los dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad
429a7(khri brgyad): par bgyi/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed po nas bzung ste/de ltar
429b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad la bskyab par bya zhing /des sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//tshul khrims srung ba na mi dmigs pa'i
429b2(khri brgyad): tshul gyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o//bzod pa sgrub pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o//brtson 'grus rtsom pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
429b3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o//shes rab sgom pa na
429b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom par bya ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na mi
429b5(khri brgyad): dmigs par 'gyur/ji tsam gyis na dmigs par 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du dmigs pa ste/gnyis su med pa ni mi dmigs
429b6(khri brgyad): pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba gang lags/bka' stsal pa/mig dang gzugs kyi bar dang /yid dang chos kyi bar dang /byang chub dang //
429b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar du ste/rab 'byor de ni gnyis so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa gang lags/bka' stsal pa/mig dang gzugs kyi
430a1(khri brgyad): bar du med pa dang /yid dang chos rnams kyi bar du med pa dang /byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du med pa ste/rab 'byor de ni gnyis su med pa'o//gsol pa/
430a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/'on te gnyis su mchis pa mi dmigs lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dmigs
430a3(khri brgyad): su yod pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/dmigs su med pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/rab 'byor 'on kyang dmigs su yod pa dang /dmigs
430a4(khri brgyad): su med pa mnyam pa nyid ni dmigs su med pa yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dmigs pa dang /dmigs pa med pa
430a5(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro///
430a6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/dmigs pa la mi chags shing /
430a7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa la'ang mi chags lags na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ji ltar
430b1(khri brgyad): sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas kyang ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/
430b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni dmigs pa la gnas shing sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de/
430b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/dmigs pa la gnas nas/sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par byed mi nus
430b4(khri brgyad): so||de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dmigs su med la/byang chub kyang dmigs su med cing /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
430b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa de'ang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//gsol
430b6(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dmigs su ma mchis/byang chub kyang dmigs su ma mchis/gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa de'ang
430b7(khri brgyad): dmigs su ma mchis lags na/'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos thams
431a1(khri brgyad): cad la 'di ni gzugs so//'di ni tshor ba'o//'di ni 'du shes so//'di ni 'du byed rnams so//'di ni rnam par shes pa'o//'di ni byang chub kyi bar ro zhes
431a2(khri brgyad): ji ltar rab tu rnam par dbye bar bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
431a3(khri brgyad): ji ltar byas pas gzugs dmigs pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa dang /byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos rnams la rab
431a4(khri brgyad): tu rnam par 'byed par mi byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
431a5(khri brgyad): spyod pa/gzugs kyang mi dmigs rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang mi dmigs/byang chub kyi bar du'ang mi dmigs lags na/'o na ji ltar sbyin pa'i
431a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
431a7(khri brgyad): par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur la gos/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis nas kyang /sems
431b1(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur lags/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags//
431b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur lags/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
431b3(khri brgyad): bgyid par 'gyur lags/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas kyang sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bgyid par 'gyur lags/bka' stsal
431b4(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//byang chub kyi bar gyi ched du shes rab
431b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
431b6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa lags/bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi ched du'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi byed do//de ci'i
431b7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma byas pa/chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ong ma byas pa dang 'gyur
432a1(khri brgyad): ba med pa yin la/byang chub kyang ma byas pa dang /'gyur ba med pa yin zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang ma byas pa dang /'gyur ba med pa yin/
432a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas pa dang /'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o///
432a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gol te chos thams cad ma bgyis pa dang /'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thog pa gsum po nyan
432a4(khri brgyad): thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'di dag rnam par dgod par 'gyur legs/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ma byas
432a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /'gyur ba med pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa gang yang dmigs su med de mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /mngon par bsags pa'i chos rnams
432a6(khri brgyad): la ni rnam par dgod pa dmigs su yod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mo ldan pa ni phung po lnga la mngon par zhen te/gzugs
432a7(khri brgyad): kyi phung po la mngon par zhen par byed/rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar lo mngon par zhen par byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par
432b1(khri brgyad): zhen par byed/gzugs la rlom sems su byed/gzugs la dmigs par byed/byang chub kyi bar la rlom sems su byed/byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa'i phyir te///
432b2(khri brgyad): de 'di snyam du bdag mthong na bdag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thor bar bya'o
432b3(khri brgyad): snyam du sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs dang /byang chub kyi bar gang yin pa dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan lngas kyang ma dmigs na skyes bu
432b4(khri brgyad): blun pa sangs rgyas la skur pa 'debs pa de dag ni sems can rnams 'khor po las yongs su thar par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
432b5(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
432b6(khri brgyad): kyi spyan lngas kyang sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bgyi ba dag ma dmigs lags na/'o na du bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs
432b7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang /log pa nyid du nges pa dang /ma nges pa'i phung po gsum
433a1(khri brgyad): du lung bstan par mdzad lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ngas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
433a2(khri brgyad): nas yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'am/log pa nyid du nges pa 'am/ma nges pa'i sems can 'ga' yang ma dmigs mod kyi/rab 'byor 'on kyang sems can rdzas med pa
433a3(khri brgyad): la rjes su 'du shes pa 'di dag ngas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang dag pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de las bzlog gi don dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan
433a4(khri brgyad): 'das de bzhin gshegs pas don dam pa la bzhugs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/bka'
433a5(khri brgyad): sbastsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
433a6(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas logs sam/bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te don dam pa la bzhugs te/bla na med pa yang dag
433a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma lags la/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
433b1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'du ma lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
433b2(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/gcig tu mi 'gyur legs grang /bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin
433b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin te//
433b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
433b5(khri brgyad): rgyas mod kyi/de ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin gshegs
433b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sprul pa ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams gang la'ang mi gnas mod kyi/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de 'gro ba dang /'ong
433b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /sdod pa dang /'dug pa'ang yod la/de sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
434a1(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam
434a2(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /dran pa nye bar
434a3(khri brgyad): bzhag pa bzhi dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bsgom pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
434a4(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
434a5(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /snying rje chen po
434a6(khri brgyad): la sgom zhing /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur la/sprul pa des kyang sems can dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas/phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur
434a7(khri brgyad): na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sprul pa des sems can 'ga' yang phung po gsum du lung bstan pa yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
434b1(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mkhyen te/sprul pa de lta bur mkhyen nas sems
434b2(khri brgyad): can gang yang btul ba med do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
434b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sprul pa
434b4(khri brgyad): la bye brag ni ci mchis/tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis/dgongs pa ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
434b5(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag ci'i'ang med de/tha dad du bya ba ci'ang mi dmigs/
434b6(khri brgyad): so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las/
434b7(khri brgyad): gang mdzad po de ni sprul pa'ang byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug
435a1(khri brgyad): las bgyid lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/de bzhin
435a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug las ji ltar bgyid lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhi bas byang chub sems
435a3(khri brgyad): dpa' ma dmigs nas/sprul pa sprul nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//sprul pa des kyang phyin bskal pa las lhag par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/des phyis
435a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes skye bo rnams kyis kun tu shes kyang sprul pa la ni skye ba med/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
435a5(khri brgyad): med de/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta ste/chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mos par bya zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
435a6(khri brgyad): pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te sprul pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ma mchis na/sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar yang ji ltar
435a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur legs/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba de dag ni phung po'i lhag ma mo mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
435b1(khri brgyad): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur lags na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis sprul pa la yon phul ba
435b2(khri brgyad): de dag kyang phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur ba lags sam//
435b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos nyid de
435b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyis sprul pa'ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog/de bzhin
435b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sprul pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog gi/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
435b6(khri brgyad): yid la byed na/de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar mo phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa
435b7(khri brgyad): lha'ang zhog gi/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas shing nam mkha' la me tog snyim pas gtor na/de dag
436a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa lta'ang
436a2(khri brgyad): zhog/nam mkha' la me tog skem pas gtor ba lha'ang zhog gi/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed
436a3(khri brgyad): na/de dag thams cad kyang rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba ni de ltar mthu che ba dang /de
436a4(khri brgyad): ltar phan yon che ba yin te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid tshad mar byas na/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
436a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sprul pa la bye brag cung zad kyang med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par
436a6(khri brgyad): bya'o//chos rnams kyi chos nyid la zhugs nas/chos nyid de'ang rnam par dkrugs par mi bya ste/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni shes rab kyi pha
436a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrugs par mi bya'o//chos thams cad kyi bar dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal
436b1(khri brgyad): te chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par mi bgyi lags na/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni gzugs so//'di ni rnam par shes
436b2(khri brgyad): pa'i bar ro zhes bgyi ba dang /de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang bka' stsal/de bzhin du dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa
436b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /thun mong dang /thun mong ma lags pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang
436b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal te/rnam par dkrugs par mdzad na/de'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par ma gyur lags sam/bka' stsal pa/
436b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ngas ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis khong du chud par 'gyur zhes ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/chos rnams brjod par zad
436b6(khri brgyad): kyi/chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs pa ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan dag gis khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/bcom ldan
436b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/chos rnams brjod pa mdzad na/bcom ldan 'das ming ma mchis pa dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i
437a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams ji ltar ming dang mtshan mas brjod pa mdzad lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor brjod pa ni ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa ma yin gyi//
437a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan du na sdug bsngal nyid brjod par zad de/ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin
437a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni ming deng mtshan me la mngon par zhen pa med do//rab 'byor gal te ming la ming mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/mtshan ma la mtshan ma
437a4(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par 'gyur na ni/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur la/mtshan ma med pa'ang mtshan ma med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/smon pa
437a5(khri brgyad): med pa'ang smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i
437a6(khri brgyad): mtha' la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/chos kyi dbyings kyang chos kyi dbyings la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas la mngon par zhen par
437a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam du zad pas/de dag ming tsam la gnas par mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
437b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar ming dang mtshan ma tsam lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing /de la'ang mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//gsol pa/bcom
437b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas pa lags na/'o na byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi ched du byang chub tu sems
437b3(khri brgyad): bskyed par bgyid cing /byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang 'du byed sna tshogs rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing
437b4(khri brgyad): sbyin brtsol ba dang /tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /brtson 'grus bcom pa dang /tIng nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /shes rab bsgom
437b5(khri brgyad): po dang /stong pa nyid la bsgom pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad ma mchis pa dang /gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang /dran pa
437b6(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang /yang dag par sbyong ba rnams la gnas pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mchis pa dang /smon
437b7(khri brgyad): pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa dang /snying rje chen po'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags//
438a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du byas na/'o na byang chub sems
438a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid ces zer ba ni/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad ming dang mtshan
438a3(khri brgyad): ma tsam du zad la/ming dang mtshan ma de dag kyang ming dang mtshan mos stong ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
438a4(khri brgyad): cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed la/chos kyi 'khor lo
438a5(khri brgyad): bskor nas kyang /sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed kyang /ming dang mtshan ma de dag skye ba'ang med/'jig pa'ang med
438a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang med/gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams
438a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ces gsung lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
438b1(khri brgyad): nyid ces nga smra'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyang bka' stsal cing /de bzhin gshegs pas lam gyi rnam pa shes
438b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid ces mdor yang bka' stsal la/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bka' stsal lags na/bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen
438b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid gsum po 'di dag la bye brag ni ci mchis tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni
438b4(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o//rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi'o//rab 'byor
438b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
438b6(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lags/ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
438b7(khri brgyad): sems dpe'i chen po rnams kyi logs/ci'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
439a1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor phyi nang gi chos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shes la//
439a2(khri brgyad): lam thams cad dang /rnam pa thams cad ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes
439a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni lAm thams cad
439a4(khri brgyad): bskyed par bya zhing /lam thams cad shes par bya dgos te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin
439a5(khri brgyad): pa'i lam de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos la/lam de dag gis lam gyi bya ba byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi byed do//gsol pa/bcom
439a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par mi bgyi zhing /des yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon
439a7(khri brgyad): sum du mi bgyi lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas shing /
439b1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam
439b2(khri brgyad): la gnas te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyid lags sam/bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam ma lags pa la gnas
439b3(khri brgyad): te lags sam/bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam dang lam ma lags pa la gnas te legs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis
439b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam yang ma lags/lam ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/bcom ldan
439b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
439b6(khri brgyad): sum du bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod lam la gnas te/len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol snyam mam/
439b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas te 'am/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/de ni ma lags
440a1(khri brgyad): so//bka' stsal pa/'o na lam dang /lam ma yin pa la gnas te'am/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
440a2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/'o na khyod lam yang ma yin/lam ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa la gnas te/len pa med par zag pa rnams les sems rnam par grol lam
440a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang la gnas te'ang zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
440a4(khri brgyad): grol ba ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'dres bdag gi sems ni ji ltar gang la'ang mi gnas pas sems rnam par grol lags so//bcom ldan 'das
440a5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang TI la'ang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum
440a6(khri brgyad): du bya'o//rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad
440a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste 'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas so//rab 'byor yang rnam pa gang dag dang /rtag gang dag dang /mtshan ma gang dag gi chos rnams
440b1(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya bar brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /rtags de dag dang /mtshan ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/de'i phyir rnam pa
440b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//gsol pa/bco myi ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
440b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang lags pa'i thams cod mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di dag las 'di'i spong ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o//'di'i spong ba ni lhag ma ma mchis pa'o zhes bgyi
440b4(khri brgyad): bar nyon mongs pa sbyang ba la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis lags snum/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spyang bA la ni tha dad pa med mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs
440b5(khri brgyad): pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa yin no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa ma yin
440b6(khri brgyad): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'ongs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyon mongs pa spongs pa 'dus ma bgyis lags som/bka' sprul pa/rab 'byor
440b7(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs su mchis lelags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
441a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni ma yin te/'dus ma byas la ni bye brag dmigs su med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs
441a2(khri brgyad): su ma mchis na/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa yin no//'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
441a3(khri brgyad): spangs pa ma yin no zhes bka' stsal legs/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshoms sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa ma yin te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs
441a4(khri brgyad): rgyas de dag la 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang bral ba'ang yod mod kyi/lus kyi 'gyur pa'ang 'byung ste/de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams//
441a5(khri brgyad): la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la/nyan thos rnams la'ang ma yin te/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
441a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te lam yang dngos po ma mchis la/mya ngan las 'das pa'ang dngos po ma mchis na/ci'i
441a7(khri brgyad): slad du 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so zhes
441b1(khri brgyad): bshad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
441b2(khri brgyad): bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci 'dus ma bgyis te/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs
441b3(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag lags so zhes rab tu 'byed par bgyid legs sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni rab tu
441b4(khri brgyad): 'byed par mi byed mod kyi 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te brjod par zad kyi/don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la tshig gi lam
441b5(khri brgyad): gyis gdags su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha' ji ltar gdags lags bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te/gang
441b6(khri brgyad): dang gang dag gis mtha' chad pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mthar gdags kyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rlung gi mtshan nyid
441b7(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs lags na/phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//dad
442a1(khri brgyad): bzhin te/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na/phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni gnas med do//
442a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'on kyang sems can gang dag gis chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pa de dag la 'di ni sngon gyi mtha'o//'di ni phyi ma'i mtha'o zhes bstan
442a3(khri brgyad): par zad kyi/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
442a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la spyod
442a5(khri brgyad): pa ni nang ngam/phyi 'am 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi
442a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
442a7(khri brgyad): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
442b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol dam pa ste/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis nyan thos dang /rang sangs
442b2(khri brgyad): rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos thams cad kyi
442b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu son pas na/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang don dam par chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i don gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
442b4(khri brgyad): pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
442b5(khri brgyad): 'drir de bzhin nyid kyang chud/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang chung /chos kyi dbyings kyang chud pos/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol
442b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang ldan pa ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/bstan du yod pa 'am/bstan du med pa 'am/thogs pa dang bcas pa 'am/thogs pa med pa'ang ma
442b7(khri brgyad): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig/
443a1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad la spyod par byed cing /spobs pa thams cad dang /snang ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa ste//
443a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
443a3(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag rnams kyis mi chod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhan mu stsogs can phyir rgol ba'i bar dag gis kyang chod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
443a4(khri brgyad): ltar gcod par byed pa gang yin pa dang /gang gis bcad pa dang /bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor byang
443a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
443a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dron la 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o//bdag med pa'i don la spyad
443a7(khri brgyad): par bya'o//sdug bsngal shes pa'i don dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang /'gog po shes pa'i don dang /lam shes pa'i don dang /zad pa shes pa'i don dang /mi skye ba
443b1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//chos shes pa'i don dang /rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i don dang /kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang /yongs su 'dris pa shes pa'i don dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i
443b2(khri brgyad): don dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la don dang
443b3(khri brgyad): tshul gyis spyad par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don
443b4(khri brgyad): dang /don mo lags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par
443b5(khri brgyad): bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad par
443b6(khri brgyad): bya ste/'dod chags bdag gi don ce'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes sprad par mi bya'o//zhe sdang bdag gi don ce'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o//gti mug bdog gi
443b7(khri brgyad): don ci 'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o//log
444a1(khri brgyad): par lta ba bdag gi don ce 'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o//lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi bar du bdag gi don ce'am/bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad
444a2(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/gnod pa'ang mi byed pa dang /lta ba'i rnam pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang
444a3(khri brgyad): gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/gnod pa'ang mi byed pa'i phyir ro//gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//gzugs bdag la gnod pa zhes sprad par mi bya'o//rnam par shes
