444a4(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa bdag la gnod pa zhes sprad par mi bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//byang chub
444a5(khri brgyad): bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
444a6(khri brgyad): gang don tam gnod pa 'ga' yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/
444a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings gnas pa 'di ni gang la'ang don tam/gnod pa ci'ang mi byed de/rab
444b1(khri brgyad): ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar don dang /gnod pa rnam par sbyangs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//de skad ces
444b2(khri brgyad): bko' stsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don
444b3(khri brgyad): kyang mi bgyid/gnod pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas
444b4(khri brgyad): dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang mi byed pas/rab 'byor de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po ni gang la 'du don dang gnod pa mi byed do//gsol po//
444b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab
444b6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'dres ma byas ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa rnams kyi don yin mod kyi/gang la'ang phan pa 'am/gnod par nye bar
444b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa'i nga ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang phan pa 'am/gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//rab
445a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang la'ang phan pa'am gnod par nye bar gnas
445a2(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byos kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas//
445a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang
445a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nus/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
445a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis pa'i chos 'thob
445a6(khri brgyad): lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
445a7(khri brgyad): chos 'thob lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma
445b1(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis
445b2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/rab
445b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gang gi phyir gnyis kyi chos sam/gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs na/de ltar dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/
445b4(khri brgyad): //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o////'phags pa shes
445b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bzhi bcu drug pa//de skad ces bka' stsal po dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
445b6(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po gang dag bla
445b7(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni sems can yang mi dmigaso la/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs par
446a1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pas dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan
446a2(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/dper bgyi ni mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' rten ma mchis pa la yol ga 'gel ba bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
446a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
446a4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug cing /rnam pa thams cod
446a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid de rtogs nas kyang /sems can thams cad chags pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no//rab 'byor dper na mi
446a6(khri brgyad): zhig yal ga 'gal ba bskyed par 'dod la mi des yal ge 'gel ba de'i rtsa ba'ang mi shes/yal ga'i mdo dang /lo ma dang /me tog kyang mi shes bzhin du//
446a7(khri brgyad): des yal ga 'gel ba de'i sdong bu bskyed de/bskyed nas kyang dus dus su srung zhing chus bran te/rim gyis sdong bu de'i yal ga'ang phun sum tshogs par
446b1(khri brgyad): gyur lo ma'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/me tog kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur/'bras bu'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/de sdong bu de'i lo ma rnams la
446b2(khri brgyad): spyod do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi cheng du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
446b3(khri brgyad): lo zhugs pa de'ang rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras
446b4(khri brgyad): bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'i lo ma lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams ngan song gsum
446b5(khri brgyad): po dgra las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i me tog lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams rgyal rigasu shring sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /
446b6(khri brgyad): bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag drang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba
446b7(khri brgyad): nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bor gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
447a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
447a2(khri brgyad): bu la 'god par byed do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do//dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed do//rang byang chub la 'god par byed do//byang chub
447a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la brten nas/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang //
447a4(khri brgyad): lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//gang dag de la yon 'bul ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po
447a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing /bla na
447a6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de la sems can yang mi dmigs shing sems can du gdags
447a7(khri brgyad): pa'ang med la/sems can de dag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa las yongs su grol bar byed de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
447b1(khri brgyad): pos gang dag gi ched du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i sems can nam/sems can du gdags pa ni 'ang 'drin mi dmigs so zhes de ltar shes
447b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
447b3(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byed
447b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur//
447b5(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/mi khom po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/dman pa'i 'gro
447b6(khri brgyad): ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/gzugs med
447b7(khri brgyad): pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chod par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang
448a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
448a2(khri brgyad): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs na/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
448a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing /rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur//
448a4(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/sems can dmyal ba'i bar dag rgyun tshad par mi 'gyur/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs
448a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams kyi bar dag rgyun tshang par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o/
448a6(khri brgyad): zhes gang smras pa ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
448a7(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gdags pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'phags pa thams cad gdags
448b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis gzugs gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma
448b2(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gdags pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
448b3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir/de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/de bas na
448b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste/rab
448b5(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin
448b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs na/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par 'gyur zhing /dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro//
448b7(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba'ang shes par 'gyur ro//sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba shes na/smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//smon nas shes
449a1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su rdzogs na dus gsum shes pa rnam par dag par byed par 'gyur ro//dus gsum shes pa rnam par sbyangs na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /sems can
449a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur ro//sems can rnams kyi don byed na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs na rnam pa thams cad
449a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams thog pa gsum po dag la
449a4(khri brgyad): 'god par 'gyur ro//sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la bkod nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur te/rab
449a5(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang /phan yon thams cad mthong bas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
449a6(khri brgyad): par bya zhing /gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
449a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi
449b1(khri brgyad): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa'
449b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no///
449b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
449b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
449b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to//rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur tam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na//
449b6(khri brgyad): ci sems can de dag bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis lags
449b7(khri brgyad): so//bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
450a1(khri brgyad): pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin
450a2(khri brgyad): pa 'di gnyis la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byung
450a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir
450a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nyan thos dang /rang
450a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba
450a6(khri brgyad): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
450a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams lta zhog gi/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi
450b1(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems
450b2(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams
450b3(khri brgyad): lta zhog go/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams
450b4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/
450b5(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du zhugs par gyur
450b6(khri brgyad): kyang /de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
450b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur kyang //
451a1(khri brgyad): de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//rab
451a2(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams gang yin
451a3(khri brgyad): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi tsha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro zhing rgyu dang dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar
451a4(khri brgyad): mi 'gro'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci zhig yid la bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
451a5(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
451a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi dngos po ni ci lta bu zhig lags/dmigs pa ni ci zhig lags/dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/mtshan nyid ni gang lags/bka'
451a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa/lhun gyis grub pa/skye ba med pa/'byung ba med pa'o///
451b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni ci zhig lags/dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/mtshan nyid ni gang lags zhes zer
451b2(khri brgyad): ba la/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o//dbang byed pa ni dran pa'o//rnam pa ni zhi ba'o//mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/rab 'byor rnam pa
451b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni de yin no//dbang byed pa ni de yin no//rnam pa ni de yin no//mtshan nyid ni de yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad
451b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kho na dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/'on te gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis shing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma
451b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags sam/de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
451b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
451b7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar
452a1(khri brgyad): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas
452a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /mngon par shes pa dang po dang /mngon par shes pa gnyis
452a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa dang /drug pa dang /'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis
452a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med do//gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med do//
452a5(khri brgyad): 'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du'ang dngos po med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la ni ngo bo nyid med do//rab 'byor gang la ngo
452a6(khri brgyad): ngo nyid med pa de ni dngos po mang po'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
452a7(khri brgyad): 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/gang la 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa de dngos po med pa'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
452b1(khri brgyad): nyid do//rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
452b2(khri brgyad): do//chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de
452b3(khri brgyad): ltar rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po
452b4(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
452b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid/ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
452b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang /byams
452b7(khri brgyad): pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /nang stong pa nyid nas rang gi
453a1(khri brgyad): mnan nyid sto ba nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas 'phags pa'i lam ldan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /stong pa 'i kyi dang 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i
453a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
453a3(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing
453a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
453a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /sems
453a6(khri brgyad): can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'
453a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam/
453b1(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dris par byed do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs
453b2(khri brgyad): su 'dris par byed do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs su
453b3(khri brgyad): 'dris par byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed la/byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo
453b4(khri brgyad): bo nyid du shes par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa de ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
453b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
453b6(khri brgyad): shes dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par mi byed do//rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub kyi lam yin te/de byang chub kyi lam 'di dag gis pha rol tu
453b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
454a1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe de'i bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad ni mi skye ba'i spong bas spong bar 'gyur ro//des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum
454a2(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par bltas nas dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/dngos por lta ci smos/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar
454a3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//rab 'byor dngos po'ang mi dmigs na/dngos po med pa lta ci smos te/de'ang byang chub
454a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de//
454a5(khri brgyad): de sbyin pa sbyin pa na/rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do//len pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing /mtshon mar mi byed de//
454a6(khri brgyad): dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do//sbyin pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do//byang chub
454a7(khri brgyad): kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs shing mtshan mar mi byed la/dmigs par mi byed de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po med
454b1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul du rnam par mi rtog cing /mtshan mar mi byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed cing /rnam par mi rtog la yid la mi byed
454b2(khri brgyad): do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang dmigs par mi byed cing mtshan mar mi byed do//gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/gang mngon par rdzogs par
454b3(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar bya ba 'am/gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad
454b4(khri brgyad): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/dngos po med pa de'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas shing /chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste//
454b5(khri brgyad): byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no///
454b6(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/chos rnams ni chos rnams dang bral ba yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kho na chos rnams dang bral ba lags na/bral ba'i chos kyis bral
454b7(khri brgyad): ba'i chos dngos po mchis pa 'am/dngos po ma mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar rung ste/dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/
455a1(khri brgyad): dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung /dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar
455a2(khri brgyad): mi rung la/dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung lags na/de ltar ma 'tshal ba'i chos thams cad la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/'ongos
455a3(khri brgyad): po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston par lta ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
455a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/dngos po yod pa zhes bya ba 'am/dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston gyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang
455a5(khri brgyad): gzhan zhig lags la/don dam pa'ang gzhan zhig lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan ma yin la/don dam pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/'jig rten
455a6(khri brgyad): gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/de bzhin nyid de sems can de dag gis mi shes shing ma mthong bas/de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i
455a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod pa 'am/dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston to//rab 'byor yang sems can 'di dag ni phung po lnga po 'di dag la dngos por 'du shes shing dngos po med
455b1(khri brgyad): par mi shes te/ji ltar byas na dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu dbye ba'i phyir de ltar ston par byed de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
455b2(khri brgyad): pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
455b3(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/
455b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/de'i
455b5(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi spyod pa de gang la spyod lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
455b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
455b7(khri brgyad): dang /nang dang phyi'i chos rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
456a1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /phyi
456a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /bsam gtan dang po dang /
456a3(khri brgyad): gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
456a4(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /yang
456a5(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /dbang po lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /stobs lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
456a6(khri brgyad): bdun stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /snyoms
456a7(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
456b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /spobs pa rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /yi ge sgrub pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa
456b2(khri brgyad): dang /yi ge rnams la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod po dang /yi ge rnams med pa la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /'dus byas kyi khams snang ngo zhes spang po dang /
456b3(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong nga zhes spyod pa ste/ci nas byang chub la gnyis su mi 'byed pa de ltar rjes su spyad do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
456b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
456b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor yang dge pa'i
456b6(khri brgyad): don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i ngan
456b7(khri brgyad): rtogs pas na/de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//rab 'byor yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//gsal
457a1(khri brgyad): pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na/byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba ni stong
457a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so//de ni de bzhin nyid kyi chog bla dgas so//de ni yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so//de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so//do na chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas
457a3(khri brgyad): so//rab 'byor yang byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam gyi tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor yang byang chub kyi don ni yang dag pa'i don to//rab 'byor yang byang chub ni de bzhin nyid dang /
457a4(khri brgyad): nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan
457a5(khri brgyad): ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor yang
457a6(khri brgyad): byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
457a7(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa de ni pha rol tu
457b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags na/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa 'am/'grib pa 'am/nyams pa 'am/'phel ba 'am/skye ba 'am//
457b2(khri brgyad): 'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to///
457b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de ni chos gang yang bsags/
457b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ram/'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/dgag pa'i phyir ram/kun nas nyon mongs par bya
457b5(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ram/rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir mi spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni/
457b6(khri brgyad): bsags pa'i phyir ram/'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/dgag pa'i phyir ram/kun nas
457b7(khri brgyad): nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
458a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang la'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na//
458a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
458a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags/bsam gtan rnams dang /
458a4(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa nas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
458a5(khri brgyad): pa'i bar la spyod pa lags/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mod pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la spyod pa dang /
458a6(khri brgyad): snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag la spyod pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba dang /byang chub
458a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub
458b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//de bzhin du sbyar te/gnyis kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi
458b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi spyod do//gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do//rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
458b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
458b4(khri brgyad): du'ang thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod la/de bzhin du gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam po thams cad mkhyen
458b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod lags na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /sems
458b6(khri brgyad): bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
458b7(khri brgyad): skyes te//rab 'byor gang dag gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhi na/rab 'byor gnyis la brten pa ni byis pa sa so'i skye bo thams
459a1(khri brgyad): cad de/de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis su mi spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/dge ba'i
459a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
459a3(khri brgyad): bcas pas 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//mi dge ba gang dag gis zil gyis non par gyur pa ni/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar 'gyur zhing //
459a4(khri brgyad): mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dag gis kyang 'phrogs par 'gyur ro//de dag gis 'phrogs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi
459a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
459a6(khri brgyad): pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/shes rab kyi
459a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir shes
459b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin la/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
459b2(khri brgyad): bsnyen bkur ma byas sam/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas sam/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
459b3(khri brgyad): pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
459b4(khri brgyad): bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/
459b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
459b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su
459b7(khri brgyad): bcad pa'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /gleng gzhi'i sde dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung
460a1(khri brgyad): ba'i chos kyi sde dang /gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris par byas nas/yid
460a2(khri brgyad): kyi rjes su rtog par byed la lta bas shin tu rtogs par byed cing gzungs thob par 'gyur ro//gzungs thob nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed do//so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed nas de
460a3(khri brgyad): tshe rjes nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nam yang chos de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
460a4(khri brgyad): la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed par byed de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su zin pas gzhan yang ngan song rnams dang /mi khom pa rnams su mi skye zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang bsam pa gang gis
460a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bzung
460a6(khri brgyad): bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos gang dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
460a7(khri brgyad): pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa rnams dang nam du'ang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/de ltar sangs
460b1(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su bzung bar bya ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang bsten par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
460b2(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa las/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i thabs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das
460b3(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur mi bgyid cing dge
460b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mi bskyed la/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur
460b5(khri brgyad): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas la/dge ba'i
460b6(khri brgyad): rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed cing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
460b7(khri brgyad): 'das rnams la 'ong bsnyen bkur byas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang bsten du zin kyang /da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
461a1(khri brgyad): mi nus na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la
461a2(khri brgyad): ma bsten par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan
461a3(khri brgyad): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems
461a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bstan kyang
461a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de ma
461a6(khri brgyad): thos la/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ma bskyed de/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang ma bsten pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa//
461a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa gong dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa
461b1(khri brgyad): gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
461b2(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
461b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /mir gyur pa rnams dang /mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
461b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas de sbyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/len pa po la'ang len pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/sbyin pa po la'ang sbyin pa
461b5(khri brgyad): po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa dang /yongs su ma grub pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong lo/chos
461b6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la'ang 'jug ste/chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/thabs la mkhas pa de dang
461b7(khri brgyad): ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
462a1(khri brgyad): na/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/'khor ba na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin
462a2(khri brgyad): pa'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/gzhan du ni sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang /sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//shes rab kyi
462a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/drug cu rtsa drug pa'o////rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
462a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis tshul khrims
462a5(khri brgyad): de srung ste de 'dod chags kyi sems dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /ngagra la nyal dang /kun nas ldang ba dang /byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos gang yang
462a6(khri brgyad): rung ba 'di lta ste/ser sna dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /'khrug pa'i sems dang /le lo'i sems dang /dman pa'i sems dang /'khrul pa'i sems dang /'chal pa'i
462a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi sems dang /nga rgyal dang /brnyas pa dang /lhag pa'i nga rgyal lam/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lam/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyis bsgrib par mi 'gyur ro///
462b1(khri brgyad): deci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos thams cad ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma grub pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong la//chos rnams kyi chos
462b2(khri brgyad): kyimatshan nyid la 'jug ste/chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
462b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
462b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod na/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/'khor ba na tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i
462b5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/gzhan du na sems can rjes su bzung ba dang sems can la mi gnod pa dang /sems can la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
462b6(khri brgyad): spyod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/tshul khrims kyi le'u zhes bya ste/drug rngu rtsa bdun pa'o///de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rtson
462b7(khri brgyad): 'brus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan bya pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
463a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa na/sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab sgom par byed de/de la
463a2(khri brgyad): 'dod chags kyi sems nas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi sems kyis bsgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan
463a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong par shes shing chos thams cad ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma grub pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong la/chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/chos
463a4(khri brgyad): thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel
463a5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par 'phel na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/sems can rnams kyang yongs su
463a6(khri brgyad): smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la 'khor ba na shes rab kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/
463a7(khri brgyad): gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang /sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
463b1(khri brgyad): las rnam par 'phel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
463b2(khri brgyad): 'jug pa nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/
463b3(khri brgyad): rnam par smin pa'ang yongs su mi 'dzin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan na/bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med
463b4(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas/mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan
463b5(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/thabs la mkhas pa dang ljon pas mthong ba dang bsgom
463b6(khri brgyad): pas spong ba'i lam la spyod kyang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi byed do//lan cig phyir 'ong po'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang
463b7(khri brgyad): thob par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes la/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la'ang spyod cing /nyan thos dang /
464a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' ba'i phyir te/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa yin no//rab 'byor
464a2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
464a3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dgu la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob por mi 'gyur zhing /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir
464a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad rung gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du shes pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
464a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
464a6(khri brgyad): bco brgyad dang /snying rje chen po la'ang 'dres par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par ma byas shing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas kyi bar du'ang
464a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o///
464b1(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
464b2(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing rnam par smin pa'ang len par mi bgyid pa ni/blo'i mchog dang ldan pa
464b3(khri brgyad): lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bko'i skal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub
464b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing /rnam par smin pa'ang len par mi byed pa ni/blo'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
464b5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid las mi goyo ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags/bka' stsal pa/dngos po
464b6(khri brgyad): med pa las mi g.yo ba'o//rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du/ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags zhes zer ba ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
464b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
465a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa
465a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo
465a3(khri brgyad): nyid las mi g.yo'o//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snying rje chen po'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o///
465a4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang/
465a5(khri brgyad): rgya bar mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab
465a6(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam//
465a7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar
465b1(khri brgyad): rdo thogs lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/ci bcom ldan 'das dngos pos dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags
465b2(khri brgyad): sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po mngon par mi rtogs shing /dngos pos kyang
465b3(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs la/dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs shing dngos pos kyang dngos po mngon par rtogs pa ma lags
465b4(khri brgyad): na/'o na ni thob pa'ang ma mchis/mngon par rtog pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mngon par rtogs pa ni yod mod kyi/mngon par
465b5(khri brgyad): bsgrub pa 'di bzhis ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na da mngon par rtogs pa ji lta bu zhig lags/bka' stsal pa/ji ltar dngos po'ang ma yin zhing dngos po med
465b6(khri brgyad): pa'i nga ma yin pa de ltar mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir/gang la spros pa de dag med pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs
465b7(khri brgyad): pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
466a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i spros pa gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du
466a2(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya
466a3(khri brgyad): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
466a4(khri brgyad): spros pa'o//gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
466a5(khri brgyad): bdag yod ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//tshor ba
466a6(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' spros pa'o//gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba
466a7(khri brgyad): yin zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
466b1(khri brgyad): yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes/
466b2(khri brgyad): bya ba ni spros pa'o//kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//lam bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//bsam
466b3(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni smos pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin
466b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
466b5(khri brgyad): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba yin
466b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
466b7(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i
467a1(khri brgyad): sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag/
467a2(khri brgyad): par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//mi
467a3(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
467a4(khri brgyad): nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
467a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed de/gzugs rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa zhes spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do//tshor
467a6(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa zhes spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
467a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam pa'i bar du spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngo bo nyid kyis ni ngo bo nyid spros par mi byed cing /dngos po med pas kyang
467b1(khri brgyad): dngos po spros par mi byed la/ngo bo nyid dang /dngos po med pa ma gtogs par yang gang gis spros par byed pa dang /gang spros par bya ba dang /cis spros par bya ba dang /gang la spros par bya ba
467b2(khri brgyad): gzhan ci'ang mi dmigs te/rab 'byor de bas na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med cing /byang chub kyi bar du spros pa med pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
467b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
467b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad spros pa ma mchis par ji ltar lta bar bgyid legs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
467b5(khri brgyad): stsal to//rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do//gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la spros pa med do//
467b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de'i phyir na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du spros pa med do//rab 'byor byang chub sems
467b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
468a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos grang la'ang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na/ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan
468a2(khri brgyad): thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/lam gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol
468a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi lam dang /rang sangs
468a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi lam dang /sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa la mi 'jug mod kyi/'on kyang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad
468a5(khri brgyad): la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na dgra bcom pas lam thams cad la bslabs nas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug mod
468a6(khri brgyad): kyi/ji srid du lam gyi 'bras bu ma bskyed po de srid du lam gyi skad cig la dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
468a7(khri brgyad): lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug mod kyi/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/de
468b1(khri brgyad): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
468b2(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems dpe'i skyon ma mchos pa la 'jug na/
468b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de lta legs nan brgyad pa'i lam yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur la/rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/lan cig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/lan cig
468b4(khri brgyad): phyi 'ong ba'i lam yang gzhan/phyir mi 'ong ba la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/phyir mo 'ong ba'i lam yang gnan/dgra bcom pa la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/dgra bcom
468b5(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yang gzhan/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang gzhan/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur lags sam/
468b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gal te lam de dag phan tshun tha dad par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems
468b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngas lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal bar
469a1(khri brgyad): gyur na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed pas brgyad par mi 'gyur lags grang /mthong ba'i lam bskyed par rgyun du
469a2(khri brgyad): zhugs par mi 'gyur lags grang /bsgom pa'i lam bskyed pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur lags grang /dgra bcom pa'i bar du'ang
469a3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur lags grang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bskyed pos rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad
469a4(khri brgyad): pa'i lam bskyed pas brgyad par 'gyur ba 'am/brgyad par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa de ni gnas ma mchis shing skabs ma lags te/de ni gnas
469a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//de
469a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 'am/rang byang chub kyi bar du thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug ces bgyi
469a7(khri brgyad): ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis
469b1(khri brgyad): lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /byang chub
469b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob cing /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags/de skad ces
469b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
469b4(khri brgyad): chen po brgyad par gyur la/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas lam thams cad bskyed de/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ces bya ba ni gnas med do//skabs ma yin
469b5(khri brgyad): zhing de ni gnas med do//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba de ni gnas med do//rab 'byor yang byang chub sems
469b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad po dag la rnam par bltas nas 'da' bar byed de/brgyad
469b7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang //
470a1(khri brgyad): byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/'di ni par bstan pa yin no//des shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad po de dag las 'das par byas nas byang chub
470a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa dang /bag chags dang /mtshams
470a3(khri brgyad): sbyor ba thams cad spong ngo //rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang
470a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa
470a5(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//dgra bcom pa'i shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /spong ba gang yin/
470a6(khri brgyad): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o//byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas lam gyi rnam
470a7(khri brgyad): ba shes pa nyid kyi shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags dang /
470b1(khri brgyad): mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
470b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'a
470b3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi lam dang /sangs rgyas
470b4(khri brgyad): kyi lam dang /sangs rgyas kyi lam bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lam gang lags pa 'di dag las bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi lam gang lags/bka' stsal
470b5(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bskyed par bya'o//rab 'byor de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam
470b6(khri brgyad): par dag pa ni 'di yin te/rnam pa gang dang gang dag dang /mtshan ma gang dang gang dag dang /rtags gang dang gang dog gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de
470b7(khri brgyad): dang de dag dang /mtshan ma de dang de dag dang /rtags de dang de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya'o//mngon par rdzogs par
471a1(khri brgyad): rtogs nas kyang gzhan gdul ba'i phyir ci nas pha rol gyis khong du chud par gzhan dag la brjod par bya/bstan par bya/bshad par bya/gdags par bya/dgod par bya'o//
471a2(khri brgyad): del skad dang /brda dang /sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyi go bar 'gyur ba'i skad dang /brda dang /sgra thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
471a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos bsgrub par bya ste/brag ca lta bur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya'o//rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
471a4(khri brgyad): pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes par bya'o//sems can dmyal
471a5(khri brgyad): ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya ste/sems can dmyal ba'i lam de las bzlog par bya/rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya//
471a6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o//de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya/rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya/'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o//mi 'am
471a7(khri brgyad): ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /mi rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o///
471b1(khri brgyad): lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o//tshangs pa'i lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o//'od gsal ba
471b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /dge rgyas pa rnams dang /'bras bu che ba rnams dang /'du shes med pa rnams dang /mi che ba rnams dang /mi gdung ba rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes
471b3(khri brgyad): par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o//'du shes
471b4(khri brgyad): med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/rgyu'ang shes par bya/'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes par bya/yang dag par
471b5(khri brgyad): spong ba bzhi shes par bya/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes par bya/dbang po lnga shes par bya/stobs lnga shes par bya/byang chub kyi yan log bdun shes par bya/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
471b6(khri brgyad): brgyad pa shes par bya/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid shes par bya/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa shes par bya/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa shes par bya/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
471b7(khri brgyad): stobs bcu shes par bya/mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes par bya/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par bya/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya/snying rje chen po shes par bya'o//lam
472a1(khri brgyad): de dag gis kyang sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par
472a2(khri brgyad): byabya gang yin pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do//rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rang byang chub la 'god do//byang chub la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag
472a3(khri brgyad): ni byang chub la 'grod de/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la bsrabs
472a4(khri brgyad): nas sems can b+h+rUM bsam pa la 'jug go//sems can gyi bsam pa la zhugs nas ci nas de'i chos bstan pa chud mi za zhing don yod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na
472a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar de ni pha rol gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa shin tu bye brag phyed cing /shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir te/des ni sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba dang /'ong ba dang /
472a6(khri brgyad): 'chi 'pho dang /skye ba yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du shes so//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /
472a7(khri brgyad): nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i lam thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
472b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
472b2(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gang lags pa dang /byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag ldan pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la/gzugs can yang ma lags/bstan du'ang
472b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis/thogs par yang ma mchis te/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub sgrub par
472b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das ldan pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/gzugs can yang ma lags/bstan du'ang ma mchis/thogs pa'ang ma mchis te/'di ltar mtshan
472b5(khri brgyad): nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos ni gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am/'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/nam mkha' ni chos grang la'ang sgrub
472b6(khri brgyad): pam lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par
472b7(khri brgyad): bgyid pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang yang sgrub
473a1(khri brgyad): pa 'am/'jig par byed pa ma yin no//rab 'byor sems can gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi phyir/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di
473a2(khri brgyad): dag ni byang chub bsgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to//rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /'du shes gang yin pa dang /'du byed rnams gang yin pa
473a3(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi stong
