473a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
473a5(khri brgyad): pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa
473a6(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar du gang yin pa dang /
473a7(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang /snying rje chen po gang yin pa
473b1(khri brgyad): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing gzugs can ma
473b2(khri brgyad): yin pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad gzung ba'i
473b3(khri brgyad): phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dog par mdzad kyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad la'ang shes pa
473b4(khri brgyad): dang /mthong bas bslab par bya'o//de la shes pa dang mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas/chos kha cig ni rtogs par bya/chos kha cig ni rtogs par mi bya'o//gsol pa//
473b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/rtogs par mi bgyi ba'i chos
473b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
473b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes
474a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsal to//
474a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ni gang lagos/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis
474a3(khri brgyad): na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'dri la nyan thos
474a4(khri brgyad): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags
474a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//'jig
474a6(khri brgyad): tshogs lnga lta bu dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//rdul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan
474a7(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa'i//
474b1(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa 'dra ma yin no//rgod pa drang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//bsam gtan//
474b2(khri brgyad): dradang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang ldan pa 'dri ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//byams pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma
474b3(khri brgyad): yin no//snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang me yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//'du
474b4(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /snying rje chen po'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'i
474b5(khri brgyad): ma yin no//'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs
474b6(khri brgyad): can ma yin zhing /bstan du med la/thogs pa med cing /'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro//gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni gzugs can
474b7(khri brgyad): ma yin pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//
475a1(khri brgyad): thogs pa med pa rnams ni thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig
475a2(khri brgyad): tu ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//mtshan nyid med pa rnams ni mtshan nyid med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor gang la byang
475a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol
475a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med cing bstan du med la thogs pa med pa ste/de la des bslabs na chos gang gis mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
475a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
475a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/
475a7(khri brgyad): gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/si'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams
475b1(khri brgyad): dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
475b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par
475b3(khri brgyad): mi bgyi/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/bsam gtan dang po'i
475b4(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /
475b5(khri brgyad): btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan
475b6(khri brgyad): nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid lo bslab par mi bgyi//
475b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms par
476a1(khri brgyad): 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par ma

476a3(khri brgyad): bslab par mi bgyi/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab
476a4(khri brgyad): par mi bgyi/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang /lugs su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab
476a5(khri brgyad): par mi bgyi/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /'du byed
476a6(khri brgyad): kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang /'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la ma bslabs
476a7(khri brgyad): par nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma
476b1(khri brgyad): mchis pa la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur lags/byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/rnam pa thams
476b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa
476b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
476b4(khri brgyad): to//rab 'byor gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpa' bslab par bya ba zhig na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid
476b5(khri brgyad): med pa/gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan
476b6(khri brgyad): nyid de dag la'ang bslab par mi bya/mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor snga na mtshan nyid yod la phyis mtshan nyid med par gyur pa ma yin///
476b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di ltar de dag ni snga nas kyang mtshan nyid med la/da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams
477a1(khri brgyad): la'ang bslab par mi bya/mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin
477a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/mtshan nyid kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//de skrod ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
477a3(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags la/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/bcom
477a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par
477a5(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar rngo mi thogs lags so//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das
477a6(khri brgyad): par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par rngo mi thogs la/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs
477a7(khri brgyad): par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs lags so//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs la byang chub sems dpa'
477b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so//sangs rgyas
477b2(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyi la sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par rngo mi thogs la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa
477b3(khri brgyad): yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar rngo mi thogs lags so//chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par rngo mi thogs la/lan cig phyir 'ong
477b4(khri brgyad): paba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang dgod par yang rngo mi thogs/rang byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/
477b5(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so//sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang sems can rnams dgod par rngo mi
477b6(khri brgyad): thogs/tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi
477b7(khri brgyad): thogs lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor
478a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med de/mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin la/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa la bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
478a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la bsgom pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
478a3(khri brgyad): bsgom pa lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams
478a4(khri brgyad): cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/bka' stsal pa/gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
478a5(khri brgyad): pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mig la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
478a6(khri brgyad): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//gzugs la
478a7(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang /chos la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
478b1(khri brgyad): pa'o//blang ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//dor ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan
478b2(khri brgyad): dang po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang /bzhi pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
478b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//byams pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//snying rje dang dga' ba dang /btang snyoms la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
478b4(khri brgyad): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas
478b5(khri brgyad): skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o///
478b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa
478b7(khri brgyad): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa
479a1(khri brgyad): dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs rngub pa dang /dbyung ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par/
479a2(khri brgyad): 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes
479a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//bdag tu 'du shes pa la bsgom pa
479a4(khri brgyad): rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sems can du 'du shes pa dang /srog tu 'du shes pa dang /skye ba por 'du shes pa dang /shed las skyes par 'du shes
479a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /shed bur 'du shes pa dang /gso bar 'du shes pa dang /gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /byed pa por 'du shes pa dang /byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par
479a6(khri brgyad): 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /bde ba'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par
479a7(khri brgyad): 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//yang dag par
479b1(khri brgyad): spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
479b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par
479b3(khri brgyad): 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad
479b4(khri brgyad): la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
479b5(khri brgyad): bsgom pa'o//rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med pa dang /dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
479b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam 'phags
479b7(khri brgyad): pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sdug bsngal shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
480a1(khri brgyad): pa'o//kun 'byung ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//'gog pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi
480a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//lam shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//zad pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab
480a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mi skye ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//chos shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes
480a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//kun rdzob shes pa la bsgom pa rnam
480a5(khri brgyad): par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//'dris pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sgra ji bzhin shes pa la
480a6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o///
480a7(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
480b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po
480b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
480b3(khri brgyad): pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgom pa rnam por 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab
480b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
480b5(khri brgyad): bco brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//snying rje chen po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rgyun
480b6(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
480b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rang byang chub la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//rnam pa
481a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba la bsgom pa
481a2(khri brgyad): rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
481a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gzugs la rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/de bzhin du bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar la bsgom
481a4(khri brgyad): pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
481a5(khri brgyad): stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//tshor ba dang /
481a6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol
481a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa smon pa med cing /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med pa'i phyir ro//'dod
481b1(khri brgyad): chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//bag la nyal dang /kun nas dkris pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos por
481b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes pa la ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
481b3(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar de dngos po la chags kyi/de sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims
481b4(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab la ni chags par mi byed pa'i phyir ro//gang dngos po la 'di ni nga'o zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la
481b5(khri brgyad): ni thar pa med do//rab 'byor dngos por 'du shes pa la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa dang /yang dag par spong ba sgom pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa dang /dbang po sgom pa dang /
481b6(khri brgyad): stobs sgom pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang /lam sgom pa dang /stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom pa med do//de bzhin du sbyar te rnam
481b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar de dngos po la chags pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
482a1(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dngos po ni gang lags/dngos po ma mchis pa ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
482a2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po'o//gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs su
482a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes pa ni gnyis so//tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /'du shes su 'du shes pa dang /'du byed rnams su 'du shes pa dang /rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang /mig tu 'du
482a4(khri brgyad): shes pa nas yid du 'du shes pa'i bar dang /gzugs su 'du shes pa nas chos su 'du shes pa'i bar dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang /byang chub tu 'du
482a5(khri brgyad): shes pa dang /'dus byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang /rab 'byor 'du shes ji snyed pa thams cad dang /'du shes med pa ji snyed pa
482a6(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad ni gnyis so//ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du dngos po yin no//ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'du byed do//ji tsam du 'du byed yod pa de tsam du sems
482a7(khri brgyad): can rnams skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang //smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi
482b1(khri brgyad): 'grol lo//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/khyod kyis gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa med do//tshul khrims med do//bzod pa med do//brtson 'grus med do//bsam gtan med do//shes
482b2(khri brgyad): rab med do//lam mod do//mngon par rtogs pa med do//tha na mthun pa'i bzod pa'ong med na/gzugs yongs su shes pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yongs su shes pa lta ga la yod ces
482b3(khri brgyad): de ltar rig par bya ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/dgra bcom pa nyid
482b4(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang /rang byang chub dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar du'ang ga la yod//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las lam bsgom pa bstan
482b5(khri brgyad): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o///de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
482b6(khri brgyad): 'das gal te dngos po'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang ma mchis na/thob pa lta ga la mchis/mngon par rtogs pa lta ga la mchis te/ma mchis na ci dngos po ma mchis
482b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa mchis lags sam/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod
483a1(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /lam bsgom pa mchis lags sam/lam bsgom
483a2(khri brgyad): pa la brten nas nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/nyon mongs pa de dag gis bsgribs na ni byang chub sems
483a3(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur/rnam pa
483a4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'ga'
483a5(khri brgyad): tsam gyis gnas pa dang skye ba'ang ma mchis na ni/chos ma bskyed pa de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang rngo mi thogs lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang //
483a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//rab 'byor de de bzhin te/dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la ni
483a7(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar du med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems
483b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/dngos po'i 'du shes sam/dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes sam/gzugs kyi 'du shes nas rnam par shes pa'i 'dra
483b2(khri brgyad): shes kyi bar ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/'dod chags kyi 'du shes sam/'dod chags spong ba'i 'du shes sam/zhe sdang gi 'du shes sam/zhe sdang spong
483b3(khri brgyad): ba'i 'du shes sam/gti mug gi 'du shes sam/gti mug spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ma rig pa'i 'du shes sam/ma rig pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/'du byed kyi 'du shes sam/
483b4(khri brgyad): 'du byed spang ba'i 'du shes sam/rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes sam/rnam par shes pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes sam/ming dang gzugs spong ba'i 'du shes
483b5(khri brgyad): sam/skye mched drug gi 'du shes sam/skye mched drug spong ba'i 'du shes sam/reg pa'i 'du shes sam/reg pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/tshor ba'i 'du shes sam/tshor ba spong ba'i 'du
483b6(khri brgyad): shes sam/sred pa'i 'du shes sam/srid pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/len pa'i 'du shes sam/len pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/srid pa'i 'du shes sam/srid pa spong ba'i 'du shes
483b7(khri brgyad): sam/skye ba'i 'du shes sam/skye ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/rga shi'i 'du shes sam/rga shi spong ba'i 'du shes sam/mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid
484a1(khri brgyad): mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i 'du shes sam/mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/sdug bsngal gyi
484a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes sam/sdug bsngal spong ba'i 'du shes sam/kun 'byung ba'i 'du shes sam/kun 'byung ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/'gog pa'i 'du shes sam/'gog pa mngon sum du
484a3(khri brgyad): bgyid pa'i 'du shes sam/lam gyi 'du shes sam/lam bsgom pa'i 'du shes sam/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/bag chags kyi mtshams
484a4(khri brgyad): sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i 'du shes mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
484a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni chos gang la'ang dngos po'i 'du shes sam/dngos po med pa'i 'du shes med do//rab 'byor gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /dngos
484a6(khri brgyad): po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa yin no//gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i 'du shes
484a7(khri brgyad): kyang med pa de ni de'i lam bsgom pa yin no//gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no//rab 'byor byang chub
484b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa'o//mngon par rtogs pa ni dngos po med pa ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar
484b2(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
484b3(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
484b4(khri brgyad): du de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/de skad ces
484b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la nga sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
484b6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshe 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa nas/bsam gtan poni pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas la/ngas bsam gtan dang /bsam gtan gyi
484b7(khri brgyad): yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung yang /bsam gtan dang /bsem gtan gyi yan lag de dag gis rlom sems su ma byis/bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang ba ma byas/bsam gtan
485a1(khri brgyad): rnams la dmigs pa ma byas shing /nga bsam gtan de dag gi rnam pa yongs su dag pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir te sems mngon
485a2(khri brgyad): par gzhol bar byas so//lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du
485a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar bya ste/ngas mngon sum du bya ba de dag gi mtshan ma bzung yang mngon par shes pa de dag
485a4(khri brgyad): gis rlom sems su ma byas/ro myang ba ma byas/dmigs pa ma byas te/nga mngon par shes pa de dag la nam mkha' lta bur mthong bas snyoms par zhugs so//rab 'byor ngas skad
485a5(khri brgyad): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis 'di ni sdug bsngal yin no//'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba yin no//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa yin no//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par
485a6(khri brgyad): 'phro ba'i lam yin no zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa
485a7(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pas sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung ston to//de skad ces bka' stsal
485b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos
485b2(khri brgyad): po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsam gtan bzhi ji ltar bskyed lags/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa drug ji ltar bskyed lags/sems can ma mchis par
485b3(khri brgyad): yang sems can rnams phung po gsum du ji ltar lung bstan logs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab
485b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams sam/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid cig yod par gyur tam/rang gi dngos po 'am/gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod par gyur na ni/rab 'byor
485b5(khri brgyad): nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs nas bsam gtan dang /
485b6(khri brgyad): po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur bo zhig na/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po 'am/dngos po med pa 'am/rang gi dngos po
485b7(khri brgyad): 'am/gzhan gyi dngos po med de/gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na yin pas/de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig
486a1(khri brgyad): pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bcan bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas par/
486a2(khri brgyad): gyur to//bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po 'am/rang gi dngos po 'am/gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yin
486a3(khri brgyad): par gyur na ni/rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi
486a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa thams cad la dngos po med do/rang gi dngos po dang /gzhan gyi dngos po med la/gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na
486a5(khri brgyad): yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud nas bla na med pa
486a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'od skad ces gsol to//
486a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lngas bla na
486b1(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
486b2(khri brgyad): chen po'i mthar gyis bgyi ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis bsgrub pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar
486b3(khri brgyad): gyis bgyi ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis bsgrub pa ji ltar mchis par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
486b4(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen
486b5(khri brgyad): bkur byed byed pa rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dngos
486b6(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
486b7(khri brgyad): nyid dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /'phags pa thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
487a1(khri brgyad): dang /tha na 'du byed thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid skra'i rtse mo'i cha'i gnas tsam yang med do zhes thos par gyur la/thos nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du gal te
487a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin la/gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
487a3(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang rung /gal te mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur yang rung ste/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o//bdag bla na med pa yang dag
487a4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyan ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la
487a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa/thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan
487a6(khri brgyad): las bzla ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par 'jug go/de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas bla
487a7(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mthar gyis bya ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis sgrub pa rtsom par byed do//de thog ma nyid
487b1(khri brgyad): du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pa/
487b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na/bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la 'god cing sbyin pa'i bsngags
487b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang brjod la/gzhan gang dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag go bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar byed de/de sbyin pa la goms pa des longs spyod kyi phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
487b4(khri brgyad): de ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/zas 'dod pa la ni zas/skom 'dod pa la ni skom/bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/gos 'dod pa la ni gos/spos 'dod pa la ni spos//
487b5(khri brgyad): me tog phreng 'dod pa la ni me tog phreng /byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/mal 'dod pa la ni mal/rgyab rten 'dod pa la ni rgyab rten/gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me 'am/
487b6(khri brgyad): mi'i yo byad ci'ang rung ba dag sbyin par byed de/de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po srung bar byed cing /sbyin pa de nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol
487b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas kyang /byang chub
488a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas kyang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /sems can rnams
488a2(khri brgyad): kyang yongs su smin par byed do//de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems
488a3(khri brgyad): can rnams theg pa gsum la 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs so grol bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pas mthar gyis bya
488a4(khri brgyad): ba yod de/bya ba de dag thams cad kyang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
488a5(khri brgyad): chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du
488a6(khri brgyad): 'jug go//de bzhin du rjes su dga' bar byed ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro//de tshul khrims des lho'i che ba nyid dang mi'i che ba nyid kyang thob par 'gyur te/de sems can dbul
488a7(khri brgyad): po rnams la nor sbyin par byed do//byin nas kyang tshul khrims la 'god par byed/ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye
488b1(khri brgyad): shes mthong ba la 'god par byed do//de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
488b2(khri brgyad): mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//'das nas kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i bar de
488b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ste/de bzhin du sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'i bar du sbyar ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
488b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis bya ba yod de/bya ba de dag kyang thams cad kyang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
488b5(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bdag nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la smod cing /gzhon
488b6(khri brgyad): dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/de bzhin du rjes su dga' bar byed pa'i bar du sbyar ro//de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sems
488b7(khri brgyad): can rnams sbyin pas tshim par byed/tshul khrims la 'god par byed/ting nge 'dzin la 'god par byed pa nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar la 'god por byed do//de tshul
489a1(khri brgyad): khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i/
489a2(khri brgyad): phung po des nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub thob par 'gyur pa'i bar du de bzhin
489a3(khri brgyad): du sbyar ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson par byed la gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus yang
489a4(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/de bzhin du rjes su dga' bar byed pa'i bar du sbyar ro//de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
489a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni bdag nyid kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/
489a6(khri brgyad): gzhan dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag la 'god par byed cing /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
489a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi bsngags pa'ang brjod par byed do//gzhan gang dag bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms
489b1(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod par byed pa nas rjes su dga' bar byed pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//de bsam gtan de dag dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs
489b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gnas nas/sems can rnams sbyin pas tshim par byed/tshul khrims la 'god par byed/bzod pa la 'god par byed/brtson
489b3(khri brgyad): 'grus la 'god par byed/ting nge 'dzin la 'god par byed/shes rab la 'god par byed/rnam par grol ba la 'god par byed/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
489b4(khri brgyad): ba la 'god par byed do//de rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan pa des nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//'das nas kyang rnam par
489b5(khri brgyad): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba des byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa nas/de'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar du de bzhin
489b6(khri brgyad): du sbyar ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed po nas bzung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
489b7(khri brgyad): sems can rnams sbyin pas tshim par byed/tshul khrims la 'god par byed/bzod pa la 'god par byed/brtson 'grus la 'god par byed/ting nge 'dzin
490a1(khri brgyad): la 'god par byed/shes rab la 'god par byed/rnam par grol ba la 'god par byed/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'god par byed do//de
490a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed/tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgrub par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom par
490a3(khri brgyad): byed/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/shes rab sgom par byed/gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la 'god par byed/tshul khrims la 'god par byed/
490a4(khri brgyad): bzod pa la 'god par byed/brtson 'grus la 'god par byed/ting nge 'dzin la 'god par byed/shes rab la 'god par byed pa nas rjes su dga' bar byed pa'i
490a5(khri brgyad): bar du sbyar ro//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
490a6(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/
490a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba nas/de'i ngo bo nyid med
490b1(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du sbyar ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis bya ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis sgrub pa'ang yod do//
490b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mthar gyis bya ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis sgrub pa la slob ste/sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas
490b3(khri brgyad): bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mos te/sangs rgyas rjes su dran po dang /chos
490b4(khri brgyad): rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo//rab 'byor byang
490b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa
490b6(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs su yid la mi byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes par yid la mi byed
490b7(khri brgyad): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
491a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de bas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid
491a2(khri brgyad): la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su yid/
491a3(khri brgyad): la mi bya'o//sku gser gyi kha dog can du yid la mi bya'o//'od 'dom gang bar yid la mi bya'o//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i tshul gyis yid la mi bya'o//de ci'i
491a4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/'di ltar sku de la ngo bo nyid med de/grang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de bas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid
491a5(khri brgyad): la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi bya'o//
491a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por yid la mi bya'o//shes rab kyi phung por yid la mi bya'o//rnam par grol ba'i phung por yid la mi bya'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
491a7(khri brgyad): mthong ba'i phung por yid la mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de bas na sangs rgyas
491b1(khri brgyad): rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de bzhin
491b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcur yid la mi bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /
491b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du yid la mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//
491b4(khri brgyad): de bas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
491b5(khri brgyad): rgyas ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de
491b6(khri brgyad): bas na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
491b7(khri brgyad): spyod pas de ltar sangs rgyas yid la bya'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis bya ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis 'jug
492a1(khri brgyad): pa'ang yod de/mthar gyis bslab pa 'di la slob cing /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob pa na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
492a2(khri brgyad): kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga
492a3(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon
492a4(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do//des chos thams cad dngos
492a5(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de la ngo bo nyid kyi 'du shes sam/dngos po med pa'i 'du shes med do//rab 'byor byang chub sems
492a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
492a7(khri brgyad): spyod pas/dge ba'i chos rnams yid la mi bya'o//mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la mi bya'o//lung bstan du yod pa dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /'jig rten pa rnams dang /
492b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /'phags pa rnams dang /'phags pa ma yin pa rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /zag pa med pa rnams dang /'dod pa'i khams
492b2(khri brgyad): su gtogs pa rnams dang /gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa rnams dang /ma gtogs pa rnams dang /'dus byas kyi chos rnams
492b3(khri brgyad): dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yid la mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de bas
492b4(khri brgyad): na chos rjes su dran pa ni dran par bya ba ma yin zhing yid la bya ba ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings 'di la bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
492b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro//des chos rnams dngos po med pa kho nar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de la dngos po'i 'du shes sam/dngos po
492b6(khri brgyad): med pa'i 'du shes med do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rjes su dran pa de ltar bsgom par bya ste/de la ni dran pa'i chos phra rab tsam yang
492b7(khri brgyad): med na/dran pa dang bral ba lta ci smos/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang
493a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya ste/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun skyes
493a2(khri brgyad): bu zung bzhi dang /skyes bu gang zag brgyad gang yin bya de dag gi ngo bo nyid med de/skyes bu zung bzhi dang /skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag ni ngo bo nyid med cing
493a3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phye ba yin te/de ni dngos po med pa nyid du yid la byas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa nas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni dran
493a4(khri brgyad): par bya ba ma yin zhing /yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i bar du sbyar ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun rjes su dran pa de ltar bsgom
493a5(khri brgyad): par bya ste/de la ni dran pa'i chos phra rab tsam yang med do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/
493a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/skyon med pa dang ma nyams
493a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang nag nog med pa dang /dbang 'byor pa dang /mkhas pas bsngags po dang /shin tu rdzogs po dang /ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims la
493b1(khri brgyad): zhugs nas tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/de la dran pa'i las phra rab tsam yang med pa de lta bur yod la byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pang /
493b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i bar du sbyar te/de la dngos po'i 'du shes sam/dngos po med pa'i 'du shes med do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
493b3(khri brgyad): ba la spyod pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa ji ltar yid la bya zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dngos po med pa'i ngo
493b4(khri brgyad): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis zang zing gtong ba 'am/chos gtong ba rjes su dran par bya ste/gtong ba nges sbyin no snyam pa 'am/mi sbyin no snyam pa 'am/yongs su gtong ngo snyam pa 'am/yongs su
493b5(khri brgyad): mi gtang ngo snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o//yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su gtong por yang sems bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med
493b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/de ltar de gtong ba rjes su dran pa la spyod pa yin no//de ltar slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rim gyis thob par 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub
493b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/gtong ba rjes su dran pa de lta de ltar yid la bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
494a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lha rjes su dran pa ji ltar yid la bya zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
494a2(khri brgyad): pos rgyun du zhugs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i lha de dag dngos po med
494a3(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro//de bas na
494a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lha de dag de ltar yid la bya'o//de la dran pa'i las phra rab tsam yang med de/de ltar yid la byed cing rim gyis rnam pa thams
494a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs na spyod
494a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha phyir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag la ngo bo nyid med do//
494a7(khri brgyad): gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir te/de bas na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lha de dag rjes su dran par bya ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
494b1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su dran pa drug po dag de ltar yid la bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang
494b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran pa drug yid la byed pa mthar gyis bya ba'ang yod/mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis 'jug pa'ang yod do//rab 'byor
494b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis bya ba dang /mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas dngos po med
494b4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o//de
494b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/snying rje chen po'i bar la bslab par bya'o//de de ltar byang chub kyi lam la slob na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
494b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/de la ni dran pa'i las phra rab tsam yang med na gzugs lta ci smos/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar du lta ga la yod de/de ni gnas med do//rab
494b7(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mthar gyis bya ba'ang yod/mthar gyis bslab pa dang /mthar gyis
495a1(khri brgyad): bsgrub pa'ang yod la/de la ni sems kyi spyod pa'i bya ba dang /sems kyi spyod pa'i bslab pa dang /sems kyi spyod pa'i lam yang med do//de skad ces/
495a2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo
495a3(khri brgyad): nyid lags na/'o na ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang ma mchis/phung po rnams kyang ma mchis/khams rnams kyang ma mchis/skye mched
495a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang ma mchis/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar du'ang ma mchis/sangs rgyas kyang
495a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis/chos kyang ma mchis/dge 'dun yang ma mchis/lam yang ma mchis/'bras bu'ang ma mchis/kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma mchis/rnam
495a6(khri brgyad): par byung ba'ang ma mchis/thob pa'ang ma mchis/mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang
495a7(khri brgyad): ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor
495b1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad la yod pa 'am/med par dmigs su yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/dngos po ma mchis
495b2(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la ni mchis pa 'am/ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
495b3(khri brgyad): nyid yin na/de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs med pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar du med pa dang /thob pa med pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa myed pa'i bar du de bzhin du
495b4(khri brgyad): sbyar te/de lta bur ji ltar 'gyur/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
495b5(khri brgyad): 'odas bdag ni chos 'di dag la yid gnyis mi 'tshal/the tshom mi 'tshal lags mod kyi/'on kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can khyim pa rnams dang /rab tu byung ba rnams
495b6(khri brgyad): dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad dngos po
495b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la 'dir su zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi bar 'gyur te/de dag
496a1(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma 'tshal nas tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/lta ba nyams par 'gyur/spyod pa nyams par 'gyur te/tshul
496a2(khri brgyad): khrims nyams pa dang /lta ba nyams pa dang /spyod pa nyams pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dang /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba
496a3(khri brgyad): 'am/'gro ba gsum po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig tu mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi logs so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ma 'ongs pa'i dogs pa 'di mthong bas de
496a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di nyid zhus pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos de dag la yid gnyis mi 'tshal/
496a5(khri brgyad): the tshom mi 'tshal lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
496a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mthar gyis bya ba dang /bslab pa dang /bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu pa'o///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la tshe
496a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/bcom ldan 'das don
496b1(khri brgyad): ci zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs lags/bcom ldan 'das
496b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
496b3(khri brgyad): chub la 'jug go//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dmigs pa ni tha chad yin te/dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la ni thob pa'ang med/mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/bla
496b4(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci dmigs su ma mchis pa la 'thob pa 'am/mngon par rtogs pa 'am/bla na med pa
496b5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchis lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nyid thob pa yin/mi dmigs pa
496b6(khri brgyad): nyid mngon par rtogs pa yin/mi dmigs pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no//mi dmigs pa nyid 'thob pa'am/mngon par rtogs pa'am/bla na
496b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par 'dod du zad do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te dmigs su ma
497a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa la thob pa ma mchis/mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis shing /dmigs su ma mchis//
497a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob pa lags/dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa lags/dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags
497a3(khri brgyad): na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po ga la mchis/gnyis pa'ang ga la mchis/bcu pa'i bar du'adra ga la mchis/mi skye
497a4(khri brgyad): ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang ga la mchis/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i chos gang dag la gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang //sangs rgyas
497a5(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal zas dang /btung ba dang /na bza' dang /chibs pa dang /spos dang /me
497a6(khri brgyad): tog phreng ba dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /mar me dang /mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyid la de'i de dag kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/
497a7(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyi bar dang /nyan thos rnams la rnam par smin par bgyis kyang bas par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa las
497b1(khri brgyad): byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'ang ga la mchis/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'ang ga la mchis/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyang ga la mchis/rnam
497b2(khri brgyad): par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'ang ga la mchis/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyang ga la mchis/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang ga
497b3(khri brgyad): mchis/rnam par smin pa lngas byung ba'i shes rab kyi ga la mchis/de nyid ces gsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rib 'byor la 'di skad ces bka
497b4(khri brgyad): stsal to//rab 'byor gang gi phyir dmigs su med pa de nyid kyi phyir/sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar dag yod do//de nyid kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems
497b5(khri brgyad): tsacan rnams kyi don byed pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bor du'ang mchod pa 'byung ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga yod do//de nyid kyi phyir
497b6(khri brgyad): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab yod do//de nyid kyi phyir rnam par sbyin
497b7(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
498a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dmigs su ma mchis pa dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /
498a2(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa rnams la bye brag ni ci zhig mchis/tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci zhig mchis/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
498a3(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor dmigs su med pa'i sbyin pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bar la ni tha dad du bye ba ci'ang med do//rab 'byor gos pa
498a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /mngon par shes pa de dag ni tha dad du bya bar
498a5(khri brgyad): bstan to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gos pa ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa nas mngon par shes pa'i bar du ji ltar tha dad du bgyi bar bstan/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
498a6(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sbyin par bya ba'ang mi dmigs/len pa po'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa
498a7(khri brgyad): po'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//tshul khrims mi dmigs par tshul khrims srung bar byed do//bzod pa mi dmigs
498b1(khri brgyad): der bzod pa skyed par byed do//brtson 'grus mi dmigs par brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do//ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs par ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed do//
498b2(khri brgyad): shes rab mi dmigs por shes rab sgom par byed do//mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi
498b3(khri brgyad): dmigs par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom par byed do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du sgom par byed do//ting nge 'dzin gsum po stong pa nyid
498b4(khri brgyad): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du mi dmigs par sgom par byed do//sems can mi dmigs par
498b5(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs
498b6(khri brgyad): par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dmigs su med pa'i shes rab kyi pha
498b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
499a1(khri brgyad): kyis tshugs par dka'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
499a2(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ji ltar sems gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin par bgyi//
499a3(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang //
499a4(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar yongs su
499a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin par bgyid/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
499a6(khri brgyad): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu
499a7(khri brgyad): ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
499b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa na/sbyin pa gang sbyin yang rung ste/sbyin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/gzhan du ma yin no//tshul khrims gang bsrung ba dang /bzod pa/
499b2(khri brgyad): gong bsgom po dang /brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug kyang rung ste/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa
499b3(khri brgyad): ste/gzhan du ma yin no//bsam gtan gang dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/gzhan du ma yin no//tshad
499b4(khri brgyad): med pa gang dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/gzhan du ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag
499b5(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/gzhan du ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang dag sgom pa nas/de bzhin
499b6(khri brgyad): du sbyar te/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/gzhan du ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom
499b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
500a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug ji ltar yongs su 'dzin pa lags/de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar
500a2(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sbyin pa gang
500a3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de ni gnyis kyi 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims gang srung ba de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du mi
500a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//bzod pa gang sgom pa de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin
500a5(khri brgyad): gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du mngon par sgrub pa de la gnyis kyi 'du
500a6(khri brgyad): shes can du mi 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin+da/
500a7(khri brgyad): yang de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du'ang mi 'gyur ba legs/de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du'ang mngon par sgrub la/de la gnyis kyi 'du shes can du'ang mi
500b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
500b2(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i nang du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas nas/sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//de bzhin du
500b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing lam gyi bar gyi nang der/pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa thams cad 'dus pararo byas te lam sgom par byed do//rab
500b4(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/de gang gi tshe sbyin pa sbyin pa na zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin
500b5(khri brgyad): par byed do//de zag pa med pa'i sems de la gnas te/bdag gis su zhig la sbyin par bya/ci zhig sbyin por bya/su zhig sbyin par byed snyam pa'i mtshan ma'ang yong dag
500b6(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems dang /zag pa dang bral ba dang /sred pa dang bral ba dang /ma rig po dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par
500b7(khri brgyad): byed de/des sems de'ang mi mthong la/des sbyin pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rab 'byor
501a1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ste//
501a2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom
501a3(khri brgyad): ste/bzod pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang yang dag par rjes
501a4(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo //mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de/brtson 'grus de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos thams cad kyi
501a5(khri brgyad): bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste/ting nge 'dzin de'ang yang dag par rjes
501a6(khri brgyad): su mi mthong la/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/dri dag kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mtshan ma dang bral//
501a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar
501b1(khri brgyad): bzhag pa bzhi sgom par byed pa nas/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du mngon par sgrub ste/de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis shing
501b2(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
501b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par
501b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi
501b5(khri brgyad): yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i
501b6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
501b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
502a1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/mtshan ma dang bral
502a2(khri brgyad): ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas nas mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed do//nang gi yan lag dang nying lag
502a3(khri brgyad): rnams sam/phyi rol gyi chung ma dang /bu dang bu mo dang /rgyal srid rnams brgyan cing spong ba rnams la sbyin par byed do//lo la zhig der 'ongs nas de la 'di skad du khyod kyi sbyin
502a4(khri brgyad): pa 'di lta bu byin pa/'di ltar phan pa med pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes zer na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de 'dri
502a5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems te/sems can 'di dag 'di skad du khyod kyi sbyin pa mi brten pa byin pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes gshe mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gis ni sbyin pa sbyin par bya'i
502a6(khri brgyad): bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o snyam mo//des sbyin pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
502a7(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo bar byed do/des yongs su bsngo ba ni ci nas mtshan ma'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar byed de/bdag gis
502b1(khri brgyad): ci zhig sbyin par bya/gang la sbyin par bya/su zhig sbyin par byed/gang du yongs su bsngo bar bya/ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar bya/gang gis yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /gang du byin
502b2(khri brgyad): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de'ang ngos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/nang stong pa nyid kyis
502b3(khri brgyad): stong pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong
502b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//des gang du yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur zhes de ltar mthong ste/
502b5(khri brgyad): de ltar yongs su bsngos no/legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin te/de ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
502b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
