502b7(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
503a1(khri brgyad): bar dag dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su
503a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par byed de/rnam par smin pa'ang 'dzin par mi byed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ni yo byad phun sum tshogs pa
503a3(khri brgyad): thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad thams cad kyang bsams pa
503a4(khri brgyad): tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//des yo byad phun sum tshogs pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed pa la lha dang /
503a5(khri brgyad): mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do//des sems can de dag sbyin pas bsdus nas thabs la mkhas pas theg pa gsum la 'god par
503a6(khri brgyad): byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
503a7(khri brgyad): por byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la
503b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/des 'phags pa zag pa
503b2(khri brgyad): momed pa lam du gtogs pa chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro//de'i tshul khrims de'ang ma nyams shing skyon med la ma 'dres pa dang /ma 'chol ba dang /
503b3(khri brgyad): dbang 'byor pa dang /nag nog med pa dang /shin tu rdzogs pa dang /mkhas pas bsngags pa yin no//de tshul khrims des chos gang dag la'ang mchog tu 'dzin
503b4(khri brgyad): par mi byed de/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa 'am/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sngam//
503b5(khri brgyad): rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i
503b6(khri brgyad): ris kyi lha 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'am/'thab bral ba 'am/dga' ldan nam/'phrul dga' 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/tshangs ris sam/
503b7(khri brgyad): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'am/tshangs 'khor tam/'od chung ngam/chid med 'od dam/'od gsal lam/dge chung ngam/ched med dge 'am/dge rgyas
504a1(khri brgyad): sam/'bras bu che ba 'am/'du shes med pa'i sems can nam/mi che ba 'am/mi gdung ba 'am/gya nom snang ngam/shin tu mthong ngam/'og min
504a2(khri brgyad): nam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dam/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
504a3(khri brgyad): mched dam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang
504a4(khri brgyad): chub bam/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dam/rgyal srid la dbang byed pa la'ang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun
504a5(khri brgyad): ming du byas nas/mtshan ma med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /gnyis su med pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo/
504a6(khri brgyad): bar byed kyis don dam par ni ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang /thabs la mkhas pa des bsam gtan bzhi ro myang ba med
504a7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis bskyed par byed do//lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba gang gis/shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho
504b1(khri brgyad): zhing gzhes pa de dag mthong la/de'i mthong ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lho dang /
504b2(khri brgyad): nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang mthong la/nam bla na med
504b3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du de'i mthong ba de chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i mig mngon par sgrub par byed do//lha'i rna ba rnam
504b4(khri brgyad): par dag pa mi las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsung ba'i sgra'ang thos te/thos pa des nam bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma byas kyi bar du thos pa de chung
504b5(khri brgyad): za bar mi 'gyur ro//sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dgongs pa sems kyis shes te/sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des
504b6(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi don byed do//sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas ni las gang byas pas las de chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi las de ston par byed do//zag
504b7(khri brgyad): pa zad pa shes pas ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa byed pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 'god par byed/rang byang chub la 'god par byed//
505a1(khri brgyad): bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed do/sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la 'jug nus pa de dang de la 'god par byed do//rab 'byor de
505a2(khri brgyad): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do///
505a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa dang
505a4(khri brgyad): rtsol ba med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/
505a5(khri brgyad): de sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can thams cad lhags te/bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon chas bsnun
505a6(khri brgyad): kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam 'byung ba'i skabs kyang dbye bar mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
505a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos bzod pa gnyis bsgom par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na sems can thams cad kyis gshe ba dang /spyo ba dang /bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /
505b1(khri brgyad): mtshon chas bsnun pa gang yin pa bzod par bya ba dang /mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa bskyed pa gang yin pa'o//de la spyos shing brgyad dam/bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon
505b2(khri brgyad): chas bsnun na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/bdag la su zhig gshe zhing rgyal/bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon chas
505b3(khri brgyad): bsnun par byed ces des chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na chos rnams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid lta ga la yod/de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog
505b4(khri brgyad): pa na 'di snyam du sems te/nga la gcod pa 'am/'bigs pa su yod snyam mo//de de ltar chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog pa na/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur
505b5(khri brgyad): ro//de la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang zhe na/nyon mongs pa mi skye ba nyid dang /shes pa bcad du med pa nyid do//bzod pa 'di gnyis la gnas nas bsam gtan/
505b6(khri brgyad): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /'phags pa'i
505b7(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
506a1(khri brgyad): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos 'jig rten las
506a2(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i chos nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas nas 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par
506a3(khri brgyad): byed do//mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas te/lha'i mig rnam par dag pas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
506a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
506a5(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rgyun mi chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyogs mtshams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no//lha'i rna ba'i khams
506a6(khri brgyad): kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang gsungs pa de dag thams cad 'dzin par byed do//bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed de/sems can
506a7(khri brgyad): rnams la'ang de bzhin nyid du chos ston par byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs kyang sems kyis shes so//des sems kyi rnam grangs
506b1(khri brgyad): shes pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis shes te/sems can thams cad kyi sems shes nas kyang de bzhin nyid du chos ston to//sngon gyi gnas rjes su
506b2(khri brgyad): dran pa shes pas ni sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba shes te/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des dga' bar byed cing yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/zag pa zad pa shes
506b3(khri brgyad): pas ni sems can de dag theg pa gsum po dag la 'dzud par byed 'god par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
506b4(khri brgyad): byin pa la spyod pa de thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
506b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
506b6(khri brgyad): nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i
506b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med pa dang /rtsol ba med pa dang /dmigs
507a1(khri brgyad): su med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la
507a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/lus kyi brtson 'grus dang yang ldan la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang yang
507a3(khri brgyad): te/de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas so//bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par zhugs te gnas so//de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms
507a4(khri brgyad): par zhugs nas rdzu 'phral bya ba du ma dag nyams su myong ste/nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la'ang lag pas nyug go/de lus kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi
507a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag du ma dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
507a6(khri brgyad): de dag la na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do//de'i gos dang zhal
507a7(khri brgyad): zas de dag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du zad par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par rdzogs par sangs
507b1(khri brgyad): rgyas nas kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gos dang /zlas kyi bde ba dang ldan par byed do//des na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag
507b2(khri brgyad): la'ang mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de nyid kyis song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos par 'gyur ro//
507b3(khri brgyad): ci thos pa rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad
507b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
507b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
507b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa lam dang lam gyi yan lag tu gtogs pa dang ldan paso rje
507b7(khri brgyad): ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
508a1(khri brgyad): spyod pa/lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do//ngag gi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do//rtag ces
508a2(khri brgyad): bya ba 'am/mi rtog ces bya ba 'am/bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/bdog yod ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba'om/'dus byas
508a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas zhes bya ba 'am/'dod pa'i khrims zhes bya ba 'am/gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba 'am/gzugs med pa'i khams zhes bya
508a4(khri brgyad): bu 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'am/zag pa med pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'am/bsam gtan dang po zhes bya ba 'am/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar
508a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'am/byams pa zhes bya ba 'am/snying rje zhes bya ba 'am/dga' ba zhes bya ba 'am/btang snyoms zhes bya ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
508a6(khri brgyad): mchod ces bya ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar zhes bya ba 'am/dran pa nye bar bzhag po rnams zhes bya ba 'am/yang dag par spong
508a7(khri brgyad): ba rnams zhes bya ba 'am/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba 'am/dbang po rnams zhes bya ba 'am/stobs rnams zhes bya ba 'am/byang chub kyi yan//
508b1(khri brgyad): lag rnams zhes bya ba 'am/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'am/stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'am/smon pa med pa
508b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal
508b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'am/bdag yod pa zhes bya ba 'am/bdag med pa zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ldan
508b4(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/de bzhin
508b5(khri brgyad): du sbyar te/rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba nas/rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar dang /byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya bar mchog tu 'dzin por mi byed do//sems
508b6(khri brgyad): can 'di dag ni mthong bas rab tu phye ba'o//sems can 'di dag ni bsrabs pas rab tu phye ba'o//sems can 'di dag ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o//'di/
508b7(khri brgyad): dag ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pas rab tu phye ba'o//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o//'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o/
509a1(khri brgyad): zhes de ltar yang mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ngo bo nyid gang gis rab tu phye ba'i ngo bo nyid de dag la med pa'i phyir ro//de
509a2(khri brgyad): sems kyi brtson 'grus de dang ldan pas 'chi kar yang sems can rnams kyi don byed la sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
509a3(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed la/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/
509a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi dmigs so//de lus dang sems
509a5(khri brgyad): kyi brtson 'gras de dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin la de dag la'ang chags par mi byed de/de chags pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
509a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang
509a7(khri brgyad): dang gang rnam par sprul par 'dod pas/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dang de rnam par sprul par byed do//yang na ni me tog gi char 'bebs so//yang na ni spos
509b1(khri brgyad): byed par byed ngo //yang na ni 'brug sgra sgrog par byed do//yang na ni glung dngas sgrog par byed do//yang nA nis g.yo bar byed //yang na ni rin po che sna bdun gyis gan
509b2(khri brgyad): ston par byed do//yang nA ni mun nag gi sems can rnams kyi ched du bdag nyid les 'od 'byin par byed do//yang na ni spos gtong bar byed do//yang na ni srog gcod pa
509b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i mchod sbyin byed do//yang na ni sems can mtha' yas pa lam la 'dzud por byed do//srog gcod pa las zlog par byed pa nas/log par lta ba'i
509b4(khri brgyad): bar dag las zlog par byed do//kha cig la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed do//kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs par byed do//khwa cig gi don du
509b5(khri brgyad): ni yan lag dang /nying lag yongs su gtong bar byed do//kha cig la ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong bar byed do//kha cig la ni rgyal srid/kha cig gi don du
509b6(khri brgyad): ni bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar byed de/thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don byar rung ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do//rab
509b7(khri brgyad): 'byor dede ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas ming med pa
510a1(khri brgyad): dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
510a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ming med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la gnas nas ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
510a3(khri brgyad): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
510a4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa//
510a5(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so//bsam gtan bzhi
510a6(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems kyis/'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du khyab
510a7(khri brgyad): par bsgrubs te gnas so//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de las rnam par thar
510b1(khri brgyad): pa brgyad la lugs dang lugs ma yin par snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
510b2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas so//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so//bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so///
510b3(khri brgyad): mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs te gnas so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
510b4(khri brgyad): gnas nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrubs te gnas so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye
510b5(khri brgyad): shes kyis lom gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams 'dus par byas nas/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong
510b6(khri brgyad): ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems
510b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ste/sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de de dag la spyod kyang bar ma dor 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro//de ting nge 'dzin
511a1(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
511a2(khri brgyad): byed do//de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag lus dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing
511a3(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par byed do//'jig rten gyi khams nus 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/sems can rnams kyi don byed do//der soms can kha cig la ni sbyin
511a4(khri brgyad): pas phan 'dogs so//kha cig la ni tshul khrims kyis/kha cig la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis/kha cig la ni shes rab kyis/kha cig la ni rnam par grol bas/
511a5(khri brgyad): kha cig la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so//kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do//de bzhin du sbyar te/kha cig ni
511a6(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la 'god do//kha cig ni rang byang chub la 'god do//dge ba'i chos gang dang gang dag gis sems can rnams 'bogs par 'gyur ba de dang/
511a7(khri brgyad): de la sbyor bar byed do//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgrub par byed do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob
511b1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro//de nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/nam yang 'dod pa la bsten
511b2(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur/de skye ba gang yang yongs su mi 'dzin pa med la/skye ba'i skyon gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta
511b3(khri brgyad): bur legs par mthong ba'i phyir ro//des 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas sems can thams cad kyi don byed kyang de la sems can dang /sems can du gdags
511b4(khri brgyad): pa'ang mi dmigs so//des chos thams cad mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis mi dmigs pa nyid la 'god par byed de/don dam
511b5(khri brgyad): par ni ma yin no//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de/
511b6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de tong nge
511b7(khri brgyad): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnos nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed de/de la gnas nas bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad
512a1(khri brgyad): spong bar byed do//bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do//bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas pas/lha dang
512a2(khri brgyad): mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
512a3(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma med/
512a4(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
512a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos gang yang yod pa nyid dam/yongs su grub pa nyid du yang dag pa ro rjes su ma mthong ste/des gzugs la yod pa nyid dam/yongs su
512a6(khri brgyad): grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i bar la yod pa nyid dang /yongs su grub pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs
512a7(khri brgyad): kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma
512b1(khri brgyad): mthong la/rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba'i/
512b2(khri brgyad): sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i blar gyi bsags pa yang dag par rjes su mi
512b3(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa thams cad kyi bar gyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog nyid
512b4(khri brgyad): dang /snying po med pa nyid du mthong ngo //de de ltar rtog pa na gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i
512b5(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs te/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/chos thams cad la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mos so//de de ltar mos
512b6(khri brgyad): la nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chos gang la'ang zhen par mi 'gyur te/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam//
512b7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa 'am/de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub kyi bar gyi chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro//de dngos po med pa'i ngo
513a1(khri brgyad): bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /byang chub kyi phyogs/
513a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
513a3(khri brgyad): bco brgyad dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de rnam par smin pa'i chos byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
513a4(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur na/sems can
513a5(khri brgyad): gang dag sbyin pos bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni sbyin pas sdud par byed do//gang dag tshul khrims kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag
513a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /dang dag rnam par grol bas bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas bsdu bar bya ba de dge ni rnam par grol ba'i ye
513a7(khri brgyad): shes mthong bas sdud par byed do//gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do//gang dag lan cig
513b1(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba dang /gang dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba dang /gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba dang /gang dag rang
513b2(khri brgyad): byang chub la dgod par bya ba dang /gang dag byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni byang chub la 'god par byed de/thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//de rdzu 'phrul
513b3(khri brgyad): bya ba rnam pa du ma dag byed cing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro ste/'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rin po che ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i ro ni
513b4(khri brgyad): po che dgra mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams
513b5(khri brgyad): nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro'o//des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed de/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi/
513b6(khri brgyad): longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra ba dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na yongs su 'tshol ba med pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i longs spyod dang /yongs su spyad pa dag
513b7(khri brgyad): kyang der 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
514a1(khri brgyad): pa'i bar drag dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin pa des
514a2(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa na/thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gal te ji tsam du gzugs
514a3(khri brgyad): yongs su mi 'dzin cing /rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /chos thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin te/dge ba 'am/mi dge ba 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig
514a4(khri brgyad): rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par
514a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na'ang de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nu longs spyod dang /yongs su spyad pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro//
514a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i tshul yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
514a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
514b1(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma med pa dang /dmigs su med pa'i chos nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste/bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
514b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtsol ba ma mchis pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /
514b3(khri brgyad): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
514b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags//
514b5(khri brgyad): zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos 'di dag la ji ltar tha dad du bgyi ba gdags legs/'di dag la tha dad du dbye ba ji ltar mchis lags/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ji
514b6(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa lags/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar
514b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa legs/bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i
515a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams la ji ltar tha dad du bgyi ba gdags par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
515a2(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag la
515a3(khri brgyad): gnas te/sbyin pa sbyin par byed/tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgom par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par
515a4(khri brgyad): byed/shes rab sgom par byed do//brag ca lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas te/sbyin pa sbyin par byeng /tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa bsgom
515a5(khri brgyad): par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/shes rabo sgom par byed do//mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma
515a6(khri brgyad): lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la gnas te/sbyin pa sbyin par byed/tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgom par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom
515a7(khri brgyad): par byed/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/shes rab sbom por byed do//phung po lnga po dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//phung po lnga po dag
515b1(khri brgyad): ni brag ca lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rmi lam lnga ni ngo bo nyid ci'ang mod
515b2(khri brgyad): la/brag ca dang /mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang /sgyu ma dang /sprul pa la ni ngo bo nyid ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro//gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de la ni mtshan nyid med do//gang la
515b3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa de la ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gi cig go/rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid med pa dang /sbyin pa po'i
515b4(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa dang /len pa po'i mtshan nyid med par de ltar rig par bya'o//gang gis de ltar shes nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
515b5(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par bya'o//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lngas ldog par mi 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol
515b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ldog par mi 'gyur ro//de pha rol
515b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
516a1(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs
516a2(khri brgyad): par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
516a3(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med
516a4(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rnam par thar po brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
516a5(khri brgyad): pa dgu dang /mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
516a6(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de
516a7(khri brgyad): rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos 'di dag la gnas te/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song nas
516b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gro'ang byed do//der longs spyod dag gis sems can rnams kyi
516b2(khri brgyad): don yang byed do//der sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni sbyin pas sdud par byed do//gang dag tshul khrims kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni tshul khrims kyis
516b3(khri brgyad): sdud par byed do//gang dag bzod pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni bzod pas sdud par byed do//gong dge brtson 'grus kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyis sdud par
516b4(khri brgyad): byed do//gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyis sdud par byed do//gang dag shes rab kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni shes rab kyis sdud par byed
516b5(khri brgyad): do//dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis bsdu bar bya ba'i bar gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis sdud par byed do//dge ba'i chos de dag dang ldan pas 'khor
516b6(khri brgyad): ba'ang len par byed la/'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro//sems can rnams kyi ched du lta dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang
516b7(khri brgyad): 'dzin par byed do/phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can de dag la phan 'dogs par byed do//des mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas rgyun du zhugs
517a1(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la/de la gnas par yang mi byed do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shes la de la gnas par yang mi byed do//phyir mi 'ong
517a2(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu'ang shes la de la gnas par yang mi byed do//dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shes la de la gnas par yang mi byed do//rang byang chub kyang shes la de la gnas
517a3(khri brgyad): par yang mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des thams cad rtogs nas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/rnam pa thams cad
517a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs nas pha
517a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug po dag mtshan nyid med par shes la/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mtshan nyid med par shes so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
517a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa ni rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol
517a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//brag ca lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po
517b1(khri brgyad): lnga po dag la gnas te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//des rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar lon pa'i phung po lnga po dag rtogs la/brag ci lta bu dang //
517b2(khri brgyad): mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag kyang rtogs nas mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
517b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa ma nyams pa dang /skyon med pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /ma 'chol ba dang /nag nog med pa dang /dbang 'byor pa dang /mkhas pas bsngags pa dang /shin
517b4(khri brgyad): tu rdzogs pa dang /'phags pa zag pa med pa'i lam du gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de la gnas nas yang dag par blang ba/brda can gyi tshul khrims
517b5(khri brgyad): dang /chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /rnam par rig byed kyi tshul khrims dang /yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo //de
517b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims de lta bu dag dang ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce 'am/bram ze'i rigs shing swa
517b7(khri brgyad): la chen po lta bu dag dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce 'am/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/
518a1(khri brgyad): khams kyi rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
518a2(khri brgyad): rnams sam/'thab bral ba rnams sam/dga' ldan pa rnams sam/'phrul dga' ba rnams sam/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye
518a3(khri brgyad): bar gyur cig ce'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur cig ce'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom
518a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dam/rang byang chub thob par gyur cig ces mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad 'di lta ste/dngos po
518a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid pas mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro//mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob
518a6(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro//mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob parwa mi 'gyur ro//mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/mtshan nyid med pa'i
518a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
518b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims
518b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
518b3(khri brgyad): pa thob nas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob la/gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas nas so so /
518b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la'ang bsnyen bkur byed/sems can rnams kyang
518b5(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do//de 'khor ba'i 'gro ba lngar yang 'khor la 'khor ba na spyod pa'i las rnams kyi rnam
518b6(khri brgyad): par smin pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro//'di lta ste dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal bar yang byed la de la 'gro ba dang /'ong
518b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /gnas pa dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba'ang med de/de ni sems can gyi don yang byed la/sems can dang sems can du gdogs pa'ang mi dmigs so///
519a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
519a2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can tshad med pa dag btul nas theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang byang chub
519a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'ga' yang ma mthong nas/des tshe'i 'du byed bor te/sprul pa sprul nas phung po'i
519a4(khri brgyad): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//rab 'byor sprul pa des kyang bskal pa 'das kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' bla na
519a5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/sprul pa de la'ang gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du
519a6(khri brgyad): byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa'i dngos po ci'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can dang /
519a7(khri brgyad): sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs la/sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
519b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yongs su rdzogs na chos thams cad nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor
519b2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag dang /brag ca lta bu
519b3(khri brgyad): dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha
519b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid med pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la
519b5(khri brgyad): gnas nas/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i rnam pa
519b6(khri brgyad): gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas
519b7(khri brgyad): bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar skabs dor sems can thams cad lhags nas/spyos sam/brgyad dam/tshogs par mi dbyung ba 'am/tshig
520a1(khri brgyad): rtsub po brjod kyang rung /bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon gyis bsnun kyang rung ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
520a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pas su zhig bdag la spyo bar byed ce'am/rgya bar byed ce'am/tshogs par mi dbyung ba 'am/tshig rtsub po brjod
520a3(khri brgyad): par byed ce'am/bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon chas bsnun par byed ces 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir
520a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par bzod na/de la su zhig bdag la spyo bar byed ce 'am/rgya bar byed ce'am/tshogs par mi dbyung ba 'am/tshig
520a5(khri brgyad): rtsub po brjod par byed ce'am/bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon chas bsnun par byed ces bya bar 'byung bar ga la 'gyur te/de de ltar rtog na bzod pa'i pha rol
520a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no//de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa des na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
520a7(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni ci
520b1(khri brgyad): shig lags/'di'i tshad ni ji tsam lags/shes pa ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal
520b2(khri brgyad): to//rab 'byor chos phra rab tsam yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos can zhes bya'o//de la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni shes pa zhes bya ste/shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos
520b3(khri brgyad): la bzod pa thob bo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nyon thos
520b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa
520b5(khri brgyad): 'di gnyis la tha dad du bgyid ci zhig mchis lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
520b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes
520b7(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang /
521a1(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
521a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
521a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i bzod pa ste/rab 'byor nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa tha dad du bya ba ni de yin no//rab 'byor byang
521a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to//de rnam par smin pa
521a5(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i mi skye ba'i bzod pa la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de yongs su rdzogis
521a6(khri brgyad): na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de
521a7(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa lnga dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag dang ma bral bas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par
521b1(khri brgyad): byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do//des sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byas nas//
521b2(khri brgyad): skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
521b3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
521b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spod pa ni/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas shing sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/
521b5(khri brgyad): mtshon nyid med pa'i lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom par byed de/de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
521b6(khri brgyad): gyi khams dag tu srong nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lo bsnyen bkur byed cing sems can rnams kyi don byed do//de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can
521b7(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/theg pa gsum po dag la 'god par byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
522a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de sems kyi brtson 'grus
522a2(khri brgyad): zag pa med pa'i lam dang /lom du rtogs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/der ni 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
522a3(khri brgyad): dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i
522a4(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par bar pa brgyad
522a5(khri brgyad): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
522a6(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la spyod pas rnam pa
522a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen po nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de yongs su rdzogs na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//des spongs shing
522b1(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa yongs su grub pa/yongs su rdzogs la snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu bsgrubs nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis su skur
522b2(khri brgyad): ba bskor bar 'gyur te/de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur/rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/kun tu ra
522b3(khri brgyad): g.yo bar 'gyur/'bul bar 'gyur/rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/kun tu rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/lhag par 'gyur/rab tu ldag par 'gyur/kun tu rab
522b4(khri brgyad): ldog par 'gyur zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
522b5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasaM de las sgra skad 'byung bar 'gyur te/des sgra thos par byed de//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang dag
522b6(khri brgyad): 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos par 'gyur te/de dag thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
522b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar gces smras byed pa yin te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnos nas byang chub
523a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo////shes rab
523a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po lnga bcu pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
523a3(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sprul po lta bu'i
523a4(khri brgyad): bor gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
523a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar rmi lam lta bu nas/sprul pa lta bu'i bar gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la gnas nas/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
523a6(khri brgyad): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/bsam gtan
523a7(khri brgyad): dang po bsgrubs te gnas nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas so//byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam mkha'
523b1(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched nus/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du bsgrubs te gnas so//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting
523b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin sgom par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs
523b3(khri brgyad): par ting nge 'dzin gang yang rung ba nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ta ma/ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs gzhan gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad
523b4(khri brgyad): lus kyis khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu'ang myong bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang
523b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'du shes pa'i phyir to/ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis
523b6(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed cing dngos po med pas dngos po med pa'i ro myong bar byed de/de ro myang bar mi byed pas na/ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang
523b7(khri brgyad): gis kyang 'dod pa'i khams samo/gzugs kyi khams sam/gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des khams de dag
524a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs la gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cis snyoms par 'jug pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//des mi dmigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/
524a2(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'du' bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan
524a3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i
524a4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di
524a5(khri brgyad): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nang stong pa nyid la legs par bsgrubs shing /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la legs par bslabs pas
524a6(khri brgyad): na/stong pa nyid 'di la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byung
524a7(khri brgyad): chub bam/rnam pa thams cid mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid de'ang stong ste/de stong pa nyid de dag gis
524b1(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags
524b2(khri brgyad): skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon yin no//dmigs pa med pa
524b3(khri brgyad): thams cad ni skyon med pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang logs/dmigs pa ma mchis pa ni gang logs/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
524b4(khri brgyad): gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems
524b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa yin no//ming dang /gzugs dang /rna ba dang /sgra dang /sna dang /dri dang /lho dang /ro dang /lus dang reg bya dang /yid dang chos
524b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ni skyon yin no//
524b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor skyon med pa ni gang la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag gi brjod pa'ang mi dmigs pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
525a1(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med do//gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med cing brjod du med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
525a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med do//brjod du med do//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa yin te/byang chub
525a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni skyon med pa la zhugs nas/ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang byed la/snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang skye
525a4(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis mi skye ba lta ci smos te/de la gnas nas las gang mngon par 'dus byas pas bsam gtan bzhi las
525a5(khri brgyad): gang yang rung bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gnas med do//gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi don
525a6(khri brgyad): kyang byed la/sems can yang mi dmigs/sgyu ma'ang mi dmigs so//des mi dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
525a7(khri brgyad): yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas
525b1(khri brgyad): nas/'di lta ste/dmigs su med pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du bskor bar byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
525b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su shes shing /chos thams cad brag ca lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /
525b3(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
525b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su 'tshal cing /chos thams
525b5(khri brgyad): cad sprul po lta bu'i bar du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
525b6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni/rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/rmi lam rmi ba po'ang ma yin no//brag ca thos pa ma yin/brag ca nyan pa po'ang ma yin no//mig yor mthong ba ma yin/mig yor
525b7(khri brgyad): mthong ba po'ang ma yin no//smig rgyu mthong ba ma yin/smig rgyu mthong ba po'ang ma yin no//sgyu ma mthong ba ma yin/sgyu ma mthong ba po'ang ma yin no//sprul pa
526a1(khri brgyad): mthong ba ma yin/sprul pa mthong ba po'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rmi lam dang brag ca dang /mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang /sgyu ma dang /
526a2(khri brgyad): sprul pa ni phyin ci log yin la/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phyin ci log yin te/dgra bcom pa ni rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/rmi lam rmi ba pa'ang ma yin zhing /sprul
526a3(khri brgyad): be'i bar du mthong ba ma yin zhing /sprul pa mthong ba po'ang ma yin la/de bzhin du sbyar te/rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs
526a4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang mdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang rmi lam rmi ba ma yin/rmi lom rmi ba po'ang ma yin zhing /sprul pa'i bar du mthong ba ma yin/sprul pa mthong
526a5(khri brgyad): ba po'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ma skyes pa dang /yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//dngos
526a6(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /yongs su ma grub pa gang yin pa de dag la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/dngos
526a7(khri brgyad): po'i 'du shes can nam/yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes can du ji ltar 'gyur te/de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te chos 'ga' zhig la dngos po 'am/
526b1(khri brgyad): yongs su grub pa 'am/yod pa zhig tu gyur na/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
526b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la chags pa med cing rnam par shes pa'i bar la chags pa med do//'dod pa'i khams la chags pa med do//gzugs
526b3(khri brgyad): kyi khams la chags pa med do//gzugs med pa'i khams la chags pa med do//bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med
526b4(khri brgyad): do/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la chags pa med pa nas/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la chags pa med do//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
526b5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la chags pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do//de bzhin du sbyar te tshul
526b6(khri brgyad): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa na//
526b7(khri brgyad): sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de la'ang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags mi bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des sa de ma dmigs na/'dun pa'i 'dod chags
527a1(khri brgyad): bskyed par ji ltar 'gyur/de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de la'ang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags mi bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe
527a2(khri brgyad): nA/'di ltar des so de ma dmigs na/de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bskyed par ji ltar 'gyur/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod bzhin du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
527a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa de mi dmigs so//de mi dmyigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i nang du 'dus par mthong la/
527a4(khri brgyad): chos de dag kyang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro//
527a5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag la tha dad pa ci'ang med de/chos kyi dbyings bstan pa dang /de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pa'i
527a6(khri brgyad): tshul gyis chos thams cad tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/dge ba dang /mi
527a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
527b1(khri brgyad): zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ji ltar bstan lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
527b2(khri brgyad): sems/ci chos rnams kyi chos nyid de la/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong
527b3(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi chos 'ga' tsam gyi brjod pa yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
527b4(khri brgyad): de ni ma mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis chos thams cad tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /chos thams cad mtshan nyid
527b5(khri brgyad): med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med par de ltar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/tshor ba zhes bya
527b6(khri brgyad): ba 'am/'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'am/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'i
527b7(khri brgyad): bar ram/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i bar ra mau/byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du chos 'ga' tsam gyi ngo bo nyid kyang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ltar na
528a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
528a2(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas par bya'o//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas
528a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
528a4(khri brgyad): yang yongs su 'dzin par byed do//de la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ci nas sems can rnams btul
528a5(khri brgyad): nas srid pa gsum du kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dul bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid med
528a6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan nyid med pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
528a7(khri brgyad): bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rma
528b1(khri brgyad): lam lta bu dang /dngos po ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la 'di dag ni dge ba'o//'di dag ni mi dge ba'o//'di dag
528b2(khri brgyad): ni 'jig rten pa'o//'dri dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o//'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa'o//'di dag ni 'dus byas so//'di dag
528b3(khri brgyad): ni 'dus ma byas so//'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o///
528b4(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni rang byang chub mngon
528b5(khri brgyad): sum du byed par 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'o zhes ji ltar bzhag par 'gyur lags/de bzhin du breg ca lta
528b6(khri brgyad): bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu dang /dngos po ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang
528b7(khri brgyad): go mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur bar ji ltar rnam par bzhag par 'gyur lags/de skad ces
529a1(khri brgyad): gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so'i skyo blo thos pa dang /
529a2(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa ni rmi lam yang dmigs so//rmi lem rmi ba po 'ang dmigs so//sprul pa'i bar du'ang dmigs so//sprul pa mthong ba po'ang dmigs so//nga rmi lam yang
529a3(khri brgyad): dmigs la rmi lam rmi ba po'ang dmigs pa nas/sprul pa'i bar du'ang dmigs la/sprul pa mthong ba po'ang dmigs pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba'i 'du
529a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do//lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do//lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsod nams dang //
529a5(khri brgyad): bsod nams ma yin pa dang /mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang mngon par 'du byed do//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
529a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/mthu' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid do/stong pa nyid 'di gnyis la gnas nas/sems can
529a7(khri brgyad): rnams lo khams gsum pa 'di ni stong ngo zhes chos ston par byed de/'di la gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par
529b1(khri brgyad): shes pa 'am/phung po rnams sam/khams rnams sam/skye mched rnams med do//'di dag ni rmi lam mo//'di dag ni brag ca'o//'di dag ni mig yor ro//'di dag ni smrig
529b2(khri brgyad): rgyu'o/'di dag ni sgyu ma'o//'di dag ni sprul pa'o//'di la phung po dang /khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams med do//'di la ni rmi lam dang rmi lam rmi ba po dang /brig
529b3(khri brgyad): tsa dang /brag ca thos pa po dang /mig yor dang /mig yor mthong ba po dang /smig rgyu dang /smig rgyu mthong ba po dang /sgyu ma dang /sgyu ma mthong ba po dang /sprul pa dang //
529b4(khri brgyad): sprul pa mthong ba po med de/chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na yin na khyed ni phung po rnams med pa la phung por 'du
529b5(khri brgyad): shes par gyur/khams rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes par gyur/skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par gyur la/chos 'di dag thams cad
529b6(khri brgyad): ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /phyin ci log las skyes pa dang /las kyi rnam pararo smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na/khyed ci'i phyir dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la
529b7(khri brgyad): dngos po'i 'du shes bskyed ces ston par byed de/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/thabs la
530a1(khri brgyad): mkhas pas sems can ser sna can gang yin pa de dag ni ser sna las bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do//de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su
530a2(khri brgyad): gtong ba de'ang longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro//des de dag de las bskyod nas tshul khrims la 'god par byed de/de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de'ang
530a3(khri brgyad): mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bskyod nas kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bar byed de/de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//de
530a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du bsom gtan dang po las bsam gtan gnyis pa/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa/bsam gtan gsum pa las/bsam gtan
530a5(khri brgyad): bzhi pa/bsam gtan bzhi pa las/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang //
530a6(khri brgyad): ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod par byed do//des sbyin pa dang /sbyin
530a7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu de las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul bar byed/'dzud par byed/'god par
530b1(khri brgyad): byed do//des tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul bar
530b2(khri brgyad): byed/'dzud par byed/'god par byed do//des snyoms par 'jug pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu de dag las kyang rnam grangs du mas bskyod nas phung po'i lhag ma
530b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dul bar byed/'dzud par byed/'god par byed do//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba
530b4(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam
530b5(khri brgyad): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
530b6(khri brgyad): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag la 'dul bar byed/'dzud par byed/'god par byed do//des zag pa med pa'i chos/bzugs
530b7(khri brgyad): med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa de dag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do//
531a1(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba
531a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag ni phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do//dgra bcom pa nyid don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do//rang byang chub don
531a3(khri brgyad): du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni rang byang chub la 'god do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag la ni byang chub kyi
531a4(khri brgyad): lam brjod par byed/ston par byed/yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed/'god par byed do//de skad ces bka' stsal
531a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
531a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa 'di ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
531a7(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so//'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so//'di dag ni zag
531b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i chos so//'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so//'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par 'jog par bgyid pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du
531b2(khri brgyad): byung ba'i chos lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin
531b3(khri brgyad): no/de de bzhin te/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa/chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
531b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shes na
531b5(khri brgyad): ni/de'i phyir nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lan du phan gdags par sla ba ma yin la/khyed thams
531b6(khri brgyad): cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chos dang ldan pas zil gyis mnan par mi nus so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
531b7(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang
532a1(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la ma mchis pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de'i phyir legs par nyon
532a2(khri brgyad): la rab tu yid la gzung zhig dang bshad par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam
532a3(khri brgyad): par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas shing mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /gzungs
532a4(khri brgyad): kyi sgo rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song ste/de dag tu sems can gang dag/sbyin pos
532a5(khri brgyad): phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so//gang dag tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag bzod pas phan gdogs par
532a6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /gang dag brtson 'grus kyis phran gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag shes rab kyis phan
532a7(khri brgyad): gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis pan 'dogs so//gang dag bsam gtan dang pos phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag bsam gtan gnyis
532b1(khri brgyad): pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag bsam gtan gsum pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag nam
532b2(khri brgyad): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar
532b3(khri brgyad): gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so//gang dag byams pas phan gdags par bya ba de
532b4(khri brgyad): dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so//gang dgra snying rjes phan gdogs par bya ba dang /gang dag dga' bas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag btang snyoms kyis/
532b5(khri brgyad): phan gdogs par bya ba dang /gang dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag yang dag par spong ba bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang //
532b6(khri brgyad): gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag dbang po lngas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag stobs lngas phan gdags par bya ba
532b7(khri brgyad): dang /gang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan gaudags par bya ba dang /gang dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang
533a1(khri brgyad): /dgra stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /glang dag mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba dang /gang dag smon
533a2(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la/smon po med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so//gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
533a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags/bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la
533a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams
533a5(khri brgyad): la ni skom/bzhon pa dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /spos dang /glos dang /malo ched /stan dang /mi'i yo byad ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed de/de bzhin
533a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar 'bul ba de bzhin du/rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir
533a7(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /yang dag par song ba rnams dang /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
533b1(khri brgyad): la'ang de bzhin no//mIr gyur pa rnams la'ang de bzhin no//dud 'gro'i skye gnus pa rnams la'ang de bzhin te/thams cad la'ang tha dad du dbye ba med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//
533b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs po'i phyir tha dad pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//tha dad pa med par sbyin pa byin pas tha dad pa
533b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen pos dud 'gro'i skye
533b4(khri brgyad): granas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/'dri snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni mo
533b5(khri brgyad): yin no snyam du sems na/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/
533b6(khri brgyad): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa la sems can 'di dag la ni bdag gis sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o//'di dag la
533b7(khri brgyad): ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro//sbyin pas phan btags pa de dag kyang /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bor 'gyur/bram
534a1(khri brgyad): ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu drug dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/sbyin pas phan btags pa de nyid kyis
534a2(khri brgyad): de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ro//gal te
534a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo mang pos bsad par gsol ba btab na/des 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye bo mang po de dag la nges par
534a4(khri brgyad): sbyin par bya'i sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ji ltar skye bo mang po de dag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
534a5(khri brgyad): po'i byang chu bo la yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro//gal te de ltar rtog par byed na ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems
534a6(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /slob pa rnams dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
534a7(khri brgyad): kyang khyod sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /gnas dang /mgon dang /dpung gnyen bya bar sus ma longs zhes smod par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan
534b1(khri brgyad): yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/mir gyur pa rnams sam/mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams kyis yan
