534b2(khri brgyad): lag dang nyi lag rnams bslangs na sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gcig shos bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
534b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa dus lus 'dis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o snyam ste/sems can rnams kyi don du bsams bzhin du lus yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te/des 'di
534b4(khri brgyad): ltar gang dag gi phyir bdag gis lus blangs pa de dag gis ma bslangs bzhin du khyer te/'gro 'dod cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems
534b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
534b6(khri brgyad): slong ba mthong na/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni mi dmigs na su zhig sbyin+de par byung /su la sbyin par byed/ci zhig sbyin par byed ces de ltar sems bskyed
534b7(khri brgyad): par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag ni shin tu stong ba'i phyir to/stong pa nyid ni su lo'ang sbyin par mi byed/len par yang mi byed do//rab
535a1(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /byi stong pa nyid dang
535a2(khri brgyad): byi nang stong pa nyid nas de bzhin du sbyar te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la de ltar bslab par bya'o//dri stong pa nyid de dag la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par
535a3(khri brgyad): byed pas de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas nang dang
535a4(khri brgyad): phyi'i chos rnamos bcad cing gtubs kyang /'di snyam du su zhig nga la gcod cing gtub par byed snyam du mi sems so//rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
535a5(khri brgyad): gyis rnam par bltas na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsamaso/
535a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du sems can dmyal bu chen por song ste/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas/cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum po rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe
535a7(khri brgyad): 'phrul dang /kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston te/de dag gis
535b1(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston par byed pa
535b2(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen pos kyang chos ston par byed pa dang /de nas sems
535b3(khri brgyad): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems dang bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba de dag nas thar par 'gyur ba dang /sems can dmyal
535b4(khri brgyad): ba de dag nas theg pa gsum po dag gi/rim gyis sdug bsngal mthar byed pa dag mthong ngo //lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /steng dang /'og dang /phyogs mtshams
535b5(khri brgyad): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su'ang de bzhin du sbyar to//rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten rnam par bltas na
535b6(khri brgyad): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bskyen
535b7(khri brgyad): bkur byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis dad pa drag pos yong du mi 'ong bas ma yin gyi yid du 'ong ba
536a1(khri brgyad): dang /mi dga' bas ma yin gyi dga' ba dang ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus pas bsnyen bkur byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang
536a2(khri brgyad): ngag bstan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dzin par byed do//bzung nas kyang 'chang bar byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par
536a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nAm yang chud gzon par mi byed pa dag mthong ngo //lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang //
536a4(khri brgyad): steng gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bor du'ang de bzhin no//rab 'byor 'di la ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na 'jig rten gyi
536a5(khri brgyad): khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gi don du bdag nyid
536a6(khri brgyad): kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do//doni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs nas/phyogs dang
536a7(khri brgyad): phyogs mtshams dag tu gtor bar byed/sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sha rnams zos nas
536b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byams pa 'thob par 'gyur te/de dag byams pa thob pa des dud 'gro'i skye gnas de nas thar bar 'gyur la/thar nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
536b2(khri brgyad): 'das rnams mnyes par byed de/de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan la/chos
536b3(khri brgyad): de dag mnyan nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed do//de dag theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rim gyis
536b4(khri brgyad): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur pa dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
536b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed cing /bskyed nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub la de bzhin du phung po'i lhag
536b6(khri brgyad): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gces spras byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan
536b7(khri brgyad): yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
537a1(khri brgyad): sems can yi dgas kyi yul na 'khor ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal rnams sol bar byed de/ser sna spyong ba'i phyir yang chos ston la/de nas
537a2(khri brgyad): de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed par byed de/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas thar bar
537a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing thar nas kyang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
537a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas po ni 'di lta ste/yongs
537a5(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don du nye bar gnas pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par
537a6(khri brgyad): bltas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rgyal tshan bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral
537a7(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang /dga' ldan pa rnams dang /'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston te/lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub
537b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las chos thos nas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
537b2(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur pa dang /rab 'byor de na lha'i bu gang dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rgyas pa de dag gis lhag par mos pa de dag gi gzhal med khang
537b3(khri brgyad): 'bar bar byas nas grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin na/su zhig 'du byed rnams la yid ston cing 'dug ces chos ston pa dag mthong ngo //rab
537b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
537b5(khri brgyad): stong dag na su dag bram ze'i lta ba la mngon paro zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ji ltar lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gso ba dang /
537b6(khri brgyad): gsog yin pa la ji ltar lta ba bskyed ces lta ba de dag las 'byed pa dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
537b7(khri brgyad): la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//rab
538a1(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par bltas na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa'
538a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po dag gis mi rnams bsdu ba'o dngos po bzhis sdud par byed de/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don spyod pa dang /don
538a3(khri brgyad): mthun pas sdud par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed ce na/rab 'byor 'di la
538a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin po dang /sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud par
538a5(khri brgyad): byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pas ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
538a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpo'i chen pos gser ram/dngul lam/nor bu 'am/mu tig gam/bai DUr+ya 'am/dung ngam/man shol lam/byu ru 'am/zas
538a7(khri brgyad): sam/skom mam/gos sam/bzhon pa 'am/mal cha'am/stan nam/spos sam/me tog phreng ngam/mar me 'am/skyes pa 'am/bud med dam/
538b1(khri brgyad): rta'am/ba lang ngam/glang po che'am/bdag gi sha sbyin par byed pa na/'di skad du kye mi dag tshur sheg/khyed ci 'dod pa bzhin du khyed nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bsam pa bzang
538b2(khri brgyad): pos dogs pa med par khyer te/dengs shig ces sgra sgrogs par byed do//des sbyin pa de byin nas sems can de dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/chos la
538b3(khri brgyad): skyabs su 'gro bar byed/dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/la la dag ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin du 'jug go/la la dog ni gso sbyong gi yan lag
538b4(khri brgyad): brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/la la dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do//la la dag ni bsam gtan dang po nas 'du shes med
538b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du 'dzin du 'jug go/la la dag ni byams po dang snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms yang dag par
538b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin du 'jug go/la la dag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /
538b7(khri brgyad): gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /la la dag ni lus la so sor rtog pa mi sdug pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa la sbyor ro//le la dag ni rnam par
539a1(khri brgyad): dag pa la/la la dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la/la la dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la/la la dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la//
539a2(khri brgyad): la la dag ni dbang po lnga la/la la ngag ni stobs lnga la/la la dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la/la la dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
539a3(khri brgyad): pa la/la la dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/la la dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la/
539a4(khri brgyad): la la dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so/
539a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la/la la dag ni byams pa chen po la/la la dag ni snying rje chen po la/la la dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la/
539a6(khri brgyad): la la dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la/la la dag na dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la/la la dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/la la dag
539a7(khri brgyad): ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/la la dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu le/la lnga dog ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/l-i la dag ni rang byang chub la/la la//
539b1(khri brgyad): dag ni tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
539b2(khri brgyad): spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas zong zing gi sbyin pa byin nas grub pa dang /bde ba rgya chen po la 'god par byed de/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
539b3(khri brgyad): dpo' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sems can
539b4(khri brgyad): rnams la chos kyi sbyin pas ji ltar phan 'dogs she na/rab 'byor chos kyi sbyin pa ni 'di gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'o///
539b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /bstan pa dang /bshad pa gang yin pa ste/'di lta ste/mi sdug pa
539b6(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i le'u las 'byung ba dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag dang /so
539b7(khri brgyad): so'i skye bo dang thun mong ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos gang yang rung ba rnams te/'di ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
540a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin nas/rnam grangs du mas yang dag par blangs pa de las 'byed par byed do//des phye nas thabs la mkhasangs 'phags
540a2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu la 'god par byed do//'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/rab 'byor
540a3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yin no//'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du
540a4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no//rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i
540a5(khri brgyad): 'bras bu shes pa nas ngag bcom pa nyid shes pa'i bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'i bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes
540a6(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dang /byams pa chen po shes pa dang /snying rje chen po shes pa dang /dga' ba chen po shes pa dang /btang snyoms chen po shes pa'i bar dang /gzhan yang
540a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par gang dag 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med
540b1(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//byang chub sems
540b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
540b3(khri brgyad): po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub
540b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de
540b5(khri brgyad): bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub
540b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs par tha dad du bgyi ba ci mchis/bka' stsal pa/tha dad du bya ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
540b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes thob pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang la gnas nas
541a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad tha dad du dbyer med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tha dad
541a2(khri brgyad): par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa yin te/de la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das
541a3(khri brgyad): pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la btsud nas thabs mkhas
541a4(khri brgyad): pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'grod par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin
541a5(khri brgyad): ba byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
541a6(khri brgyad): dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /rnam par thar pa
541a7(khri brgyad): brgyad dang /mther gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /nyon mongs pa med pa
541b1(khri brgyad): dang /smon nas shes pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /shin tu yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /dbang bcu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
541b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang /thugs
541b3(khri brgyad): rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
541b4(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/de dag ni 'jig rten pa ma yin pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar
541b5(khri brgyad): bzhug pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brnabs sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/nang gi lus la lus
541b6(khri brgyad): kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi ba rna bas sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su
541b7(khri brgyad): lta zhing gnas pa dang /brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brna bas sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes
542a1(khri brgyad): su lta zhing gnas pa dang /lus la 'byung bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /lus la 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /lus la kun 'byung ba dang 'jig par
542a2(khri brgyad): rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /lus la mi gnas par gnas shing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med pa dang /tshor ba dang /sems dang /chos rnams la'ang de bzhin du/
542a3(khri brgyad): sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams gang zhe na/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/'dun pa bskyed pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i
542a4(khri brgyad): chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/'dun pa bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas
542a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa'o//rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams grang zhe na/'dun
542a6(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /sems dang /brtson 'grus dang /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
542a7(khri brgyad): rkang pa'o//rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/
542b1(khri brgyad): de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o//rab 'byor stobs lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi
542b2(khri brgyad): stobs te/de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
542b3(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /ting
542b4(khri brgyad): denge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
542b5(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
542b6(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de la ting nge 'dzin gsum
542b7(khri brgyad): gang she na/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma mang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/stong pa'i rnam pa dang /
543a1(khri brgyad): dben pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /
543a2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/mi rtag pa'i rnam
543a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs can/
543a4(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams le lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug
543a5(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las
543a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
543a7(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du
543b1(khri brgyad): shos mod min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa'i bar dag ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa
543b2(khri brgyad): brgyad ces bya'o//rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/'di la kha cig 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben
543b3(khri brgyad): ba/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis
543b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
543b5(khri brgyad): med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
543b6(khri brgyad): shes bya'o//de la zad por gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/zad par sa dang /zad par chu dang /zad par mi dang /zad par rlung dang /zad par sngon po dang /zad par ser po dang /zad par
543b7(khri brgyad): dmar po dang /zad par dkar po dang /zad par rnam par shes pa dang /zad par nam mkha' ste/de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o//de la zil gyis gnan pa'i skye
544a1(khri brgyad): mchod brgyad gang zhe na/nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu/kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing /gzugs de dag
544a2(khri brgyad): zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/de lta bu 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas
544a3(khri brgyad): phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/de lta bur
544a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes par 'gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po/sngon po lta bur ston
544a5(khri brgyad): pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/dper na zar ma'i me tog gam/yul bA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po/kha dog sngon po/sngon po lta bur ston pa/
544a6(khri brgyad): 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/kha dog sngon po/sngon po lta bur ston pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams
544a7(khri brgyad): la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od
544b1(khri brgyad): ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/dper na dong ga'i me tog gam/yul bA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du/
544b2(khri brgyad): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
544b3(khri brgyad): bzhi pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/dper na
544b4(khri brgyad): ban+d+ha dzi ba'i me tog dang /yul bA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa/dmar po/kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/nang gzugs
544b5(khri brgyad): med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga
544b6(khri brgyad): pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/dper na skar ma pa bi
544b7(khri brgyad): sangs kyi mdog ltar dkar po/kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/
545a1(khri brgyad): kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
545a2(khri brgyad): shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid lo mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
545a3(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
545a4(khri brgyad): te/rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nus rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa ste/de dag ni zil gyis
